name: Qian

kingWen.explanation: Supreme success. Perseverance furthers.

image.text: The movement of heaven is full of power. Thus the superior man makes himself strong and untiring.
image.explanation: The movement of heaven is full of power. Thus the superior man makes himself strong and untiring.

traditional.description: This hexagram consists of six unbroken lines (lower Qian, upper Qian). It symbolizes heaven, signifying the dragon (the noble person of virtue and talent), and represents pure yang and strength, indicating prosperity and vigor. The Qian hexagram, based on the principles of universal change, uses 'yuan, heng, li, zhen' as its statement, signifying good fortune and teaching people to follow the virtuous way of heaven.

lines.explanation: Hidden dragon. Do not act.

image.text: Hidden dragon. Do not act. Yang is in the lower position.
image.explanation: The hidden dragon cannot be utilized because the yang line in the first position is at the bottom of the hexagram, so it is suppressed and unable to extend.

lines.white_explanation: The hidden dragon cannot be utilized.

lines.explanation: Dragon appearing in the field. It furthers one to see the great man.

image.text: Dragon appearing in the field. His virtue influences all.
image.explanation: The dragon appears on the earth, suggesting that the noble person has emerged from the depressed low point and is beginning to seek a social position where they can widely bestow virtue.

lines.white_explanation: The dragon appears on the earth. It is beneficial to meet noble persons and royalty.

lines.explanation: All day long the superior man is creatively active. At nightfall, his mind is still beset with cares. Danger. No blame.

image.text: All day long he is creatively active. This means repeatedly following the path.
image.explanation: The noble person works diligently all day, meaning they repeatedly follow the way, persisting without giving up.

lines.white_explanation: The virtuous noble person is always diligent during the day and vigilant at night with self-reflection. Although the situation is difficult, ultimately there will be no misfortune.

lines.explanation: Wavering flight over the depths. No blame.

image.text: Wavering flight over the depths. Advancing without blame.
image.explanation: The dragon may leap into the deep pool, indicating that one can take action without encountering disaster.

lines.white_explanation: The dragon may leap into the deep pool. There is no disaster.

lines.explanation: Flying dragon in the heavens. It furthers one to see the great man.

image.text: Flying dragon in the heavens. The great man creates.
image.explanation: The dragon soars in the sky, meaning the noble person accomplishes great things.

lines.white_explanation: The dragon soars in the sky. It is beneficial to meet noble persons and royalty.

lines.explanation: Arrogant dragon will have cause to repent.

image.text: Arrogant dragon will have cause to repent. Fullness cannot last forever.
image.explanation: The dragon that rises to the limit will face trouble and calamity. This warns people that nobility and fullness cannot be maintained forever.

lines.white_explanation: The dragon that rises to the limit will face trouble and calamity.

daxiang: Heaven moves with strength and self-renewal without ceasing.
fortune: Flying dragon in the heavens, a symbol of achieving both fame and wealth. Seize opportunities to strive for results.
career: Great good fortune and success in all things. Dreams come true with heaven's blessing. Career is at its peak like the sun at noon. But yang energy has reached its peak, and extreme prosperity will inevitably decline. One must remain vigilant and careful. Guard against arrogance, remain calm in handling affairs, maintain a peaceful mindset. In this way, one can fully utilize their talents and ensure career success.
business: Very smooth with excellent opportunities for upward development. But don't be overly hasty. Analyze situations calmly, seize opportunities, uphold business ethics, and respond calmly to difficulties that arise. There will certainly be satisfactory results.
fame: Potential abilities have not yet been fully demonstrated. With further effort, overcoming arrogance and self-satisfaction, improving virtue and expanding knowledge, one can establish a reputation as a noble person.
love: Yang energy flourishes while yin energy declines, but firmness and gentleness can complement each other, forming a happy outcome. A gentle woman is even better.
advice: One can achieve great accomplishments. Adhere to the essence of this hexagram's strength, uprightness, and fairness. Cultivate virtue, accumulate knowledge, strengthen faith, and strive without ceasing. Then one can overcome difficulties and eliminate disasters.
health: Maintain consistent health practices.

name: Kun

kingWen.explanation: Supreme success. Favorable is the perseverance of a mare. If the superior man undertakes something and tries to lead, he goes astray; but if he follows, he finds guidance. It is favorable to find friends in the west and south, to forego friends in the east and north. Quiet perseverance brings good fortune.

image.text: The earth's condition is receptive devotion. Thus the superior man with his breadth of character carries the outer world.
image.explanation: The earth's condition is receptive devotion. Thus the superior man with his breadth of character carries the outer world.

traditional.description: This hexagram consists of six broken lines (lower Kun, upper Kun), which is yin in nature. It symbolizes the earth (opposite to the Qian hexagram), submissive to heaven. It carries all things and extends without end. The Kun hexagram is symbolized by a mare, indicating that the way of earth is to give birth to and nurture all things, while following heaven's timing with a gentle temperament. It proves that 'Kun' follows 'Qian' and only by following 'Qian' can one grasp the correct direction, follow the right path, and obtain good fortune.

lines.explanation: When there is hoarfrost underfoot, solid ice is not far off.

image.text: When there is hoarfrost underfoot, solid ice is not far off. This is the beginning of yin's consolidation. Following the natural progression, solid ice will soon form.
image.explanation: Treading on thin frost, one can predict that thick ice will soon form. This indicates that the cold yin energy has begun to condense, and following the natural law of progression, thick ice layers will soon form.

lines.white_explanation: Treading on thin frost, one can predict that thick ice will soon form.

lines.explanation: Straight, square, and great. Without purpose, yet nothing remains unfurthered.

image.text: The movement of six in the second place is straight and square. Without purpose, yet nothing remains unfurthered. This is the vastness of earth's way.
image.explanation: The image of six in the second place is straight and square. Even when going to unfamiliar places, there is nothing unfavorable, because the way of earth is vast and boundless.

lines.white_explanation: Straightness, squareness, and vastness are characteristics of the earth. Even when going to unfamiliar places, there is nothing unfavorable.

lines.explanation: Hidden lines. One is able to remain persevering. If by chance you are in the service of a king, seek not works, but bring to completion.

image.text: Hidden lines. One is able to remain persevering. This means acting at the right time. When serving the king, one understands the importance of the great work.
image.explanation: Defeating the Yin-Shang dynasty, a favorable divination, indicates being able to seize the opportunity to take action. Someone serves in the war (without achieving military merit but has a good ending) because of his vast wisdom and ability.

lines.white_explanation: Defeating the Yin-Shang dynasty. A favorable divination. Someone serves in the war, without achieving military merit, but the ending is still good.

lines.explanation: A tied-up sack. No blame, no praise.

image.text: A tied-up sack. No blame. Caution brings no harm.
image.explanation: Tying up the bag, like keeping silent, means that caution prevents misfortune.

lines.white_explanation: Tying up the bag, like keeping silent, there is no blame, nor is there praise.

lines.explanation: A yellow lower garment brings supreme good fortune.

image.text: The yellow lower garment brings supreme good fortune. Beauty lies within.
image.explanation: Yellow lower garment brings great fortune, because the 'yellow garment' symbolizes a person's inner virtue.

lines.white_explanation: Yellow lower garment. Great good fortune.

lines.explanation: Dragons fight in the meadow. Their blood is black and yellow.

image.text: Dragons fight in the meadow. Their way has come to an end.
image.explanation: Dragons fighting on the earth, metaphorically suggesting that a person has reached the end of their path in extreme hardship.

lines.white_explanation: Dragons fighting on the earth, blood covering the field.

daxiang: The earth carries all things, winning people through virtue. The benevolent have no enemies.
fortune: All matters should not be rushed; it is appropriate to use stillness to control movement.
career: Various undertakings can succeed and achieve the expected results, but difficulties may plague the beginning. Do not take risks or rush forward. One must be careful with words and actions, especially avoiding acting alone or making unilateral decisions. It is most important to gain friends' concern and support. Under others' cooperation, work together to complete the endeavor. Therefore, one should focus on inner cultivation, accumulate virtue, emulate the earth's capacity to tolerate and bear weight, be generous and broad-minded, be straightforward, upright, and reserved. One must not be greedy for achievement or arrogant, but persevere to seek success in career.
business: Opportunities are not very good. Do not take risks; steadiness is best. When encountering setbacks, be sure to sum up experience immediately. Pay attention to storing goods, waiting for the right price. Being careful everywhere is advisable.
fame: Relatively smooth, with the basic conditions present. By working steadily and diligently, not pursuing external things, good fortune can be achieved.
love: Yin energy flourishes. Gentleness overcomes strength. A docile woman, beautiful marriage, together until old age.
advice: Honest, gentle, sincere to others, eager to help people, and thus can also receive help from others, but often gets hurt by not guarding against villains, though without major harm. Flexible personality, diverse working methods, can succeed in different situations and receive praise.
health: Gentle exercises.

name: Tun

kingWen.explanation: Supreme success through perseverance. Do not undertake anything. It is beneficial to establish feudal lords.

image.text: Clouds and thunder represent difficulty. The superior person organizes and plans accordingly.
image.explanation: Clouds and thunder represent difficulty. The superior person organizes and plans accordingly.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by the trigrams of Thunder (below) and Water (above). Thunder symbolizes movement; Water symbolizes danger. Thunder and rain together create difficult conditions and dangerous environments. 'Tun' originally referred to plants sprouting from the earth. As all things begin to grow, they face difficulties and obstacles, yet by adapting to circumstances and timing, they will flourish.

lines.explanation: Hesitation. Beneficial to remain steadfast. Beneficial to establish feudal lords.

image.text: Despite hesitation, one's intentions are correct; by honoring those beneath oneself, one gains the people's support.
image.explanation: Although there is hesitation and difficulty in advancing, the intention remains righteous. The first nine is positioned below the second six yin line, symbolizing how those of high status humble themselves to those of lower status, thus gaining the hearts of the people.

lines.white_explanation: Hesitating to advance. This is favorable for staying in place. For the diviner, it is beneficial to establish a state and become a lord.

lines.explanation: Difficulties like circling around. Riding horses in circles. Not a bandit but seeking marriage. The maiden is virtuous but does not conceive for ten years, then conceives.

image.text: The difficulty of the second six is that it rides upon the strong; ten years before conceiving indicates an abnormal situation.
image.explanation: The second six line indicates difficulty because it is positioned above the initial yang line. Taking ten years to conceive is an abnormal phenomenon.

lines.white_explanation: Hesitating to advance. Uncertain on the path, circling with horse carriages, not coming to rob but to seek marriage. The woman cannot conceive for ten years, then finally becomes pregnant.

lines.explanation: Hunting deer without a guide, only entering into the forest. The superior person, understanding this, would rather give up. Going forward brings regret.

image.text: Hunting deer without a guide is about pursuing wild animals. The superior person gives up because going forward leads to difficulties and entrapment.
image.explanation: Pursuing deer without a guide means pursuing wild animals. The superior person abandons the deer, knowing that entering deep into the forest would be dangerous, thus having no other choice.

lines.white_explanation: Hunting deer without a guide. Considering that the deer has fled into the forest. The wise person is alert and decides to abandon the pursuit. Entering deep into the forest would be dangerous.

lines.explanation: Riding horses in circles, seeking marriage. Going forward brings good fortune. Nothing unfavorable.

image.text: Seeking and advancing shows understanding.
image.explanation: Daring to pursue and advance shows that one understands the situation clearly.

lines.white_explanation: Circling with horse carriages, seeking marriage. Moving forward boldly will surely bring good fortune.

lines.explanation: Hoarding one's riches, small matters bring good fortune, big matters bring misfortune.

image.text: Hoarding one's riches means that generosity is not widespread.
image.explanation: 'Hoarding fatty meat' means that one's charity is not widespread.

lines.white_explanation: Hoarding fatty meat. If you receive this line in divination, asking about small matters brings good fortune, asking about big matters brings misfortune.

lines.explanation: Riding horses in circles, weeping tears of blood.

image.text: Weeping tears of blood. How can this last?

daxiang: Tun means difficulty; in all affairs, one wants to advance but cannot.
fortune: Being in a difficult situation, one must proceed carefully with initial hardship followed by resolution.
career: Initial difficulties require courage to advance, proceeding carefully but bravely to achieve potential great success. When opportunity comes, one must seize it without rushing. There will still be obstacles, and assistance from others is necessary, so one should cultivate goodwill regularly.
business: The early stages of business are difficult with many setbacks. Faith is most important; don't be deceived by surface appearances. Be proactive and decisive to create opportunities. If still unable to overcome difficulties, retreat and preserve strength while waiting for a better chance to expand.
fame: Strive actively, pursue proactively, success is possible.
love: Many obstacles to overcome, but with loyalty and purity, bold pursuit can succeed, resulting in a happy marriage.
advice: Initial difficulties can be overcome with perseverance and unyielding struggle, leading to immeasurable prospects. Often misunderstood by others, leading to loneliness and depression, your career may face difficulties requiring help from virtuous people to overcome. With an optimistic attitude, achievement is possible.
health: Preserve vital energy.

name: Meng

kingWen.explanation: Success. It is not I who seek the young fool; the young fool seeks me. At first divination I inform. If he asks repeatedly, it is importunity. If importunate, I give no information. Perseverance brings good fortune.

image.text: A spring flowing at the foot of the mountain: Youthful Folly. The superior person cultivates character through resolute action.
image.explanation: A spring flowing at the foot of the mountain: Youthful Folly. The superior person cultivates character through resolute action.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by the trigrams Mountain (above) and Water (below). Mountain symbolizes stillness; Water symbolizes danger. The image shows danger below the mountain, yet one continues to advance—this is foolishness or ignorance, hence the name Meng. However, by seizing opportunities and acting at the right time, there is enlightenment and progress in this hexagram.

lines.explanation: Dispelling ignorance. It is beneficial to use punishment for people, to remove shackles and fetters. Going forward brings humiliation.

image.text: Using punishment is beneficial for establishing proper law.
image.explanation: It is beneficial to punish criminals as this helps to establish proper law and order.

lines.white_explanation: Clearing the wilderness can benefit from using criminals as labor. Because removing their shackles and sending them forward results in disaster.

lines.explanation: Accommodating ignorance brings good fortune. Taking a wife brings good fortune. The son is capable of managing the household.

image.text: The son managing the household indicates the meeting of the firm and the yielding.
image.explanation: Man and woman coming together to form a family, as the second nine and third six lines are close, indicates the interaction of yin and yang, firm and yielding.

lines.white_explanation: Bundling the cut wild grass. This is a good omen. For this divination, taking a wife is fortunate. The man and woman can form a compatible family.

lines.explanation: Do not take this woman. Seeing a man of gold, she has no integrity. Nothing is advantageous.

image.text: Do not take this woman, as her behavior is not proper.
image.explanation: One cannot marry this woman. The third six line is positioned above the second nine, symbolizing a woman dominating a man, which is contrary to proper order.

lines.white_explanation: Do not abduct women for marriage; you will meet armed resistance, lose your life, and gain nothing.

lines.explanation: Entangled in ignorance. Misfortune.

image.text: The misfortune of being entangled in ignorance is being isolated from reality.
image.explanation: Naive and ignorant people are fortunate because they are compliant and obedient.

lines.white_explanation:
Being lazy in clearing the wilderness will lead to danger.

The Symbol says: To be troubled by ignorance and folly is because one lives in isolation, far from real life.

**Shao Yong's Explanation of the Lines**

**Unfortunate:** Those who receive this line will find relationships cold and business operations blocked. Staying still brings no disaster, but movement brings loss. Officials will find it difficult to advance due to lack of recognition.

**Fu Peirong's Interpretation**

**Timing:** Distant water cannot quench nearby fire.

**Finances:** Lack of capital leads to inevitable poverty.

**Home:** Living in a remote location leads to a difficult life.

**Health:** Weak constitution with cold-related illnesses.

**Fourth Six Changes Hexagram**

When the fourth six changes, it becomes Hexagram 64: Fire over Water, Not Yet Completed. This hexagram consists of the trigrams Fire (above) and Water (below). Fire rises while water sinks, with fire's force overwhelming water, indicating that the great work of fire control is not yet complete, hence 'Not Yet Completed.' The I Ching begins with the Qian and Kun hexagrams and ends with Already Completed and Not Yet Completed, fully reflecting the concept of change and development.

Detailed explanation of the Fifth Six line in Hexagram 4

**Fifth Six Line Statement**

**Fifth Six.** Youthful ignorance brings good fortune.

Symbol says: The good fortune of youthful ignorance comes from compliance and gentleness.

**Plain Language Explanation**

Fifth six: Cutting down mountain trees brings good fortune.

lines.explanation: Childlike ignorance brings good fortune.

image.text: The good fortune of childlike ignorance comes from being compliant and gentle.
image.explanation: The reason why childlike ignorance is fortunate is that there is compliance and obedience.

lines.white_explanation: Cutting down mountain trees brings good fortune.

lines.explanation: Strike at ignorance. It is not advantageous to be a marauder, but it is advantageous to resist marauders.

image.text: It is advantageous to resist marauders because those above and below are in harmony.
image.explanation: It is beneficial to defend against thieves and bandits because the top yang line occupies the highest position of the hexagram, indicating that the ministers below are loyal and supportive. With everyone's support in defending against bandits, victory is certain.

lines.white_explanation: Cutting grass and felling trees. If you receive this line in divination, it is not advantageous to be a bandit but advantageous to defend against bandits.

daxiang: Meng means being confused and unable to see clearly, thus needing 'enlightenment.'
fortune: Initially confused and directionless, one must be patient and wait for the right time to act. Listening to others' opinions will help the situation improve.
career: At the beginning of a career, there is chaos and danger, but brave and persevering action can turn the situation around. However, strict education is necessary to cultivate this enterprising spirit. One must be practical and avoid being overambitious, or risk becoming isolated and helpless.
business: One must be careful and not seek quick profits, especially establishing high business ethics to enhance competitiveness through a good reputation.
fame: One must receive good basic education and cultivate moral character. With pure motives, goals can be achieved.
love: Pay attention to examining the other person's moral character; do not be lured by money. Husband and wife need to be tolerant and understanding of each other.
advice: Sometimes you may fall into confusion and difficulty, and being timid and indecisive often leads to mistakes. If you can accept the teachings of elders, even harsh tests, abandon doubt and fear, and wait for the right opportunity, things will surely go smoothly.
health: Expelling pathogenic heat will maintain safety.

name: Xu

kingWen.explanation: Having sincerity, bright and successful, favorable divination. Advantageous to cross the great river.

image.text: Clouds rising to heaven, Waiting. The superior person enjoys food and drink at feasts.
image.explanation: Clouds rising to heaven, Waiting. The superior person enjoys food and drink at feasts.

traditional.description: This hexagram is composed of two different trigrams (lower Qian above Kan), the lower trigram is Qian, symbolizing strength; the upper trigram is Kan, symbolizing danger. When strength meets danger, one should act prudently and not rashly. By observing the time and waiting for change, one will certainly succeed.

lines.explanation: Waiting in the suburbs. It is beneficial to persist steadily, without blame.

image.text: Waiting in the suburbs, not risking difficult progress; beneficial to persist steadily without blame, not deviating from the norm.
image.explanation: Waiting in the suburbs means one cannot risk advancing further. Continuing to wait without danger, this is because waiting for the right opportunity does not violate normal principles.

lines.white_explanation: Waiting in the suburbs, you should continue to wait as before, there is no danger.

lines.explanation: Waiting on the sand, some small talk, ultimately auspicious.

image.text: Waiting on the sand, the delay is in the middle; although there is a little blame, it ends auspiciously.
image.explanation: Waiting on sandy ground, where the sand is soft and difficult to traverse, will cause delay which is a fault in oneself. Although there is a slight error, the final outcome is still good.

lines.white_explanation: Waiting on sandy ground, there is a slight error, but it will ultimately be auspicious.

lines.explanation: Waiting in the mud, inviting bandits to come.

image.text: Waiting in the mud, the disaster is external. By bringing bandits upon oneself, through respectful caution, one will not fail.
image.explanation: Waiting in muddy mire, the mud is filthy and the environment is dangerous, disaster is nearby. By bringing bandits upon oneself, but being respectful and cautious, responding to circumstances, one can avoid injury.

lines.white_explanation: Waiting in muddy mire, attracting bandits to come.

lines.explanation: Waiting in blood, emerging from the pit.

image.text: Waiting in blood, obediently listening.
image.explanation: Lingering in a pool of blood, waiting for an unpredictable fate to descend, the six in the fourth place is under the threat of the nine in the fifth place and can only obey the strong and follow their arrangement.

lines.white_explanation: Initially lingering in a pool of blood, later escaping from the dangerous trap.

lines.explanation: Waiting with wine and food, auspicious divination.

image.text: Wine and food bring good fortune, due to central correctness.
image.explanation: With wine and meat, an auspicious omen, because the nine in the fifth place is in the middle position of the upper trigram, symbolizing that the person has a virtuous character and can choose good circumstances, living in a comfortable environment.

lines.white_explanation: Waiting at a banquet, this is an auspicious omen.

lines.explanation: Entering into a pit. There are three uninvited guests who arrive. Honor them and in the end there will be good fortune.

image.text: Uninvited guests who are honored bring good fortune in the end; although not in the proper position, there is no great loss.
image.explanation: Uninvited guests come, treat them respectfully, and the result will be auspicious. Because the hexagram has too many yang lines pressing on the yin lines, but the top six is in a yin position, which is appropriate, so there is alarm but no danger, no great loss.

lines.white_explanation: Entering a cave-like house, three unexpected guests arrive. Treat them respectfully and the result will be auspicious.

daxiang: Clouds rising to heaven but not yet raining, symbolizing the need to wait for the right time.
fortune: The wise must wait for the right time to act; rushing will bring danger.
career: The key is to assess the situation, be patient, achieve success through tranquility, and never take risks as haste makes waste. You must be full of confidence, fearless in danger, adhere to the middle way, and you can turn danger into safety. Even when conditions are favorable, you should still prepare for danger in times of peace.
business: At the beginning of action, conditions are difficult, and you must be extremely patient, create conditions and opportunities, act with integrity, observe the situation and wait for change to realize your wishes. When things are close to success, you should be even more careful to avoid failure at the last moment.
fame: The time is not yet ripe, be patient and wait. At this time you should strengthen your belief, not be swayed by idle gossip, work hard to enrich yourself, and then seek help from reliable people to succeed.
love: Be cautious, never act rashly, gradually cultivate feelings, treat each other with honesty and enthusiasm. There may be unexpected changes, but it can still have a good ending. Both parties should understand the principle of using softness to overcome hardness.
advice: The future is bright, you have great ambition, and you can achieve it. For this, you need to accumulate strength, wait for opportunities, and achieve success late in life. You have a strong will and a calm mind. You will encounter difficulties and dangers on your way forward, you must be very careful, calmly deal with slander from petty people, and remain calm in the face of disaster. Do not act rashly, calmly choose your direction. Be modest and frank, with much help from others, promoting career success. When the time is ripe, things will go smoothly.
health: Adjust your diet and good health can be expected.

name: Song

kingWen.explanation: There is sincerity, but obstruction and apprehension. Being in the middle is auspicious, but the end is ominous. It is beneficial to see a great person, not beneficial to cross the great river.

image.text: Heaven and water move in opposite directions, Conflict. The superior person carefully plans at the beginning of undertakings.
image.explanation: Heaven and water move in opposite directions, Conflict. The superior person carefully plans at the beginning of undertakings.

traditional.description: This hexagram is composed of two different trigrams (lower Kan above Qian). Opposite to the Xu hexagram, they are complementary hexagrams. Qian represents strength and Kan represents danger. Strength and danger, health and peril oppose each other, which will certainly lead to conflict. Conflict is not a good thing, one must be cautious and fearful.

lines.explanation: Not continuing what one is doing. Some small talk, but ultimately auspicious.

image.text: Not continuing what one is doing, conflict cannot last long; though there is a little blame, their dispute will be clarified.
image.explanation: Unable to persevere in what one is doing, indicating that lawsuits cannot continue indefinitely. Although there are slight faults, the right and wrong of the dispute will eventually be clarified.

lines.white_explanation: Unable to persevere in what one is doing, slightly at fault, ultimately auspicious.

lines.explanation: Unable to succeed in the conflict, returns and flees. The people of his town, three hundred households, are without misfortune.

image.text: Unable to succeed in the conflict, returns and flees in hiding; a subordinate initiating conflict with a superior will bring trouble upon oneself.
image.explanation: Failing in the lawsuit, escaping back home, this is to avoid counter-litigation. A minor official in conflict with a high official, losing and returning is inevitable. Fortunately, the disaster did not further expand.

lines.white_explanation: Failing in the lawsuit, returning to the fief, three hundred slave households flee. No major disaster.

lines.explanation: Living on old virtue. Divination shows danger, but ultimately auspicious. Perhaps engaged in the king's affairs, without achievement.

image.text: Living on old virtue, following the superior is auspicious.
image.explanation: Relying on ancestors' legacy to live, because the six in the third place indicates a position below the nine in the fourth place, only by relying on ancestral shade can one obtain good fortune.

lines.white_explanation: Relying on ancestors' legacy to live. Divination shows danger but ultimately auspicious. However, if serving the king's affairs seeking profit, there will be no success.

lines.explanation: Unable to succeed in the conflict, returns to obey the decree. Changes one's attitude, remaining steadfast and correct, auspicious.

image.text: Returning to obey the decree, changing one's attitude, remaining steadfast and correct, auspicious, not losing one's way.
image.explanation: Losing the lawsuit, returning home, obeying the judgment, maintaining one's proper place, not losing the right path.

lines.white_explanation: Lawsuit fails, returning home after defeat, obeying the judgment. Divination for peace shows an auspicious omen.

lines.explanation: Contention, greatly auspicious.

image.text: Contention, greatly auspicious, because of centrality and correctness.
image.explanation: Contention is greatly auspicious, because the nine in the fifth place is in the middle position of the upper trigram, like a person adhering to the middle and correct way.

lines.white_explanation: Contention, when divining with this line, greatly auspicious.

lines.explanation: Perhaps one is given a leather belt, but by the end of the morning it is taken away three times.

image.text: To receive a belt through litigation is also not worthy of respect.
image.explanation: Someone receives the honor of being awarded a sash due to litigation, this is not a respectable matter.

lines.white_explanation: The king bestows a sash upon someone, but not even for a full day, it is awarded and revoked three times.

daxiang: Qian heaven rises above, Kan water descends below, moving in opposite directions causing conflict.
fortune: Things go contrary to wishes, everything is not smooth, petty people cause harm, beware of traps.
career: Initially smooth with profit to be gained, then setbacks follow. You must be vigilant, cautious again and cautious, do not adhere stubbornly to your views, strive to avoid getting involved in litigation disputes. Rather than this, it is better to yield to others, seeking resolution, staying with proper principles can avoid unexpected disasters. Even if you win when embroiled in litigation, in the end you will still lose, and the gain is not worth the loss.
business: Harmony brings wealth, taking a loss is a blessing. Do not pursue unrighteous wealth. Business negotiations should adhere to principles of justice, fairness, and mutual benefit, and avoid conflicts as much as possible. This way, there will be good results.
fame: Not favorable. You still lack competitive strength, should uphold purity, endure and encourage yourself, be self-reliant and self-motivating, never show off. Rely on the help of influential people to overcome difficulties early.
love: Although not entirely satisfactory, it is still compatible, with mutual understanding, it can work out. Both parties should handle life in a gentle manner.
advice: Competitive and not satisfied with the status quo, striving to change fate and surpass others. Intelligent mind, quick reactions, with noble people's assistance. But lacking perseverance, easily showing sharp edges, offending others, bringing litigation disasters. You should recognize reality, go with the flow, be content, and know when to stop. Accept lessons, take warning, and you can achieve success and fame.
health: Prevention is better than cure.

name: 師卦

kingWen.explanation: 貞，丈人吉，無咎。

image.text: 地中有水，師。君子以容民畜眾。
image.explanation: 地中有水，師。君子以容民畜眾。

traditional.description: 這個卦是異卦(下坎上坤)相疊。“師”指軍隊。坎為水、為險;坤為地、為順，喻寓兵於農。兵凶戰危，用兵乃聖人不得已而為之，但它可以順利無阻礙地解決矛盾，因為順乎形勢，師出有名，故能化凶為吉。

lines.explanation: 師出以律，否臧，凶。

image.text: 師出以律，失律凶也。
image.explanation: 整軍出戰全憑紀律，失去紀律的約束就會帶來兇險。

lines.white_explanation: 整軍出戰全憑紀律，不遵守紀律就會有兇險。

lines.explanation: 在師中，吉無咎，王三錫命。

image.text: 在師中吉，承天寵也，王三錫命，懷萬邦也。
image.explanation: 主帥身在軍中指揮，吉利，因為得到上天的寵愛。君王三次頒命嘉獎，因為主帥能懷徠萬國。

lines.white_explanation: 主帥身在軍中指揮，吉利，沒有災難。君王三次頒命嘉獎。

lines.explanation: 師或輿屍，凶。

image.text: 師或輿屍，大無功也。
image.explanation: 軍隊出征，有人載屍而歸，這是前方吃了敗仗。

lines.white_explanation: 軍隊出征，有人載屍而歸，這是兇險之兆。

lines.explanation: 師左次，無咎。

image.text: 左次無咎，未失常也。
image.explanation: 軍隊在左邊紮營，沒有危險，因為軍隊駐紮或左或右，唯視地理環境、敵我形勢而定，並沒有違背行軍常道。

lines.white_explanation: 軍隊在左邊紮營，沒有危險。

lines.explanation: 田有禽，利執言，無咎。長子帥師，弟子輿屍，貞凶。

image.text: 長子帥師，以中行也;弟子輿屍，使不當也。
image.explanation: 以長子指揮軍隊，這是依正道行事。次子戰敗陣亡，這是因為差遣不當。

lines.white_explanation: 打獵時獲得獵物，作戰中捕獲俘虜，沒有災禍。長子指揮軍隊，次子戰敗陣亡，這是兇險的貞兆。

lines.explanation: 大君有命，開國承家，小人勿用。

image.text: 大君有命，以正功也;小人勿用，必亂邦也。
image.explanation: 國君頒發封賞功臣的命令，這是論功行賞。不要重用無才無德的小人，因為小人必定覆國亂邦。

lines.white_explanation: 國君頒發命令，有人被封為諸侯，享有封國，有人被封為大夫，享有采邑。但是不要重用無才無德的小人。

daxiang: 養兵聚眾，出師攻伐之象，彼此有傷，難得安寧。
fortune: 困難重重，凡事以正規行事，忌獨斷獨行，投機取巧，提防潛在敵人。
career: 阻力很大，困難很多，處於激烈的競爭狀態，必與他人密切合作，謹小慎微，行為果斷，切忌盲目妄動，適度即可，注意保全自己。機動靈活，嚴於律已。從容沉著對付一切，必能成功。
business: 已有一定的積蓄，可以從事大的行銷活動，但必捲入激烈商戰，以剛毅頑強的精神和高尚的商業道德，輔以靈活的方法，勿貪圖小利，勿掉以輕心，加強與他人的溝通，必可擺脫困境，化險為夷。
fame: 具備很好的條件，但須有正確的引導，務必嚴格要求自己，克服不利因素的干擾，經過紮實努力，必可名利雙全。
love: 慎重、專注，否則會陷入“三角”糾紛。痴情追求可以達到目的。
advice: 天資聰穎，性格靈活，具有堅強的意志，對事業執著追求，迎難而進。可成就大事業。喜競爭，善爭辯，富有冒險精神，不免帶來麻煩，務老成持重，不貪功，以中正為要。
health: 腹脹之症，調氣無憂。

name: Bi

kingWen.explanation: Good fortune. Perform divination to determine if it is right to be steadfast and persevering. No blame. Those who are not at peace will come. Those who come too late will meet misfortune.

image.text: Water on the earth: Holding together. The ancient kings established the various states and maintained friendly relations with the feudal lords.
image.explanation: Water on the earth: Holding together. The ancient kings established the various states and maintained friendly relations with the feudal lords.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by trigrams (lower Kun, upper Kan), Kun is earth, Kan is water. Water adheres to the earth, the earth contains rivers and seas, they are mutually dependent and intimately connected. This hexagram is the opposite of hexagram #7 (The Army), they are complementary. It explains the principles of mutual support and assistance, generosity and selflessness, and sincere unity.

lines.explanation: Show sincerity in holding together. No blame. Sincerity fills the vessel. In the end, other good fortune will come.

image.text: In the initial six of Holding Together, there will be good fortune from elsewhere.
image.explanation: When this first line is drawn, although there may be unexpected difficulties, the final outcome will be favorable.

lines.white_explanation: Capturing prisoners and treating them well brings no disaster. Capturing prisoners and entertaining them with vessels full of food and wine. Although there may be unexpected difficulties, the final outcome will be favorable.

lines.explanation: Hold together within, being steadfast and upright brings good fortune.

image.text: Holding together from within means not losing oneself.
image.explanation: Internal harmony and unity will not lose the hearts of the people.

lines.white_explanation: Internal harmony and unity brings a favorable divination.

lines.explanation: You hold together with the wrong people.

image.text: Holding together with the wrong people, isn't that sad?
image.explanation: Conspiring with scoundrels, isn't that very sad?

lines.white_explanation: Conspiring with scoundrels and villains.

lines.explanation: Holding together with others externally leads to good fortune when one is steadfast and upright.

image.text: Joining externally with the worthy is to follow those above.
image.explanation: Externally aligning with a wise ruler is like subjects serving their sovereign.

lines.white_explanation: Making alliances and fostering goodwill with foreign countries brings a favorable divination.

lines.explanation: Manifestation of holding together. The king employs three beaters to drive the game, but lets the animals in front escape. The citizens need no warning. Good fortune.

image.text: The good fortune of evident union comes from the correct central position. Letting the prey in front escape means rejecting what opposes and accepting what yields. The citizens need no warning because the ruler uses their central position well.
image.explanation: Universal harmony is favorable because the nine in fifth place occupies the central position of the upper trigram, like a person who adheres to the middle path. Letting those who flee forward escape while catching those who run toward you, that is the reason for 'letting the prey in front escape.' The common people are not frightened by the king's hunting because the king's actions are proper and just.

lines.white_explanation: Universal harmony. The king uses a three-sided hunting method, deliberately leaving one side open to allow some animals to escape. The common people are not frightened by the king's hunt. Drawing this line brings good fortune.

lines.explanation: Holding together without a head. Misfortune.

image.text: Holding together without a head means there is no conclusion.
image.explanation: When petty people conspire together but engage in intrigue against each other, they cannot form a united center. They will certainly have no good ending.

lines.white_explanation: When petty people conspire together but engage in intrigue against each other, they cannot form a united center. This is a very dangerous situation.

daxiang: One yang line rules five yin lines, representing neighbors helping each other, a symbol of harmony and joy.
fortune: Favorable times ahead with potential support from influential people. In all matters, act quickly and decisively without excessive hesitation.
career: Success and forward progress are likely, with help and support from others. Approach tasks with honesty and trust. Treat others with generosity and integrity, be proactive and enthusiastic, learn from virtuous and talented people, and listen to their advice.
business: Your goals can be achieved with substantial profits, but close cooperation with others is necessary. Engage in sincere interactions, uphold business ethics, honor commitments and maintain integrity. Being purely profit-driven, greedy, or self-important will lead to serious losses.
fame: Success is possible, but it depends not only on personal effort but more importantly on recognition and nurturing from others.
love: Beautiful relationship with mutual love and loyalty, remaining faithful to each other until old age.
advice: Be kind-hearted, loyal, and generous to others, and you will receive the same in return. Work diligently, be strict with yourself, and you can achieve your goals. Remember to think and judge situations carefully, especially when choosing friends. Associating with people of poor character can bring misfortune. Befriending those more accomplished than yourself will benefit you throughout life.
health: Beware of water retention in the heart and abdomen; seek early treatment.

name: 小畜卦

kingWen.explanation: 亨。密雲不雨，自我西郊。

image.text: 風行天上，小畜。君子以懿文德。
image.explanation: 風行天上，小畜。君子以懿文德。

traditional.description: 這個卦是異卦(下乾上巽)相疊，乾為天，巽為風。喻風調雨順，穀物滋長，故卦名小畜(蓄)。力量有限，須待發展到一定程度，才可大有作為。

lines.explanation: 復自道，何其咎?吉。

image.text: 復自道，其義吉也。
image.explanation: 由原路返回，其含義是吉利。

lines.white_explanation: 由原路返回，有什麼災禍?吉利。

lines.explanation: 牽復，吉。

image.text: 牽復在中，亦不自失也。
image.explanation: 牽引著返回，吉利，因為九二之爻處於下卦中位，像人操行中正，自然不會有錯失。

lines.white_explanation: 牽引著返回，吉利。

lines.explanation: 輿說輻，夫妻反目。

image.text: 夫妻反目，不能正室也。
image.explanation: 夫妻口角，說明不能治理家庭。

lines.white_explanation: 車子壞了一個輪子。夫妻互相口角。

lines.explanation: 有孚，血去惕出，無咎。

image.text: 有孚惕出，上合志也。
image.explanation: 捕獲了俘虜，保持著警惕，說明尚能統一意志。

lines.white_explanation: 捕獲了俘虜，戰爭危險暫時消除了，但仍須保持警惕，才能沒有災難。

lines.explanation: 有孚攣如，富以其鄰。

image.text: 有孚攣如，不獨富也。
image.explanation: 捕獲俘虜，串連捆縛，財物與鄰邑同享，並非一人獨享。

lines.white_explanation: 捕獲俘虜，串連擱縛，這些對物與鄰邑同享。

lines.explanation: 既雨既處，尚德載。婦貞厲。月幾望，君子征凶。

image.text: 既雨既處，德積載也。君子征凶，有所疑也。
image.explanation: 久雨新停，未誤農時，當能豐登滿載。君子離家出行有兇險，因為對充滿危險的旅途缺乏了解。

lines.white_explanation: 久雨新停，還趕得上栽種作物。婦女占得此爻則兇險。夏曆某月十四日君子離家出行也有危險。

daxiang: 蓄養之量有限，力不從心，故宜忍耐蓄養實力，靜待時機。
fortune: 運勢反覆，有口舌之爭，但難於短期內解決，須忍耐，靜待時機。
career: 時機尚不成熟，應當耐心而積極地積存力量，切不可冒險行動。遇到挫折不可灰心，鼓起勇氣戰勝困難，堅持原則，加強團結合作，提前做好各項準備，會有所成。
business: 已有一定的基礎，但有失去危險，一定要特別慎重，爭取與他人真誠合作，共同獲利，決不貪心，適可而止，但更不能滿足現狀，不圖進取。
fame: 樹立遠大目標，盡最大努力去爭取，虛心求教他人，取得真誠幫助，實現自己的理想，警惕小人的破壞。
love: 雙方必須十分忠誠，第三者插足的現象極有可能發生。
advice: 不很順利，前進途中會遇到一些意想不到的困難。但由於本人性格堅強，具有戰勝不利條件的意志。因此，可以實理自己的理想。但極有可能遭到小人的傷害，必須得到志同道合者的真誠相助，才能可能排除障礙。對所得應滿足，適可而止，切不可過度追求，以免滿招損。
health: 風火之症;小孩吉，大人凶。

name: Lǚ

kingWen.explanation: Treading on the tail of a tiger, which does not bite the person. Success.

image.text: Heaven above, Lake below, Treading. The superior person discriminates between high and low, and thereby fortifies the people's minds.
image.explanation: Heaven above, Lake below, Treading. The superior person discriminates between high and low, and thereby fortifies the people's minds.

traditional.description: This hexagram consists of different trigrams (Dui below, Qian above). Qian represents heaven, Dui represents lake. Heaven symbolizes the ruler, lake symbolizes the people. The original text states: 'Treading on a tiger's tail, it does not bite the person.' Therefore, the result is favorable. The ruler is above and the people below, each in their proper place. Dui (weak) meets Qian (strong), making the treading dangerous. Treading means practice; the hexagram signifies advancing steadily forward.

lines.explanation: Simple treading. Going forward, no blame.

image.text: Moving forward with simple treading shows one following their own wishes.
image.explanation: Managing affairs with a plain and honest attitude means one can pursue their own will.

lines.white_explanation: With a plain and honest attitude in handling affairs, there is no disaster.

lines.explanation: Treading a smooth path; the recluse's perseverance brings good fortune.

image.text: The recluse's perseverance brings good fortune because he is centered and not disturbed by external things.
image.explanation: The recluse who maintains integrity and correctness does so because they are centered and not confused by worldly matters.

lines.white_explanation: One who walks the path has an open mind; the recluse meets with fortunate omens.

lines.explanation: A one-eyed person can still see; a lame person can still walk. Treading on a tiger's tail, which bites the person. Misfortune. A warrior acting as a servant to the great ruler.

image.text: A one-eyed person can see, but not enough to have clear vision. A lame person can walk, but not enough to move properly. The misfortune of being bitten comes from being in an improper position. A warrior serving the great ruler shows excessive ambition.
image.explanation: A blind person trying to see cannot distinguish objects clearly. A lame person trying to walk lacks the ability to move properly. The tiger attacks people because the Six in the Third Place (a yin line) occupies what should be a yang position—an improper placement. A warrior usurping state affairs is insubordinate—the Six in the Third Place trying to exercise the power of Nine in the Fifth Place will certainly bring disaster.

lines.white_explanation: A blind person trying to see objects, a lame person trying to walk—these are difficult endeavors, like treading on a tiger's tail, which will eventually lead to injury. This is an ominous situation. A warrior usurping state affairs is equally dangerous.

lines.explanation: Treading on the tiger's tail. Cautious and apprehensive, in the end there is good fortune.

image.text: Being apprehensive yet ultimately fortunate means one's aims are achieved despite difficulties.
image.explanation: Being fearful and alert leads to good fortune, showing that although one experiences hardships, one's goals are ultimately realized.

lines.white_explanation: Treading on the tiger's tail, but knowing to be cautious in danger—this ultimately leads to good fortune.

lines.explanation: Resolute treading. Perseverance brings danger.

image.text: Resolute treading with perseverance brings danger, yet the position is properly centered.
image.explanation: Behavior that is hasty and rash; divination shows danger in one's actions, but Nine in the Fifth Place occupies a central, proper position in the upper trigram. Therefore, though dangerous, it is not disastrous.

lines.white_explanation: Behavior that is hasty and rash; divination about one's actions shows danger.

lines.explanation: Observe your conduct and examine the omens. Completing this process brings supreme good fortune.

image.text: Supreme good fortune at the top signifies great celebration to come.
image.explanation: Great good fortune comes because the Top Nine is at the highest position of the hexagram, predicting that the person will have a major celebration.

lines.white_explanation: Acting cautiously and considering matters thoroughly and repeatedly brings great good fortune.

daxiang: The weak meets the strong, wishing to advance but finding it difficult—a symbol of difficulty and danger.
fortune: First comes labor, then ease; first alarm, then peace. Do not rush affairs. Approach others with harmony. There will be alarm but no danger.
career: Things are initially difficult with various threats. If you can remain vigilant, cautious, and take steady steps to overcome difficulties one by one without changing your determination, you will surely reach your goal. Have self-awareness in handling affairs and know your capabilities. Do not disregard reality, and especially do not force results or rush for success.
business: Wait and observe before acting. Do not let small profits shake your plans, and especially do not be greedy. Follow business ethics and understand all information thoroughly.
fame: You must have perseverance, pursue diligently, not be tempted by wealth, not be disturbed by worldly matters, and persist in your goals and ideals to achieve success.
love: If both parties are content with poverty and find joy in their circumstances, they can live harmoniously. If one party is moved by wealth and luxury, marriage problems will occur.
advice: All matters require caution. Unfavorable situations will often appear, but if handled well, you will always turn danger into safety. Therefore, take matters seriously, follow the correct path, humbly listen to others' suggestions, act within your capabilities, and avoid being arrogant or forcing your way. This will surely lead to good results.
health: Promote blood and qi circulation.

name: Tài

kingWen.explanation: The small departs and the great approaches. Good fortune. Success.

image.text: Heaven and earth interact: Peace. The sovereign fulfills the way of heaven and earth, assists the proper balance of heaven and earth, and thereby supports the people.
image.explanation: Heaven and earth interact: Peace. The sovereign fulfills the way of heaven and earth, assists the proper balance of heaven and earth, and thereby supports the people.

traditional.description: This hexagram consists of different trigrams (Qian below, Kun above). Qian represents heaven, yang; Kun represents earth, yin. Yin and yang interact, above and below communicate, heaven and earth connect, and all things flourish. Conversely, misfortune results when all things are in opposition, transforming, flourishing to decline, and declining to flourish again. Therefore, adapting to the times brings peace (harmony).

lines.explanation: When pulling up grass, the roots come with it. Undertakings bring good fortune.

image.text: Pulling up grass brings good fortune in undertakings because one's intent is directed outward.
image.explanation: Pulling up grass by the roots, thoroughly conquering the enemy, is fortunate. This shows the intent to subjugate enemy states.

lines.white_explanation: Pulling up grass by the roots, along with others of its kind. Conquering enemies is fortunate.

lines.explanation: Embracing the uncultivated, fording the river, not neglecting those far away, not abandoning companions. One attains the middle path.

image.text: Embracing the uncultivated and attaining the middle path shows magnanimity.
image.explanation: This person has great capacity and is highly appreciated by like-minded people, because they are upright and magnanimous.

lines.white_explanation: Using a hollowed-out gourd tied to the body to cross the river prevents sinking. Money is lost, but help is received along the journey.

lines.explanation: No plain without a slope, no going without a return. In hardship, perseverance brings no blame. Do not worry about trustworthiness; there is blessing in food.

image.text: No going without return is the law of heaven and earth.
image.explanation: Departure guarantees a return—this is the law of heaven and earth.

lines.white_explanation: Flat ground will eventually become sloped, departure guarantees a return. When divining about difficult matters, the signs show one can overcome hardship. Don't worry about being captured, and there will even be good fortune in food.

lines.explanation: Fluttering, not enriching one's neighbors, not warning but remaining trustful.

image.text: Fluttering and not enriching, all lack substance. Not warning but remaining trustful comes from the heart's wishes.
image.explanation: Using clever words to deceive others brings disaster to neighboring states, meaning all suffer losses. Not being on guard and being captured shows too much good faith.

lines.white_explanation: Using clever words to deceive will bring disaster to neighboring states; failing to be on guard will lead to capture.

lines.explanation: Emperor Yi gave his daughter in marriage. This brought supreme good fortune.

image.text: The supreme good fortune comes from acting according to the central way.
image.explanation: Receiving blessing and great good fortune occurs because Six in the Fifth Place occupies a central position in the upper trigram, like a person acting according to the central, correct way—what one does will succeed.

lines.white_explanation: Emperor Yi of the Shang dynasty gave his daughter in marriage to King Wen of Zhou, bringing blessing and great good fortune.

lines.explanation: The city wall falls back into the moat. Do not use troops. Issue orders from the city. Perseverance brings humiliation.

image.text: The city wall falls back into the moat; the orders are confused.
image.explanation: The city wall is breached and collapses into the moat (one should seize the opportunity to attack, but instead the order is to stop the advance). This is because the orders from the city are confused.

lines.white_explanation: The city wall is breached and collapses into the moat. 'Stop the attack,' comes the order from the city. Divination shows an inauspicious sign.

daxiang: The yin and yang energies of heaven and earth interact, creating harmony above and below with unimpeded flow.
fortune: All affairs are fortunate and smooth. Success comes from internal seeking rather than external seeking. Beware that extreme joy can lead to sorrow.
career: Adhere to the principle of starting small and progressing gradually. Your career has reached a smooth state, but you should proceed carefully, prepare for difficulties while in safety, and actively seek and develop new ventures to continue advancing. If you become complacent and do not seek progress, failure will result.
business: Smooth. Pay attention to market trends and develop new areas for competition. To this end, work closely with others and seek help from all sides, but remain humble and cautious, and beware of smooth-talking, superficially charming people.
fame: You have the conditions for success, but must work harder and pursue diligently. The greatest danger is being too clever for your own good.
love: A beautiful marriage. When dating, however, take it seriously.
advice: Fortunate in all ways. You adapt well and can succeed in various enterprises. You can plan and decide wisely, excel in interpersonal relationships, and can unite others to create achievements. You are flexible and adaptable to changing situations, constantly advancing into new areas. But in life's journey you must be cautious and diligent. Don't become complacent, and be careful in choosing friends, guarding against unfortunate reversal caused by petty people.
health: Exercise appropriately.

name: Pi

kingWen.explanation: Pi is not for men. It does not benefit the noble one's perseverance. The great departs and the small comes.

image.text: Heaven and earth do not interact, Pi. The noble person preserves virtue to avoid difficulties, and should not be tempted by wealth and honor.
image.explanation: Heaven and earth do not interact, Pi. The noble person preserves virtue to avoid difficulties, and should not be tempted by wealth and honor.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by the superimposition of opposite trigrams (lower Kun, upper Qian), with a structure opposite to the Tai hexagram, representing yang energy rising and yin energy falling, heaven and earth not interacting, all things not flowing. They are 'complementary hexagrams,' indicating that extreme prosperity leads to stagnation, and extreme stagnation leads to prosperity, forming a cause-and-effect relationship.

lines.explanation: Pulling out the cogongrass with its roots, gathering those of the same kind. Perseverance brings good fortune and success.

image.text: Pulling out cogongrass brings good fortune with perseverance, as one's aspiration is to serve the ruler.
image.explanation: Pulling out cogongrass by its roots; this line indicates good fortune, symbolizing the intention to clear away harmful influences around the ruler and serve the country loyally.

lines.white_explanation: Pulling out cogongrass by its roots along with others of its kind. This line indicates good fortune and success.

lines.explanation: Receiving with acceptance. Good fortune for the small person; for the great person, stagnation but eventual success.

image.text: For the great person, success in stagnation means not disrupting the community.
image.explanation: When the noble person is in difficult circumstances, they can maintain discipline and keep to their position.

lines.white_explanation: Having meat in the kitchen is good fortune for common people, but for the noble person, it is not a sign of prosperity.

lines.explanation: Bearing shame.

image.text: Bearing shame, the position is not appropriate.
image.explanation: Feeling ashamed because one's talents and virtue are not equal to one's position.

lines.white_explanation: There are delicacies in the kitchen.

lines.explanation: Having a mandate brings no blame. Companions enjoy blessings.

image.text: Having a mandate brings no blame, as aspirations are fulfilled.
image.explanation: The king issues rewards, there is no disaster, showing that the king rewards merit, subjects serve effectively, and each fulfills their purpose.

lines.white_explanation: The king issues rewards with no disaster. Who will receive these rewards?

lines.explanation: Stopping stagnation, good fortune for the great person. 'It perishes, it perishes', tied to a cluster of mulberry shoots.

image.text: The good fortune of the great person is due to the correct position.
image.explanation: Line 5 yang speaks of nobles and princes who find good fortune by not forgetting danger even in safety. Because line 5 is in the central position of the upper trigram, it symbolizes one who worries about the country and ruler, with talents and virtues appropriate to their position.

lines.white_explanation: Warning of collapse, nobles and princes who maintain this mindset find good fortune. Danger! Danger! The nation's fate seems to hang from the frail shoots of reeds and mulberry branches.

lines.explanation: Overturning the stagnation, first stagnation, later joy.

image.text: When stagnation ends, it overturns. How can it last?
image.explanation: Bad luck is ending, good fortune is not far away. At the turning point of fate, what force can stop it?

lines.white_explanation: A brief period of bad luck; first encountering misfortune, then experiencing good fortune.

daxiang: Heaven's energy rises, earth's energy descends, heaven and earth do not interact, symbolizing blockage and obstruction.
fortune: Disharmony between superiors and subordinates, nothing flows smoothly. In all matters patience is needed, knowing that extreme stagnation leads to prosperity.
career: In adverse circumstances, your career is in decline with many difficulties. Interference from petty people prevents you from fulfilling your ambitions, bringing many setbacks. You should adhere to the right path, avoid cooperating with petty people, unite with like-minded individuals, and protect yourself while waiting for opportunities. Maintain self-confidence, be cautious and fearful, as conditions will improve and your career will eventually succeed.
business: You face strong competitors and are at a disadvantage. Poor information leads to significant losses. You should be extremely careful, maintain a defensive posture, and wait for favorable opportunities to develop your marketing business.
fame: Conditions are not yet mature; continue your efforts for some time and with the help of others, your ideals can be realized.
love: Complications and even setbacks or changes may easily occur, but if both parties remain confident, a good outcome will appear.
advice: You are intelligent, shrewd, and hardworking, but don't pay attention to interpersonal relationships, and with the exclusion by petty people, your fortune may suffer adversity. With strong will and fighting spirit, you have overcome shortcomings, and although the price paid is high, you will achieve your career goals.
health: Blood and energy circulation is poor; dietary moderation is recommended.

name: Tong Ren

kingWen.explanation: Fellowship in the wilderness, success. It is beneficial to cross the great river. Beneficial for the superior person to be steadfast.

image.text: Heaven and fire, Fellowship; The superior person distinguishes things according to their kinds and classes.
image.explanation: Heaven and fire, Fellowship; The superior person distinguishes things according to their kinds and classes.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by the trigrams (lower Li above upper Qian) superimposed. Qian represents heaven, the ruler; Li represents fire, the ministers and common people. Upper heaven and lower fire, with fire's nature rising upward, unite with heaven. Harmony between above and below, sharing the same boat, harmonious interpersonal relationships, great fellowship under heaven.

lines.explanation: Fellowship at the gate, no blame.

image.text: Going out the gate to find fellowship, who is there to blame?
image.explanation: When the king steps outside the royal gate to mingle with the people, who would suffer misfortune?

lines.white_explanation: Gathering the masses at the royal gate, about to undertake great affairs, no misfortune.

lines.explanation: Fellowship with one's clan, humiliation.

image.text: Fellowship with one's clan, a narrow way.
image.explanation: Merely gathering with one's clan at the ancestral temple is a narrow principle of clan law.

lines.white_explanation: Gathering with one's clan at the ancestral temple, divining about fortune or misfortune because difficulties lie ahead.

lines.explanation: Hiding weapons in the thick grass, ascending the high hill, for three years one does not rise to action.

image.text: Hiding weapons in the thick grass, the enemy is strong. Not rising to action for three years, how can one accomplish anything?
image.explanation: Concealing troops in the dense forests and mountains because the enemy is too powerful. Unable to achieve victory over a long period, how can anything be accomplished?

lines.white_explanation: Concealing troops in the dense forests and mountains, and occupying the high ground, but unable to achieve victory over a long period.

lines.explanation: Mounting the city wall, unable to attack successfully. Good fortune.

image.text: Mounting the city wall, righteously unable to succeed. The good fortune comes from reversing the situation when in difficulty.
image.explanation: Climbing the enemy's city wall, from the perspective of righteousness one should stop attacking. Continuing the attack is fortunate because the besieged enemy might resort to trickery.

lines.white_explanation: Having climbed the enemy's city wall, but not yet captured the city, continuing the attack will bring victory.

lines.explanation: Fellowship: first wailing and then laughing. The great army succeeds in meeting.

image.text: The vanguard of fellowship, being centered and upright. The great armies meet, meaning they overcome each other.
image.explanation: The gathered masses first cry and then laugh (the battle turns from defeat to victory) because when this line is obtained, the nine in fifth place occupies the middle position of the upper trigram, like a person who has found the correct way, who will surely turn misfortune into good fortune. The armies meeting means our forces have overwhelmed the enemy.

lines.white_explanation: The gathered masses first wail and then rejoice, because the army arrives with timely reinforcements and achieves a great victory.

lines.explanation: Fellowship in the suburbs, no regrets.

image.text: Fellowship in the suburbs, one's aims are not yet fulfilled.
image.explanation: Gathering people in the suburbs, support is not widespread, one is not yet able to fulfill one's ambitions.

lines.white_explanation: Gathering people in the suburbs, making sacrifices to the spirits to celebrate victory, naturally there are no regrets.

daxiang: When two people are of one mind, their sharpness can cut through metal. The superior person maintains a proper heart and sincere intentions, symbolizing harmony with others.
fortune: Auspicious and favorable, working together with others, harmony between superiors and subordinates, and receiving promotion from elders.
career: Smooth and peaceful, especially successful in cooperation with others. It is advantageous to develop extensive interpersonal activities, establish broad connections, overcome narrow sectarianism, consider the interests of all parties, seek common ground while reserving differences, and adhere to correct principles to achieve great undertakings.
business: Conduct business with sincere cooperation and solidarity with colleagues, compete fairly, and you will surely obtain your deserved benefits.
fame: You must work hard yourself, and especially seek guidance and help from teachers and like-minded friends. With humility and initiative, you can fully achieve your goals.
love: Passionate and sociable, with many friends of the opposite sex, so careful selection is needed, with attention to maintaining the relationship between both parties and family harmony.
advice: With an open and optimistic personality, warm-hearted, good interpersonal relationships, and strong social skills, you should be good at cooperating with others, especially in coordinating various relationships. Have principles, fight against unhealthy trends, be courageous, dare to act, possess a spirit of self-sacrifice, and have leadership ability, suitable for taking on certain responsibilities.
health: Symptoms of dryness and heat, seek a good doctor.

name: Da You

kingWen.explanation: Supreme success.

image.text: Fire in the sky, Great Possession. The superior person restrains evil and promotes good, following heaven's blessings.
image.explanation: Fire in the sky, Great Possession. The superior person restrains evil and promotes good, following heaven's blessings.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by the combination of two trigrams (lower Qian above Li). The upper trigram is Li, representing fire; the lower trigram is Qian, representing heaven. Fire in the sky illuminates everything, people submit to its authority, following the ways of heaven and timing, achieving great accomplishments.

lines.explanation: No mutual harm, no blame; in difficulty, still no blame.

image.text: Great Possession's initial nine, no mutual harm.
image.explanation: Great Possession's initial nine line says, do not harm one another.

lines.white_explanation: Do not harm one another, then there will be no misfortune. Even in difficult circumstances, there will be no misfortune.

lines.text: Nine in the second place statement
lines.explanation: A great wagon for carrying, there is somewhere to go, no blame.

image.text: A great wagon for carrying, accumulation in the middle will not fail.
image.explanation: Using a large wagon to carry people and goods, things accumulated in the wagon will not be lost.

lines.white_explanation: Using a large wagon to carry people and goods, having a clear destination, there is no misfortune.

lines.text: Nine in the third place statement
lines.explanation: The prince presents an offering to the Son of Heaven, petty people cannot do this.

image.text: The prince presents an offering to the Son of Heaven, petty people would cause harm.
image.explanation: The Son of Heaven feasts the princes and dukes, (small people cannot participate) because when petty people participate in state affairs, it will bring misfortune to the country.

lines.white_explanation: The Son of Heaven feasts the princes and dukes. Small people cannot participate.

lines.text: Nine in the fourth place statement
lines.explanation: Not his arrogance, no blame.

image.text: Not his arrogance, no blame, clear discernment.
image.explanation: Opposing bad people and bad deeds brings no misfortune, because of clear examination and analysis.

lines.white_explanation: Using sun exposure on male shamans to pray for rain; the drought is severe, but there is no misfortune.

lines.text: Six in the fifth place statement
lines.explanation: Sincerity in relationships, inspiring awe, good fortune.

image.text: Sincerity in relationships, using honesty to express one's intentions; the good fortune of inspiring awe is that it brings ease without need for preparation.
image.explanation: This person is honest and open, because he uses sincerity to express his aspirations. The good fortune of commanding respect comes from people's reverence, allowing for peace without exhaustion.

lines.white_explanation: Invading enemies are tightly bound, severely punished, bringing good fortune.

lines.explanation: Blessed by Heaven, good fortune, everything is favorable.

image.text: Great Possession brings great good fortune, blessed by Heaven.
image.explanation: Great Possession is a hexagram of great good fortune, because it receives Heaven's blessing.

lines.white_explanation: Heaven's blessing, good fortune, nothing unfavorable.

daxiang: The sun in the sky shines upon all things on earth, but with five yang lines contending with one yin, one must know that fullness leads to emptiness.
fortune: Timely and fortunate, prosperous and greatly auspicious, but beware that extreme prosperity leads to decline, and extreme success breeds failure.
career: Career has already achieved certain success; the greatest danger is becoming complacent and acting recklessly. One must stop evil and promote good, adhere to moderation, associate with upright friends, remain cautious and diligent, truly achieving greatness without overflowing, fullness without excess, and the career can be expected to reach new heights.
business: Flourishing and prosperous, having overcome difficult conditions and entered a stage of prosperity. If one can control greed, uphold principles of integrity, treat others fairly, work diligently and frugally, and especially pay attention to market trends at all times, adapting when appropriate, long-term success can be expected.
fame: Already achieved some fame, but must not be satisfied with this and stop progressing. Especially must not fall into worldly circles; should continue to work hard, and with the help of true friends, climb to the next level.
love: Conditions are favorable, with many choices available, but caution is advisable. Both parties should work to maintain the family.
advice: Strong character, brave in overcoming difficulties, striving upward. There are many difficulties and misfortunes on the path forward; only by taking them seriously can one continue to succeed. If vigilance is relaxed and pride takes over, it will bring disastrous failure. Many friends and broad social connections are helpful for career, but among them there are also saboteurs.
health: Rising internal fire, seek careful treatment.

name: Qian

kingWen.explanation: Success, the superior person has an end.

image.text: Within the earth there is a mountain, Humility. The superior person reduces excess to benefit the deficient, weighing things to distribute them evenly.
image.explanation: Within the earth there is a mountain, Humility. The superior person reduces excess to benefit the deficient, weighing things to distribute them evenly.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by the combination of two trigrams (lower Gen above Kun), Gen for mountain, Kun for earth. The ground has mountains, the earth is low while the mountain is high, representing internal height with external lowliness, symbolizing those who have great achievements but don't boast, have high reputation but don't praise themselves, have high position but aren't arrogant. This is humility.

lines.explanation: A humble and modest superior person, crossing a great river brings good fortune.

image.text: A humble and modest superior person, using humility for self-cultivation.
image.explanation: An extremely humble superior person begins self-cultivation through humility.

lines.white_explanation: Humble, and more humble, this is the bearing of a superior person. Possessing this virtue, even the risk of crossing a river is auspicious.

lines.text: Six in the second place statement
lines.explanation: Expressing humility, good fortune.

image.text: Expressing humility brings good fortune, the heart achieves moderation.
image.explanation: Wise and humble, righteous in heart and fortunate, because the six in second position occupies the middle position of the lower trigram, like a person who follows the path of moderation.

lines.white_explanation: Wise and humble, the divination brings an auspicious sign.

lines.text: Nine in the third place statement
lines.explanation: A hardworking and humble superior person has a good outcome, good fortune.

image.text: A hardworking and humble superior person, all people submit to him.
image.explanation: A hardworking and humble superior person commands the respect of all people.

lines.white_explanation: Hardworking and humble, such a person will have a good outcome, and all things will be favorable.

lines.text: Six in the fourth place statement
lines.explanation: Nothing is unfavorable, shining in humility.

image.text: Nothing is unfavorable, shining in humility, not violating principles.
image.explanation: Everything is favorable, as long as one moves forward bravely while remaining humble and cautious, because this way one will not violate principles.

lines.white_explanation: Everything is favorable, as long as one moves forward bravely while remaining humble and cautious.

lines.text: Six in the fifth place statement
lines.explanation: Not enriched by neighbors, advantageous to use invasion and attack, nothing is unfavorable.

image.text: Advantageous to use invasion and attack, to conquer those who do not submit.
image.explanation: This oracle is favorable for military campaigns because it is about conquering those who do not submit to the king's command.

lines.white_explanation: Poverty is due to the invasion and plunder of enemy states, they should be attacked, and all will be favorable.

lines.explanation: Proclaiming humility, advantageous to use the army to attack cities and states.

image.text: Proclaiming humility, aspirations not yet achieved; can use the army to attack cities and states.
image.explanation: Wise and humble, yet unable to transform the city-states to achieve one's goals, so one can send troops to conquer those city-states.

lines.white_explanation: Wise and humble, sending troops to conquer city-states will naturally bring victory.

daxiang: Mountains should be on the earth's surface, but now are below ground, representing the virtue of humility.
fortune: Auspicious and peaceful. The future is limitless, but arrogance must be eliminated.
career: Not yet appreciated by others, but because of noble character, will eventually be discovered. One need not deliberately show off, especially must not abandon the virtue of humility, but work hard in obscurity, and will certainly receive help from others, achieving greatly in career.
business: Rather smooth, but will not yield sudden profits, must accumulate gradually, so should be extremely careful and prudent, sincerely cooperate with others, follow business ethics, and through one's own diligent effort, achieve business development.
fame: Naturally intelligent, but because of a character that doesn't showcase oneself, often initially overlooked. As long as one doesn't get discouraged, continues to work hard studying the profession, and maintains a humble and studious spirit, greater success lies in the future.
love: A beautiful marriage should be worked for by both parties. Otherwise, romance will not succeed, and family cannot be harmonious.
advice: Possessing the humble virtue of internal height and external lowliness, good at uniting with others, also able to receive help from others, career is very smooth, when encountering difficulties, can quickly turn danger into safety, with scares but no real danger. Because of being able to seriously learn from others' strengths, progress is rapid, will proceed without obstruction, but need to pay special attention to studies, virtue, and self-cultivation.
health: Symptoms of internal depression, open your mind and heart.

name: Yu

kingWen.explanation: Favorable for establishing lords and deploying armies.

image.text: Thunder emerges from the earth with force, Yu. The ancient kings created music to honor virtue, offering it abundantly to God above, to accompany their ancestors.
image.explanation: Thunder emerges from the earth with force, Yu. The ancient kings created music to honor virtue, offering it abundantly to God above, to accompany their ancestors.

traditional.description: This hexagram consists of different trigrams (Earth below, Thunder above). Kun represents earth and compliance; Zhen represents thunder and movement. Thunder arrives at the proper time, indicating spring's return to earth. Movement that follows compliance is the source of harmony and joy. This hexagram is the inverse complement of the Humility hexagram, with interactive effects.

lines.explanation: Proclaiming pleasure, misfortune.

image.text: The initial six proclaims pleasure, indicating misfortune from exhausted will.
image.explanation: The initial six line speaks of indulging excessively in pleasure, which will inevitably lead to weakened will and personal downfall.

lines.white_explanation: Enthusiastically pursuing debauchery and excessive pleasure leads to misfortune.

lines.explanation: Wedged between rocks, but not for a full day, good fortune if steadfast.

image.text: Not for a full day, good fortune if steadfast, because of central correctness.
image.explanation: Hardship lasts less than a day before resolution; divination shows good fortune because the six in the second place occupies a central position in the lower trigram, symbolizing following the proper middle path.

lines.white_explanation: Caught in a rock crevice, fortunately rescued before a day passes. The oracle shows good fortune.

lines.explanation: Gazing with pleasure, regret. Delay brings regret.

image.text: Gazing with pleasure brings regret, as the position is inappropriate.
image.explanation: Idle pleasure-seeking will lead to regret because the six in the third place is a yin line in a yang position, indicating improper placement, like someone whose actions don't match their position.

lines.white_explanation: Idle pleasure-seeking will bring regret; coupled with carelessness and procrastination, the regret will be beyond remedy.

lines.explanation: Seeking pleasure brings great gain. Have no doubts. Friends gather together.

image.text: Seeking pleasure brings great gain when great ambitions are realized.
image.explanation: Hunting for pleasure yields abundant game, indicating substantial acquisition and wishes fulfilled.
