lines.white_explanation: Hunting for pleasure yields abundant game. When encountering this line, do not doubt that friends are gossiping about you.

lines.explanation: Steadfastness in illness, one will not die.

image.text: Six in the fifth place indicates steadfastness in illness due to riding atop strength. Not dying for long indicates the center has not perished.
image.explanation: The six in the fifth place speaks of illness because it's a yin line above the yang line of nine in the fourth, violating the principle of yielding mounting firmness. 'Not dying for a long time' is because the six in the fifth place occupies the central position of the upper trigram, representing the correct position for survival.

lines.white_explanation: When divining about illness, one will not die for a long time.

lines.explanation: Blind pleasure, completion brings change, no blame.

image.text: Blind pleasure at the top, how can it last?
image.explanation: Still seeking pleasure as the end approaches; how can this position last?

lines.white_explanation: Still seeking pleasure as the end approaches; what has been accomplished will soon decay.

daxiang: Thunder emerges above the earth, yang energy is stirring, all things flourish vigorously.
fortune: Contentment and peace, potential assistance from elders, but beware of romantic entanglements; always be prepared for challenges.
career: Extremely favorable, with potential for success in career, but must remain realistic, follow trends, and continue personal effort. Establish long-term vision, especially avoiding laziness and pleasure-seeking despite favorable circumstances. Otherwise, regret will be inevitable.
business: The right time has come; act boldly. Even if setbacks occur, you can quickly turn danger into safety. Strengthen cooperation with others, be open and honest, and jointly develop your enterprise.
fame: With natural intelligence, if you can uphold moral integrity, demand excellence from yourself, strive for progress, and remain humble despite achievements rather than becoming complacent, you will certainly achieve major success.
love: Extremely favorable, with lifelong smoothness and good fortune, but never become careless, and never trifle with emotions, or tragedy may result.
advice: Life will be smooth, without major setbacks, and you'll readily obtain what you deserve. But the key lies in your own effort and struggle—don't indulge in comfort or let material pleasures weaken your will. Being open-minded and magnanimous will benefit health and longevity. If unexpected disasters occur, as long as you constantly demand excellence from yourself, maintain purity, remember caution even in pleasure, and prepare for danger in times of peace, you can turn danger into safety.
health: Prayer and peace of mind.

name: Sui

kingWen.explanation: Supreme success. Beneficial to be steadfast. No blame.

image.text: Thunder within the lake, Following. The superior person at dusk enters into rest and relaxation.
image.explanation: Thunder within the lake, Following. The superior person at dusk enters into rest and relaxation.

traditional.description: This hexagram consists of different trigrams (Thunder below, Lake above). Zhen represents thunder and movement; Dui represents pleasure. Movement with pleasure is 'following.' Following indicates mutual compliance—one follows things, and things follow oneself—creating mutual communication. Following must adhere to the timing and situation, with principles and conditions, with steadfastness as the prerequisite.

lines.explanation: Officials experience change, steadfastness brings good fortune. Going out the door brings successful interactions.

image.text: Officials experience change, following correctness brings good fortune; going out the door brings successful interactions, nothing is lost.
image.explanation: Officials have mishandled affairs; returning to the right path brings good fortune. Going out and traveling together brings benefits to all—this is the result of not deviating from the proper way.

lines.white_explanation: An incident occurs at the guesthouse; if you encounter this line, good fortune follows, and going out to interact with others brings mutual benefit.

lines.explanation: Adhering to the child, losing the mature man.

image.text: Adhering to the child means not gaining both.
image.explanation: Catching the small one but losing the big one means one cannot have both.

lines.white_explanation: Capturing the underage slave but losing the adult slave.

lines.explanation: Adhering to the mature man, losing the child. By following and seeking, one obtains. It is beneficial to remain steadfast.

image.text: Adhering to the mature man shows determination to abandon the lesser.
image.explanation: Catching the big one but losing the small one means the intention is to pursue the greater and abandon the lesser.

lines.white_explanation: Capturing the adult slave but losing the underage slave. Hope without loss is better than having now. Encountering this line, divination about residence brings good fortune.

lines.explanation: Following brings gains, steadfastness brings misfortune. Having sincerity on the path brings clarity. What blame could there be?

image.text: Following brings gains, meaning misfortune by principle. Having sincerity on the path means achievements with clarity.
image.explanation: Pursuing fame and profit, greedily seeking gains—such people rightly face misfortune. Keeping one's word and strictly adhering to the right path is the result of clear understanding of achievement.

lines.white_explanation: Pursuing fame and profit, greedily seeking gains; divination shows an omen of misfortune. Escorting prisoners on the road with clear constraints brings no disaster.

lines.explanation: Sincerity in excellence, good fortune.

image.text: Sincerity in excellence brings good fortune, from correct central position.
image.explanation: Maintaining the way of central correctness brings good fortune in all things, because the nine in the fifth place occupies the central position in the upper trigram, like someone who maintains the middle way.

lines.white_explanation: Capturing many excellent people brings good fortune.

lines.explanation: Bind and restrain them, then lead them with ropes; the king makes offerings at the Western Mountain.

image.text: Bind and restrain them at the extreme.
image.explanation: Being bound and detained because the six at the top is at the end of the hexagram, like someone in a desperate situation.

lines.white_explanation: Detaining prisoners, binding them tightly; King Wen uses them as human sacrifices to worship spirits at the Western Mountain.

daxiang: The zhen wood is under the dui lake; wood must follow water's drift. Following means compliance.
fortune: A favorable sign of departing from the old and welcoming the new. Cooperating with others will bring substantial profit. Avoid being indecisive or acting independently.
career: With correct assessment of society and life, valuing interpersonal relationships, and skillfully collaborating with others, your career will be very smooth. To ensure further success, avoid pursuing small profits, learn from those better than yourself, choose good examples to follow, maintain sincerity and trust, and work hard to develop your career.
business: Favorable. Through sincere cooperation with others, you can achieve your intended goals. In competition, maintain a clear mind, consider matters from a broad, long-term perspective, observe business ethics, and maintain a sincere attitude toward customers and peers to maintain competitive advantage.
fame: On the foundation of your own hard study, humbly learn from talented and virtuous teachers, leverage external forces to promote faster progress, and realize your personal ideals.
love: Success comes when both parties feel compatible; family harmony results, but if one becomes obsessed with romance, it will affect both parties' careers—this must be noted.
advice: Personal growth may not be entirely smooth, but due to humility and agreeableness, interpersonal relationships are good, especially gaining the appreciation of elders. All things can succeed with others' help and care. But be mindful that following others requires proper stance and principles; do not flatter power and authority, which brings misfortune.
health: Rest is advisable; prison disaster.

name: Gu

kingWen.explanation: Supreme success, favorable to cross the great river. Three days before the jiazi day, three days after the jiazi day.

image.text: Wind under the mountain, Gu. The superior person inspires the people and nurtures virtue.
image.explanation: Wind under the mountain, Gu. The superior person inspires the people and nurtures virtue.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by two trigrams (lower Xun, upper Gen), mutually complementary with the Sui hexagram. Gu originally means affair, extended to mean numerous affairs or chaos. When vessels are unused for a long time and grow worms, it's called 'gu', symbolizing that when the world is peaceful for too long, it becomes stagnant and corrupt, requiring innovation, governance, and reorganization to rescue from crisis and revitalize affairs.

lines.explanation: Dealing with the decay left by the father. If there is a son, no blame on the deceased father. Dangerous at first, but good fortune in the end.

image.text: Dealing with the decay left by the father, meaning to carry on the father's will.
image.explanation: Inheriting the father's business means continuing the father's aspirations.

lines.white_explanation: Inheriting the father's business, with a filial son, brings no disaster; even if danger is encountered, the end will be favorable.

lines.explanation: Dealing with the decay left by the mother. One should not be too persistent.

image.text: Dealing with the decay left by the mother, following the middle path.
image.explanation: Inheriting the mother's business, with line nine in the second position of the lower trigram, the line symbol shows one who follows the middle way.

lines.white_explanation: Inheriting the mother's business, fortune cannot be divined.

lines.explanation: Dealing with the decay left by the father. Some minor regret, no serious blame.

image.text: Dealing with the decay left by the father, in the end there will be no blame.
image.explanation: Inheriting the father's business, ultimately there will be no disaster.

lines.white_explanation: Inheriting the father's business, even if there are minor mistakes, no major problems will arise.

lines.explanation: Tolerance in dealing with decay left by the father, continuing with difficulty.

image.text: Tolerance in dealing with the father's decay, progress has not been achieved.
image.explanation: Expanding the father's business (with great difficulty), implementation has not been fully appropriate.

lines.white_explanation: Expanding the father's business, implementation is fraught with difficulties.

lines.explanation: Dealing with the decay left by the father, praised.

image.text: Dealing with the decay left by the father, inheriting his virtue.
image.explanation: Inheriting the father's business and gaining praise, because of inheriting the father's fine virtues.

lines.white_explanation: Inheriting the father's business, earning praise.

lines.explanation: Not serving kings and nobles, setting one's mind on higher things.

image.text: Not serving kings and nobles, a purpose that can be followed.
image.explanation: Not serving kings and nobles, this kind of aspiration can be emulated.

lines.white_explanation: Not serving kings and nobles, because this person values their own worth.

daxiang: Wind enters below the mountain without exiting, causing objects to rot and breed insects; when energy doesn't flow, stagnation leads to failure.
fortune: Things are not going well, difficulties and confusion abound. Bold innovation is needed, otherwise internal troubles and external threats will arise.
career: Fortune is in an unfavorable state, either due to external conditions or personal factors. Only by carefully analyzing the causes, identifying the problems, and resolutely and boldly overcoming obstacles, even at risk, can success be achieved. At this time, one needs both a cool head and guidance from wise people to create achievements.
business: Many disadvantages are troubling you; it's not advisable to continue on the old path. You should comprehensively analyze market trends and decisively find another way out.
fame: You will encounter many difficulties and disadvantages, which should be seen as tests. Continue to struggle with a hundred times more courage. Meanwhile, humbly look for your own shortcomings and remedy them.
love: Not smooth. If both parties are compatible, then they should do their best to promote this matter; couples should work together to maintain the family.
advice: Born at the wrong time, family or career shows signs of decline, the individual is in a time of many troubles. Only by facing reality, working diligently, persevering, and taking action, even at risk, can you save the declining situation. Sometimes, patience is needed to wait for an opportunity.
health: Symptoms of poisoning, beware of curses.

name: Lin

kingWen.explanation: Supreme success. Favorable for determination. Reaching the eighth month brings misfortune.

image.text: The earth above the lake: Lin. The superior person teaches inexhaustibly and protects the people boundlessly.
image.explanation: The earth above the lake: Lin. The superior person teaches inexhaustibly and protects the people boundlessly.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by two trigrams (lower Dui, upper Kun). Kun represents earth, Dui represents lake; the earth is higher than the lake, the lake is contained within the earth. It symbolizes the ruler personally overseeing the country, governing the nation and pacifying the state, with harmony between high and low.

lines.explanation: Joint approach. Determination brings good fortune.

image.text: Joint approach with determination brings good fortune, because the purpose and action are upright.
image.explanation: Governing the people with inspirational policies, following the correct principles, naturally brings good fortune, because one's intentions are upright and one's style is proper.

lines.white_explanation: Governing the people with inspirational policies. Divination shows good fortune.

lines.explanation: Joint approach. Good fortune, nothing is unfavorable.

image.text: Joint approach, good fortune with nothing unfavorable, because the people have not yet been tamed to obey.
image.explanation: Using gentle policies to govern the people brings good fortune and everything is favorable, because the people have not yet been tamed to obey.

lines.white_explanation: Using gentle policies to govern the people brings good fortune; everything is favorable.

lines.explanation: Pleasant approach. Nothing is gained. If one becomes anxious about it, no blame.

image.text: Pleasant approach, position is not appropriate. If one becomes anxious about it, blame will not last.
image.explanation: Using oppressive policies to govern the people, just as the yin line in the third position should not occupy a yang position, such a ruler is not a qualified monarch. If there is worry and regret, the disaster can be eliminated.

lines.white_explanation: Using oppressive policies to govern the people brings no benefit. If there is worry and regret, disaster can be eliminated.

lines.explanation: Great approach. No blame.

image.text: Great approach without blame, because the position is proper.
image.explanation: Personally governing the nation and the people brings no harm, just as the yin line in the fourth position occupies a yin position. Such a king is a qualified king.

lines.white_explanation: Personally governing the nation and the people brings no harm.

lines.explanation: Wise approach. This is appropriate for a great prince. Good fortune.

image.text: What is appropriate for a great prince means acting in accordance with the middle way.
image.explanation: Having the bearing of a king, because the line six in the fifth position occupies the middle position of the upper trigram, symbolizing a person who acts according to the middle way.

lines.white_explanation: Governing with wisdom, having the bearing of a king, naturally brings good fortune.

lines.explanation: Generous approach. Good fortune. No blame.

image.text: The good fortune of the generous approach, because the intention is within.
image.explanation: Governing the people with generosity brings good fortune, because the intention of honesty and sincerity exists in the heart.

lines.white_explanation: Governing the people with generosity brings good fortune, naturally without disaster.

daxiang: Lake water irrigates the earth's myriad things, complementing each other in endless generation.
fortune: All things are going smoothly, high and low are in harmony, the future is promising, but excessive haste should be avoided.
career: This is an excellent time for success, one must seize it and not miss the opportunity. However, one should not be satisfied with this, as good fortune will quickly disappear. Long-term planning is necessary, summarizing experiences and uniting with others to jointly develop new fields.
business: Will be very smooth and rewarding, but one must constantly pay attention to market trends, be diligent and cautious, prevent unexpected incidents, and especially handle interpersonal relationships properly.
fame: Your efforts have reached the harvest season; you should be more modest, demand strict standards of yourself, and carefully achieve your goals. Unexpected events may occur, which should be dealt with calmly and resolutely; excessive weakness will result in lost opportunities.
love: Proceed quickly, go all out, both parties treat each other with sincerity, resulting in happiness and harmony.
advice: Having a flexible mind, being good at interacting with others, having your own opinions, and possessing leadership abilities. You must strengthen your overall self-cultivation, treat people with sincerity and honesty, establish a good personal prestige, and especially have a far-sighted vision and long-term plans, which can guarantee the prosperity of your career and a bright future.
health: Lingering illness, but not dangerous.

name: Guan

kingWen.explanation: Washing but not making offerings, having sincerity and reverence.

image.text: Wind moving over the earth is Observation. The ancient kings traveled to observe the people and establish education.
image.explanation: Wind moving over the earth is Observation. The ancient kings traveled to observe the people and establish education.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by the trigrams (lower Kun over upper Sun), wind moving over the earth, symbolizing widespread moral teaching. Guan and Lin hexagrams are complementary to each other. Those above observe the world with righteousness; those below look up with respect, and people's hearts submit and follow.

lines.explanation: Childish observation, no blame for the petty person, humiliation for the superior person.

image.text: The first six shows childish observation, which is the way of the petty person.
image.explanation: The first six speaks of foolish shortsightedness, which is the characteristic of petty people's thinking.

lines.white_explanation: Foolish shortsightedness is not harmful for ordinary people, but for superior people who bear political responsibility, it will lead to major mistakes.

lines.explanation: Peeking observation, beneficial for a woman's steadfastness.

image.text: A woman's steadfastness in peeking observation is still shameful.
image.explanation: A woman peeking at men, even if virtuous, is still shameful behavior.

lines.white_explanation: Limited by a narrow perspective, this is a favorable omen for women.

lines.explanation: Observing my life, advancing and retreating.

image.text: Observing my life's advances and retreats has not lost the way.
image.explanation: Observing the thoughts and intentions of one's clan to determine policies for governance—this does not lose the correct way of employing people and administering.

lines.white_explanation: Observing the thoughts and intentions of one's clan to determine policies for governance.

lines.explanation: Observing the glory of the state, advantageous to be a guest of the king.

image.text: Observing the glory of the state, still as a guest.
image.explanation: Observing the brilliant achievements and customs of the state, this one comes as a state guest.

lines.white_explanation: Observing the brilliant achievements and customs of the state. For this hexagram, it is advantageous to visit the king.

lines.explanation: Observing my life, the superior person is without fault.

image.text: Observing my life is observing the people.
image.explanation: Observing one's clan's intentions is to observe the intentions of all people under heaven.

lines.white_explanation: Being good at observing one's clan's intentions, the superior person can be without fault.

lines.explanation: Observing his life, the superior person is without fault.

image.text: Observing his life, the will is not yet settled.
image.explanation: Observing the intentions of other tribes is because the situation has not been fully understood, the mind is unsettled, and decisions are difficult to make.

lines.white_explanation: Observing the intentions of other tribes, the superior person can be without fault.

daxiang: Wind moving over the earth symbolizes traveling and observing. As yin grows and yang diminishes, the correct way declines and all things struggle to progress.
fortune: Being in the midst of change, one should observe carefully, endure mental and physical suffering, and beware of external temptations.
career: Signs of difficulties have appeared in one's career, so one must be humble and cautious, with a far-reaching vision. Avoid short-term behaviors, maintain an open mind, pay attention to interpersonal relationships, unite with others, and avoid impulsive actions. If necessary, it may be advisable to seek refuge with virtuous people for future development.
business: The market situation is unstable and in flux. One should be cautious, constantly observe trends, make long-term plans, and be prepared to retreat.
fame: Value self-awareness, humbly seek guidance from others, maintain a proper attitude toward life, especially avoid self-satisfaction. Uphold the middle way and righteousness, establish lofty ideals, and do not lose personal goals or deviate from the correct path.
love: Not going smoothly; both parties should withstand tests, make long-term plans, and there will be ideal results.
advice: Having organizational ability, suitable for responsible work, but life's journey has many twists and turns. One must develop foresight and observation skills, handle matters justly and realistically, pay attention to people's hearts, and care for others. Especially avoid falling into the ways of petty people and shortsighted behaviors. One should have decisiveness, not follow blindly, and when necessary, may adopt strategic attachments.
health: Rheumatism, should be treated with exercise.

name: Shi He

kingWen.explanation: Success. Advantageous to administer justice.

image.text: Thunder and lightning, Biting Through. The ancient kings clarified punishments and reinforced laws.
image.explanation: Thunder and lightning, Biting Through. The ancient kings clarified punishments and reinforced laws.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by the trigrams (lower Zhen over upper Li). Li is a yin trigram; Zhen is a yang trigram. Yin and yang interact, biting through hard objects, symbolizing the combined use of kindness and authority, leniency and strictness, softness and firmness. Shi He refers to the joining of the upper and lower jaws, chewing.

lines.explanation: His feet are held in the stocks, his toes are injured. No blame.

image.text: Feet in the stocks with injured toes, unable to walk.
image.explanation: Dragged with shackles, toes rubbed raw—a small punishment can serve as a big warning, preventing further wrongdoing.

lines.white_explanation: Dragged with shackles, toes rubbed raw, but without major disaster.

lines.explanation: Bites through tender meat, destroying the nose. No blame.

image.text: Biting through tender meat, destroying the nose, riding on firmness.
image.explanation: Eating fresh fish and tender meat, suffering the punishment of having one's nose cut off, because the six in the second position sits above a yang line, like someone enjoying benefits beyond their station.

lines.white_explanation: Eating fresh fish and tender meat, suffering the punishment of having one's nose cut off, but without great disaster.

lines.explanation: Bites on dried meat and encounters poison. Slight misfortune, no blame.

image.text: Encountering poison, the position is not correct.
image.explanation: Poisoned because the six in the third position is a yin line in a yang position, like someone not suited to their position.

lines.white_explanation: Eating preserved meat, getting poisoned. Encountered trouble, but not too serious.

lines.explanation: Bites on dried meat and finds a metal arrowhead. Advantageous to be firm in difficulty. Good fortune.

image.text: Advantageous to be firm in difficulty with good fortune, but the light has not yet arrived.
image.explanation: Divining about difficult matters results in good fortune, but currently still in difficulty, not yet entering a bright situation.

lines.white_explanation: Gnawing on bones, discovering a metal arrowhead inside. Divining about difficult matters results in good fortune.

lines.explanation: Bites on dried meat and finds yellow gold. Being steadfast even in danger, no blame.

image.text: Being steadfast in danger without blame, the position is correct.
image.explanation: Divination shows danger but ultimately there will be no disaster, because the six in the fifth position is in the middle position of the upper trigram, a position that is appropriate, allowing danger to turn into safety.

lines.white_explanation: Eating dried meat, finding a metal arrowhead. Divination shows danger, but ultimately there will be no disaster.

lines.explanation: Wearing the cangue, having his ears destroyed. Misfortune.

image.text: Wearing the cangue with ears destroyed, hearing without clarity.

daxiang: Between the upper and lower lips there is something that must be bitten through before they can close, symbolizing that all matters are obstructed and must be removed before success can be achieved.
fortune: All matters face obstacles, disputes are inevitable. One should adhere to norms, not be lured by profit, and problems can be resolved.
career: Difficulties and obstacles are very great. One should use strong will, resolute action, and an impartial attitude to overcome various misfortunes and strive for improvement. To quickly turn danger into safety, strong measures may be necessary, even resorting to legal means.
business: When in an unfavorable situation, keep a cool head, observe the situation clearly, seek opportunities, do not be tempted by small immediate profits, and do not pursue illegitimate wealth. Listen carefully to advice, obey laws and regulations, handle affairs impartially, avoid favoritism, and be vigilant against breaking the law.
fame: Your efforts are not yet recognized; do not rush for success. View setbacks as tests, persevere, and you will succeed.
love: Initial difficulties; tenacity is needed to achieve satisfactory results. Do not let personal emotions dictate family affairs.
advice: Life is not smooth; you will encounter setbacks and hardships, but view them as tests. Carefully summarize experiences and lessons, continue forward with stronger will and perseverance. After tempering, progress will be made in various aspects, eventually entering a bright situation and achieving significant accomplishments.
health: Beware of internal heat issues, lost items will not be recovered.

name: 賁卦

kingWen.explanation: 亨。小利有攸往。

image.text: 山下有火，賁。君子以明庶政，無敢折獄。
image.explanation: 山下有火，賁。君子以明庶政，無敢折獄。

traditional.description: 這個卦是異卦(下離上艮)相疊。離為火為明;艮為山為止。文明而有節制。賁卦論述文與質的關係，以質為主，以文調節。賁，文飾、修飾。

lines.explanation: 賁其趾，舍車而徒。

image.text: 舍車而徒，義弗乘也。
image.explanation: 舍車不乘，徒步而行，為顯示鞋子之美麗，理應不乘車。

lines.white_explanation: 腳穿花鞋，舍車不乘，徒步而行。

lines.explanation: 賁其須。

image.text: 賁其須，與上興也。
image.explanation: 修飾自己的鬍鬚，說明老人不服老，幫助君王振興國家。

lines.white_explanation: 修飾自己的鬍鬚。

lines.explanation: 賁如，濡如，永貞吉。

image.text: 永貞之吉，終莫之陵也。
image.explanation: 永遠貞正，必吉利，因為決沒有人侵凌正人君子。

lines.white_explanation: 奔跑向前，汗流浹背。卜問長時期的凶吉而得吉兆。

lines.explanation: 賁如，皤如，白馬翰如，匪寇婚媾。

image.text: 六四當位疑也。匪寇婚媾，終無尤也。
image.explanation: 六四陰爻居陰位，所處恰當。既知不是來搶劫，而是來娶親，疑慮冰釋，終無災禍。

lines.white_explanation: 奔跑氣吁吁，太陽火辣辣。高頭白馬，向前飛奔。不是來搶劫，而是來娶親。

lines.explanation: 賁於丘園，束帛戔戔。吝，終吉。

image.text: 六五之吉，有喜也。
image.explanation: 六五爻辭說的吉利，是指有婚姻之喜。

lines.white_explanation: 奔向丘園，送上許多布帛，初遇困難，終則順利。

lines.explanation: 白賁，無咎。

image.text: 白賁無咎，上得志也。
image.explanation: 白底的布帛飾以諸色花紋，沒有災禍，因為上九居一卦之首位，像人高高在上，志得意滿。

lines.white_explanation: 送上白底飾以諸色花紋的布帛，不會壞事。

daxiang: 日落西山，照耀通明，華美燦爛，同時喻光明力量漸消，陰暗的力量擴大。
fortune: 表面風光內里空虛，必須充實自己，凡事踏實，按部就班。
career: 順利，小有成績，宜即時總結經驗，圖謀更大的發展。樹立信心，不計較一時的得失。追求實質性的內容，慎重諸事，不得隨波逐流，尋求有實力的人物提攜自己。
business: 開始會遇到困難，不應灰心，宜全面分析形勢，大膽開拓，勇敢地投入，聯合他人，共同合作，根據市場，運轉業務。
fame: 不可過多地注重外表，而應著重於內在的素質。大膽地推薦自己，但應堅持自己的理想。
love: 慎重選擇，有合適者，則應迫切追求，不可三心二意，務必專一。注重對方的內在氣質，勿為表面現象所欺騙。
advice: 喜愛注重外表，缺乏追求內在氣質的恆心。生性較為浮躁，好務虛名，往往因此而碰壁，或半途而廢。在事實的教育下，改變不切實際的做法，明察社會和人生，會有所收斂，變得自持，注重自身修養，成全事業，中年以後會大有作為，老年仍可發揮餘熱。
health: 鬱火上升，慎用寒劑。

name: Bo Gua

kingWen.explanation: Not advantageous to have somewhere to go.

image.text: Mountain clinging to Earth, Bo. The superior person strengthens those below to secure their dwelling.
image.explanation: Mountain clinging to Earth, Bo. The superior person strengthens those below to secure their dwelling.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by the overlapping of two trigrams (lower Kun, upper Gen). Five yin lines below, one yang line above, yin abundance with yang isolated; high mountain attached to the earth. Both symbolize falling away, hence the name 'Bo Gua'. This hexagram represents yin flourishing while yang diminishes, symbolizing small people gaining power, the superior person in distress, and business deteriorating.

lines.explanation: The legs of the bed are peeling off. Without perseverance, misfortune.

image.text: The legs of the bed are peeling off, destroying the foundation.
image.explanation: The bed legs are falling off, this is self-destruction of the foundation.

lines.white_explanation: The legs of the bed are falling off. No need for divination, this is an omen of misfortune.

lines.explanation: The frame of the bed is peeling off. Without perseverance, misfortune.

image.text: The frame of the bed is peeling off, there is no support.
image.explanation: The bed board is falling off, this is self-destruction of supporting elements.

lines.white_explanation: The bed board is falling off. No need for divination, this is an omen of misfortune.

lines.explanation: He peels away. No blame.

image.text: Peeling away without blame, losing support from above and below.
image.explanation: Taking land and people from neighboring states can be without disaster, because the rulers of neighboring states have already lost the support of their subjects above and below.

lines.white_explanation: Taking land and people from neighboring states can be without disaster.

lines.explanation: The bed is peeling off the skin. Misfortune.

image.text: Peeling off the bed's cushion, disaster is near.
image.explanation: Stripping the cushion from the bed, disaster is imminent.

lines.white_explanation: Stripping the cushion from the bed, this is an omen of misfortune.

lines.explanation: A string of fish, the favor comes through the palace women. Nothing that would not benefit.

image.text: The favor of palace women ultimately brings no regrets.
image.explanation: Palace women take turns receiving favor at night, maintaining order without excess, thus ultimately avoiding troubles.

lines.white_explanation: Palace women take turns receiving favor, nothing is disadvantageous.

lines.explanation: A large fruit not eaten. The superior person obtains a carriage. The small person's house is stripped away.

image.text: The superior person obtains a carriage, which the people bear; the small person's hut is stripped away, ultimately becoming unusable.
image.explanation: The superior person rides in a luxurious carriage, this is a heavy burden on the common people. The small person's broken house doesn't shelter from wind and rain, this symbol indicates ultimate insecurity.

lines.white_explanation: The laborer doesn't get to eat, the idle obtains food; the superior person rides in an ornate carriage, the small person's hut doesn't protect from wind and rain.

daxiang: Mountain attached to Earth symbolizes mountain rocks tumbling down to the ground, five yin lines force the one yang line, righteousness is damaged.
fortune: Evil fortune surrounds you, it is advisable to reorganize, avoid acting too clever, and beware of being implicated by women and small people.
career: Fortunes are unfavorable, which is the general trend. One can only follow the times and temporarily suspend action, observe and wait for change, avoid risks, actively create conditions, strengthen oneself, be cautiously patient, and avoid associating with petty people. As time and fortune turn, achieving success is not far off.
business: Having declined from peak to low, entering an unfavorable period, one needs to seriously summarize experiences and lessons, conduct reorganization, and especially avoid gambling everything. Once favorable conditions arise, one can rise again gracefully with the tide.
fame: The possibility of success is not great, one should not stubbornly force it, but continue to create conditions, work on self-improvement, enrich life skills, strengthen oneself, and wait for the opportunity to rise again.
love: One must consider carefully, unless there is someone very compatible, do not proceed casually. Both parties should pay attention to maintaining family harmony.
advice: Life has many twists and turns, often falling into unfavorable situations, even desperate ones, but one can emerge from hopelessness. As long as one calmly analyzes the situation and struggles tenaciously, one will definitely change their fate completely, achieving beautiful results that others admire. The key is not to be hasty, especially not to take risks. One must follow the trend and guard against sabotage by petty people.
health: The soul is not attached to the body, be extremely careful.

name: Fu Gua

kingWen.explanation: Success. Going out and coming in without illness, friends come without blame. Going back and forth on one's path, in seven days there will be return. It is favorable to have somewhere to go.

image.text: Thunder within the Earth, Return. The ancient kings closed the passes at the winter solstice, merchants and travelers did not move about, and the ruler did not tour the provinces.
image.explanation: Thunder within the Earth, Return. The ancient kings closed the passes at the winter solstice, merchants and travelers did not move about, and the ruler did not tour the provinces.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by the overlapping of two trigrams (lower Zhen, upper Kun). Zhen represents thunder and movement; Kun represents earth and compliance, movement yields compliance, following the natural course. Movement within compliance, yang inside and yin outside, moving in sequence, advancing and retreating at will, favorable for progress.

lines.explanation: Return from a short distance, no major regrets, great good fortune.

image.text: Returning from not far, to cultivate oneself.
image.explanation: Going out not far and returning, symbolizing constant self-reflection and strict self-cultivation.

lines.white_explanation: Going out not far and then returning, no major fault, great good fortune.

lines.explanation: Tranquil return, good fortune.

image.text: The good fortune of tranquil return is to step down for a worthy person.
image.explanation: The reason a fulfilling return brings good fortune is the willingness to step aside for the worthy.

lines.white_explanation: A fulfilling return, good fortune.

lines.explanation: Repeated returns, danger. No blame.

image.text: The danger of repeated returns, rightfully without blame.
image.explanation: Although returning with a worried expression, one has escaped danger, so rightfully there should be no disaster.

lines.white_explanation: Returning with a worried expression, having encountered danger, retreating in the face of difficulty can avoid disaster.

lines.explanation: Walking in the center and returning alone.

image.text: Walking in the center and returning alone, to follow the Way.
image.explanation: Returning alone midway, this is returning to the path of righteousness.

lines.white_explanation: Returning alone midway.

lines.explanation: Noble return, no regrets.

image.text: Noble return without regrets, examining oneself from within.
image.explanation: After examination, deciding to return can be without regrets, meaning examining oneself from within using the correct path.

lines.white_explanation: After examination, deciding to return can be without regrets.

lines.explanation: Missing the return, misfortune. There is disaster and calamity. If one uses this to mobilize the army, there will be a great defeat in the end, bringing misfortune to the ruler of the state. Even after ten years, one cannot attack again.

image.text: The misfortune of missing the return is going against the ruler's way.
image.explanation: Failing to find the way back encounters misfortune, this is because the ruler violates the ruler's way.

lines.white_explanation: Losing one's way back, misfortune, disaster. If this hexagram is drawn, sending out troops to fight will end in great defeat, involving the ruler in misfortune, severely weakening the state's vitality, so that even after ten years it cannot wage war again.

daxiang: Thunder emerges from within the Earth, symbolizing spring returning to the world, the beginning of a new cycle, all phenomena renewing.
fortune: A symbol of fortune and smooth progress, all things should not be rushed, proceeding step by step will lead to success.
career: Having passed through a difficult period, entering a stage of active progress. But one must seize the opportunity, make decisive moves at the right moment, yet not be impetuous, and should often reflect on personal actions, be strict in self-cultivation, forge ahead bravely, and success can be expected.
business: One can boldly invest, cooperate openly with like-minded partners, open up the market, and not retreat because of setbacks. One can also expand into other regions, adhere to business ethics, progress gradually, and will definitely earn profits.
fame: The timing is maturing, don't be hasty for success, continue to lay the foundation, and when opportunity comes, be sure to seize it, fortune will surely turn. The most taboo is to damage one's will.
love: Smooth. But don't be impatient, consider calmly. A happy and fulfilling family depends on strict self-discipline to maintain.
advice: With a lively character and abundant energy, but impulsive emotions may cause business losses. One must think calmly, bravely correct mistakes, and be able to revitalize business. At this time, seize the opportunity, clarify direction, be flexible and astute, work steadily to change circumstances. Once unexpected situations arise, it is advisable to make prompt decisions and temporarily yield. If one can accurately steer oneself and strive hard, achieving business success will be very smooth.
health: Phlegm and inflammation, beware in winter.

name: Wu Wang

kingWen.explanation: Supreme success. Beneficial to be steadfast. If not correct, there will be misfortune. It is not beneficial to go anywhere.

image.text: Thunder rolls under heaven, giving birth to all things without deception. The ancient kings enriched their virtue in accordance with the time and nurtured all beings.
image.explanation: Thunder rolls under heaven, giving birth to all things without deception. The ancient kings enriched their virtue in accordance with the time and nurtured all beings.

traditional.description: This hexagram consists of the trigrams Zhen (below) and Qian (above) stacked together. Qian represents heaven, strength and health; Zhen represents thunder, strength and movement. Movement with strength, powerful yang energy, people's hearts are inspired, there must be gains, but only by following the right path, not acting recklessly. Without deception there will be gain and blessing.

lines.explanation: Without deception, going is auspicious.

image.text: Going without deception achieves one's will.
image.explanation: There is no deceptive behavior because all actions are controlled by the will.

lines.white_explanation: Do not act improperly, and it will be auspicious.

lines.explanation: Not plowing yet harvesting, not cultivating new fields, then it is beneficial to go somewhere.

image.text: Not plowing yet harvesting, not yet rich.
image.explanation: Wanting to harvest without plowing - such empty thoughts cannot bring wealth.

lines.white_explanation: Wanting to harvest without plowing, wanting to plant cultivated land without clearing new fields. How can such absurd actions be beneficial?

lines.explanation: Unexpected disaster. Perhaps someone's ox was tied up, resulting in gain for the traveler but disaster for the townspeople.

image.text: The traveler gets the ox, disaster for the townspeople.
image.explanation: The traveler unexpectedly gets an ox, the townspeople unexpectedly suffer disaster.

lines.white_explanation: Unexpected disaster. Like someone tying their ox in the wrong place, a traveler takes the ox gaining unexpected benefit, while the townspeople lose the ox suffering unexpected disaster.

lines.explanation: If steadfast, there will be no blame.

image.text: Being steadfast without blame is how it should naturally be.
image.explanation: Having steadfast and upright virtue, there is no disaster, as it should be.

lines.white_explanation: A satisfying divination, there will be no disaster.

lines.explanation: Unexpected illness, do not take medicine and there will be joy.

image.text: Unexpected medicine should not be tried.
image.explanation: Unexpected medication should not be taken casually.

lines.white_explanation: If suffering from an unexpected illness, do not rush to take medicine and it will heal naturally.

lines.explanation: Do not act recklessly. There will be misfortune, nothing beneficial.

image.text: Acting without integrity leads to the disaster of desperation.
image.explanation: False and reckless behavior is an expression of desperation and boredom.

lines.white_explanation: Do not act recklessly! There will be disaster, no benefit.

daxiang: Thunder moves in the sky, yang energy expands, representing true reality without deception.
fortune: In all matters one should uphold righteousness; improper behavior will certainly bring disaster.
career: Value self-knowledge, act from your actual situation, don't entertain unreasonable expectations, be practical, work diligently, mind your behavior, and guard against unexpected disasters. Don't calculate gains and losses, pursue with sincerity, act when the time is right, and your career will succeed.
business: Don't force things against their nature, follow market laws, uphold business ethics, abandon speculative psychology, don't be greedy for excessive profits; through hard work and gradual accumulation, you will succeed.
fame: With good motivation and hard work, discard fantasies, focus on effort rather than results, and you will eventually gain recognition.
love: Both parties must treat each other with sincerity, never with a casual attitude, nor should you rush things - let it develop naturally and reach its conclusion when ready.
advice: Full of energy and ambition, you have potential for achievement. But you must work diligently, be sincere, strive upward, and study hard. Don't become complacent with small achievements. Pursue practical action rather than results. Follow principles and wait for the right time to act. Especially eliminate unreasonable thoughts. This way, you can realize your ideals.
health: Maintain exercise, and digestion will naturally improve.

name: Da Xu

kingWen.explanation: Beneficial to be steadfast. Not eating at home is auspicious. Beneficial to cross the great river.

image.text: Heaven within the mountain, great accumulation. The superior person learns from the words and deeds of the past to cultivate virtue.
image.explanation: Heaven within the mountain, great accumulation. The superior person learns from the words and deeds of the past to cultivate virtue.

traditional.description: This hexagram consists of the trigrams Qian (below) and Gen (above) stacked together. Qian is heaven, strong and healthy; Gen is mountain, solid. Xu means to accumulate, and Da Xu means great accumulation. For this, one does not fear serious difficulties and obstacles, working hard to cultivate character and enrich virtue.

lines.explanation: There is danger, it is beneficial to stop.

image.text: There is danger, stopping is beneficial, to avoid disaster.
image.explanation: Danger approaches, stopping what you're doing can transform misfortune into good fortune, because this way you won't encounter disaster.

lines.white_explanation: Danger approaches, making sacrifices to spirits can transform misfortune into good fortune.

lines.explanation: The carriage spokes come off.

image.text: The carriage spokes come off, but there is no harm in the middle.
image.explanation: The spokes fall off and the wheel breaks, but the nine in second place occupies the middle position of the lower trigram, indicating there will be no worries.

lines.white_explanation: The spokes fall off, the wheel breaks.

lines.explanation: Good horses chase each other, beneficial to persist in difficulty. Practice chariot defense daily. It is beneficial to have somewhere to go.

image.text: It is beneficial to have somewhere to go, aligning with one's will.
image.explanation: Going somewhere is beneficial, one will achieve what is sought and can fulfill one's intentions.

lines.white_explanation: Fine horses mate. Divining about difficult matters is auspicious. Practice defensive chariot warfare daily. Having somewhere to go is beneficial.

lines.explanation: A wooden board on a young bull's horns. Great good fortune.

image.text: Six in the fourth place, great good fortune, there will be joy.
image.explanation: The six in the fourth place indicates great good fortune, meaning there will be joyous events.

lines.white_explanation: Placing a wooden board crosswise on the horns of a combative bull. If you get this line, extremely good fortune.

lines.explanation: The tusks of a gelded boar. Good fortune.

image.text: The good fortune of six in the fifth place means there will be celebration.
image.explanation: The good fortune of the six in the fifth place indicates there will be celebration.

lines.white_explanation: Penning up an aggressive large pig is auspicious.

lines.explanation: Reaching the pathway of Heaven. Success.

image.text: Reaching the pathway of Heaven means the great way is being followed.
image.explanation: Receiving Heaven's blessing, actions proceed smoothly without obstacles.

lines.white_explanation: Receiving Heaven's blessing, great good fortune.

daxiang: The greatness of heaven contained within the mountain, the small restraining the great, yin nourishing yang, representing stopping and nurturing.
fortune: In handling affairs, avoid being unrealistically ambitious; it is better to be practical. Great achievements are possible, but avoid looking down on everything.
career: You must rectify your behavior and nurture your virtue. Actions should be bold and decisive, but should stop at the right point, focusing on rest and recovery, definitely not risking reckless advancement. Pay attention to learning from past experiences and lessons. Have some fear and avoid action, otherwise there will certainly be harm. After achieving success, you should stop appropriately and not be greedy for small immediate gains that could reverse your fortune.
business: Following the principle of gradual progress and upholding proper business ethics will bring significant returns. At this time, avoid excessive greed; instead, know when to retreat, preserve your business, think carefully before developing further. Blind overconfidence and reckless advancement are absolutely unacceptable.
fame: Pay attention to accumulating knowledge and improving virtue; don't be inconsistent in your efforts. Persist, and use your knowledge to serve the country. Your aspirations will eventually be realized.
love: Smooth. Built on the foundation of mutual diligence and thrift in managing the household, treating each other with sincerity, happiness and good fortune.
advice: You are someone who accumulates wealth, but must never harbor thoughts of getting rich through shortcuts. You must rely on honest personal work, use your intelligence, sincerely cooperate with others to create business. Even in difficult times, you should maintain the right path, and especially avoid carelessness. Remember the principle that great achievements come with great resistance.
health: Healthy and strong.

name: Yi Hexagram

kingWen.explanation: Perseverance brings good fortune. Observe how nourishment comes about. One must seek sustenance by oneself.

image.text: Thunder at the foot of the mountain, this is Nourishment. The superior person is careful in speech and moderate in eating and drinking.
image.explanation: Thunder at the foot of the mountain, this is Nourishment. The superior person is careful in speech and moderate in eating and drinking.

traditional.description: This hexagram is a combination of two trigrams (lower Zhen/Thunder and upper Gen/Mountain). Thunder beneath Mountain. External solidity with internal emptiness. Spring warmth nurtures all things, fostering the worthy and caring for the people. The yang is substantial while yin is empty; the substantial nourishes others, the empty is nourished. One should be self-reliant.

lines.explanation: You put aside your sacred tortoise and observe my drooping jaws. Misfortune.

image.text: Observing my drooping jaws is not a worthy behavior.
image.explanation: Envying others' wealth is not noble behavior.

lines.white_explanation: Storing vast treasures while coveting what others have will lead to misfortune.

lines.explanation: Looking for nourishment in the wrong direction, deviating from the norm. Seeking nourishment on the hillside, to set forth brings misfortune.

image.text: Setting forth brings misfortune for Six in the Second Place because this action deviates from proper conduct.
image.explanation: The line speaks of robbery bringing misfortune because such behavior violates moral principles.

lines.white_explanation: To make a living, one must cultivate the hillside. To rob others for subsistence brings misfortune.

lines.explanation: Acting contrary to proper nourishment brings misfortune if persisted in. For ten years do not act thus, nothing will be advantageous.

image.text: Not to be used for ten years means the way is severely violated.
image.explanation: Suffering misfortune for ten years happens because this behavior greatly violates moral principles.

lines.white_explanation: Violating proper methods of sustenance and relying on improper means to survive brings misfortune. Misfortune will persist for ten years with no advantage whatsoever.

lines.explanation: Seeking nourishment from above brings good fortune. Watching attentively like a tiger with unrelenting focus, no blame.

image.text: The good fortune of seeking nourishment from above comes from receiving light from above.
image.explanation: Maintaining correctness brings good fortune because one follows the proper way and serves their ruler.

lines.white_explanation: Seeking only basic sustenance without ill intent toward others brings good fortune. Maintaining vigilance like a tiger's stare is necessary. This way one can enjoy life peacefully without misfortune.

lines.explanation: Deviating from the norm, maintaining correctness brings good fortune. One should not cross the great river.

image.text: The good fortune of maintaining correctness comes from following those above.
image.explanation: Staying correct and proper brings good fortune because one follows the proper way and serves their ruler.

lines.white_explanation: Cultivating unclaimed land and living moderately brings a favorable omen. When encountering this line, one should not attempt to cross rivers.

lines.explanation: Source of nourishment. Awareness of danger brings good fortune. It is beneficial to cross the great river.

image.text: The source of nourishment brings good fortune despite danger, for great celebration will come.
image.explanation: Following the correct path of life brings good fortune after initial hardship, as good people will eventually receive good rewards.

lines.white_explanation: Following the correct path of life brings good fortune after initial hardship. This line indicates it is favorable to cross rivers.

daxiang: The shape resembles the mouth cavity, referring to the way of eating and drinking, emphasizing careful speech and attention to daily life.
fortune: Affairs lack thorough consideration, one should avoid harboring schemes and follow the correct path to find good fortune.
career: All things must rely on personal pursuit and one's own efforts rather than depending on others. One must never use dishonorable means to seek wealth. By following the correct path, being self-reliant, speaking carefully and acting prudently, good opportunities will come. At that time, after a period of hard work, success can be achieved.
business: Do not rush for success; initially, be content with just maintaining basic livelihood. Be cautious, progress step by step, deal honestly with others, cooperate sincerely, adapt to circumstances, continuously seek new directions for development, and take appropriate risks when necessary.
fame: With the purpose of enriching one's knowledge, being content with modest means, working hard and diligently, the hope for success is very great.
love: Do not rush. The key is to enhance one's own cultivation. Once a choice is made, pursue it wholeheartedly, especially avoiding fickleness.
advice: Pay attention to moral cultivation, be willing to help others wholeheartedly, rescue people in urgent need, and do not covet wealth that should not be obtained. As a result, one can gain respect from others and continuously receive external assistance. Personal endeavors will go very smoothly with high possibility of success. Particularly avoid carelessness, and remember the principle that great achievements come with great obstacles.
health: Cold upper body and hot lower body, recovery will take five days.

name: Da Guo

kingWen.explanation: The beam is sagging. It is advantageous to have a place to go. Progress.

image.text: The lake drowns the wood, this is Great Excess. The superior person stands alone without fear and can retreat from the world without distress.
image.explanation: The lake drowns the wood, this is Great Excess. The superior person stands alone without fear and can retreat from the world without distress.

traditional.description: This hexagram is composed of the trigrams (lower Sun over upper Dui). Dui represents a lake or joy, Sun represents wood or compliance. When the lake water drowns the wood, a great mistake occurs. The yin and yang lines are reversed, with yang great and yin small, indicating excessive action. There is strength inside and weakness outside.

lines.text: Line statement for the first six
lines.explanation: Spreading white rushes as a mat, no blame.

image.text: Using white rushes as a mat, the yielding is at the bottom.
image.explanation: "Respectfully using white rushes to cushion the sacrificial offerings" - the soft material is placed underneath, just as the first yin line occupies the lowest position in the hexagram.

lines.white_explanation: Respectfully using white rushes to cushion the sacrificial offerings, there will be no misfortune.

lines.text: Line statement for the nine in the second place
lines.explanation: A dead poplar produces sprouts; an old man marries a young maiden. Everything is beneficial.

image.text: An old man marrying a young wife is an excessive partnership.
image.explanation: When the husband is old and the wife is young, the age difference is inappropriate, this is a flawed marriage.

lines.white_explanation: A dead poplar sprouts, an old man takes a young woman as his wife, nothing is unfavorable.

lines.text: Line statement for the nine in the third place
lines.explanation: The beam is sagging. Misfortune.

image.text: The misfortune of the sagging beam is that it cannot be supported.
image.explanation: The reason the bent beam is dangerous is because when the ridge beam curves, the house leans and cannot be supported.

lines.white_explanation: The roof beam is curved, this is an omen of misfortune.

lines.text: Line statement for the nine in the fourth place
lines.explanation: The beam is straight. Good fortune. If there are other matters, there will be regret.

image.text: The good fortune of the straight beam is that it does not bend below.
image.explanation: The reason a straight roof beam is fortunate is because when the beam doesn't bend, the house doesn't collapse.

lines.white_explanation: The roof beam is straight, auspicious. But if there are unexpected concerns, they will be difficult to address.

lines.text: Line statement for the nine in the fifth place
lines.explanation: A withered poplar produces flowers. An old woman marries a young man. No blame, no praise.

image.text: A withered poplar producing flowers, how can it last long? An old woman marrying a young man is also something unseemly.
image.explanation: When a withered poplar blooms, how can its flowers remain open for long? When an old woman marries a young man, such a matter is never very honorable.

lines.white_explanation: A withered poplar blooms, an old woman marries a young man, this matter is neither good nor bad.

lines.text: Line statement for the six at the top
lines.explanation: Wading across a river that submerges one's head. Misfortune, but no blame.

image.text: The misfortune of wading across cannot be blamed.
image.explanation: Blindly fording a river leads to danger, but at this point, blame is of no use.

lines.white_explanation: Blindly crossing water, with water over one's head, although encountering danger, ultimately there is no disaster.

daxiang: The four yang lines in the middle represent a solid beam, but with yin lines at the beginning and end, the weak supports cannot hold the weight, leading to collapse.
fortune: Having strength but not following one's heart, the burden is too heavy, there is much worry, beware of legal troubles and water dangers.
career: Hidden troubles have appeared in your career, even surrounded by dangers. You must be extremely careful and cautious, only by adhering to the middle way with humble and pleasant approaches, bold yet careful, and seeking help from others. When necessary, you may adopt extraordinary measures, not following conventions, and take risks.
business: Too rushed, developing too quickly, you should contract and adjust. Competition is in an unfavorable position, don't be overconfident, and never be stubborn. You should constantly observe the wind direction and act when the time is right. With certain confidence, you may take risks to seek a turn for the better.
fame: Most importantly, avoid pursuing empty fame that is impractical, resulting in a reputation that doesn't match reality. Only with a humble attitude, careful actions, diligent effort, disregarding public criticism, and moving straight ahead can you pursue your original goals.
love: Self-awareness is most important, don't rush to success, you should carefully consider and use proper means to promote success. But clever strategies when necessary are not excluded.
advice: You are in an unusual period, if you cannot handle it properly, it will be extremely unfavorable. Based on the actual situation, you should neither act rashly nor be indecisive, but combine hardness with softness, humbly seek others' opinions, act cautiously, pursue boldly, and not fear rumors, striving for better times.
health: Both liver and kidneys are overworked, not easy to cure.

name: Kan

kingWen.explanation: With sincerity and a steadfast heart, there is progress. Actions will be rewarded.

image.text: Water flows continuously, repeated Kan. The superior person maintains constant virtue and practices teaching matters.
image.explanation: Water flows continuously, repeated Kan. The superior person maintains constant virtue and practices teaching matters.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by the same trigram (lower Kan over upper Kan) stacked. Kan represents water and danger, two Kan stacked means danger upon danger, obstacles upon obstacles. One yang line is trapped between two yin lines. Fortunately, the yin is empty and yang is solid, and sincerity can suddenly penetrate through. Although dangers are repeated, they can display the brilliance of human nature.

lines.text: Line statement for the first six
lines.explanation: Repeated Kan, falling into a pit within a pit. Misfortune.

image.text: Repeated Kan falling into a pit, misfortune from losing the way.
image.explanation: "Within a pit there is another pit, falling into the double pit" - not following the smooth path, but insisting on taking the dangerous road will surely bring disaster.

lines.white_explanation: Within a pit there is another pit, falling into the double pit, dangerous.

lines.text: Line statement for the nine in the second place
lines.explanation: There is danger in the pit, but one gains a little.

image.text: Gaining a little, not yet leaving the middle path.
image.explanation: Daring to take the dangerous path, one may gain a little, because the nine in the second place occupies the middle position of the lower trigram, like a person who has not yet deviated from the right path.

lines.white_explanation: Pits and ravines everywhere, the path is dangerous. Daring to take the dangerous path, perhaps with small gains.

lines.text: Line statement for the six in the third place
lines.explanation: Coming into repeated pits, dangerous and deep, falling into a pit within a pit. Do not use it.

image.text: Coming into repeated pits, in the end there is no success.
image.explanation: Coming to this place with many pits, there will ultimately be no benefit.

lines.white_explanation: Walking toward the pits, these pits are both dangerous and deep, falling into a double pit, very unfavorable.

lines.text: Line statement for the six in the fourth place
lines.explanation: A jug of wine, a basket of rice with two dishes, offered in earthen vessels. The offering is passed in through a window. In the end, there is no blame.

image.text: A jug of wine and a basket of rice with two dishes, marks the meeting of the firm and soft.
image.explanation: "Usually enjoying fine food and vessels, now using pottery to eat prison food" - the line configuration shows the six in the fourth place below the nine in the fifth, like someone oppressed by the strong, enduring this suffering.

lines.white_explanation: Using bronze vessels for wine, round baskets for rice. However, for prisoners confined in pits, pottery vessels will suffice, with prison food delivered through a skylight. This person endures this misfortune, but ultimately there is no danger.

lines.text: Line statement for the nine in the fifth place
lines.explanation: The pit is not filled, only leveled off. No blame.

image.text: The pit is not filled, as the middle is not yet great.
image.explanation: Although the hilltop has been leveled, the pit is not yet filled, indicating the road is not smooth and has not become a level path.

lines.white_explanation: Although the pit has not been filled, the small hilltop has been leveled off. No misfortune.

lines.text: Line statement for the six at the top
lines.explanation: Bound with ropes and cords, and thrown into a thicket of thorns. For three years one gains nothing. Misfortune.

image.text: The six at the top has lost the way, misfortune for three years.
image.explanation: What the six at the top describes illustrates that officials have deviated from the right path, illegally imprisoning someone for as long as three years.

lines.white_explanation: Tying up the criminal with ropes and throwing them into a prison surrounded by thorns, not released for three years, this is a matter of misfortune.

daxiang: Two waters overlapping, Kan water represents danger, advancing is dangerous, retreating is also dangerous, it is difficult to move either way.
fortune: Surrounded by crises, you should deal with them calmly, maintain a cheerful mindset, and avoid competing with others in all matters.
career: You have fallen into repeated difficulties and dangers, with hazards everywhere. You should neither risk danger nor give up passively, but take a positive attitude to create conditions to change your situation and turn danger into safety. You must be sincere and full of confidence, not seek luck, not shirk from difficulties, observe quietly and wait for change, use wisdom to break through the dangers and turn crisis into opportunity.
business: Very unfavorable, even to the point of facing bankruptcy, but you should remain calm and collected, keep a cool head, be physically in danger but mentally clear, don't act rashly, seek self-preservation first to observe changes, and seize opportunities to escape danger.
fame: Not understood by others, unrecognized talent. Don't give up on yourself. Don't change your original aspiration, remain calm and composed, progress gradually, and eventually you will be understood and discovered.
love: Often encountering disadvantages, you should calmly analyze the reasons and actively change your own conditions. Both parties should work together through adversity.
advice: Unfortunate. However, this is a test before transformation. As long as you don't lose your composure due to hardship and don't seek luck, maintain confidence, and don't put yourself in danger. Stay calm and composed, don't act rashly, observe the timing, you can turn danger into safety and succeed in escaping risk.
health: Diarrhea symptoms, pray sincerely.

name: Li

kingWen.explanation: Advantageous to be correct and firm, success. Raising a cow is auspicious.

image.text: Brightness appears twice, Li. The great person continues to shine light in all directions.
image.explanation: Brightness appears twice, Li. The great person continues to shine light in all directions.

traditional.description: This hexagram consists of the same trigram (lower Li upper Li) stacked together. Li means attachment, suggesting the meaning of adhesion - a single yin line adheres between two yang lines. The hexagram symbolizes fire, empty inside but bright outside. Li represents fire and brightness; the sun rises and sets repeatedly, moving without stopping, with a gentle and compliant heart.

lines.explanation: Treading with confusion, yet respectful. No misfortune.

image.text: Respect in confused treading serves to avoid misfortune.
image.explanation: Hearing the sound of many approaching footsteps, becoming alert and prepared can prevent disaster.

lines.white_explanation: Hearing the sound of many approaching footsteps, becoming alert and prepared can prevent disaster.

lines.explanation: Yellow Li, great good fortune.

image.text: Yellow Li brings great good fortune by following the middle path.
image.explanation: Yellow attaches to the body, great good fortune, because the six in second position occupies the middle position of the lower trigram, like a person following the path of moderation.

lines.white_explanation: A yellow rainbow appears in the sky, great good fortune.

lines.explanation: In the sunset's Li. If one doesn't beat the pottery drum and sing, then comes the groaning of great old age. Misfortune.

image.text: The Li of sunset, how can it last long?
image.explanation: The rainbow at dusk, how can it remain for long without dispersing?

lines.white_explanation: At dusk there is a rainbow in the sky, this is an ominous sign. People aren't beating drums and singing to dispel it. The elderly feel sad, disaster is approaching.

lines.explanation: It comes suddenly, burning, dying, abandoning.

image.text: It comes suddenly, with nowhere to hide.
image.explanation: Disaster comes so suddenly that people have nowhere to hide or escape.

lines.white_explanation: Disaster suddenly descends, enemies burn houses on sight, kill people on sight, this place becomes a wasteland.

lines.explanation: Tears flow abundantly, sorrowful lamentation. Good fortune.

image.text: The good fortune of six in the fifth comes from attachment to the king and nobility.
image.explanation: The good fortune mentioned in the six in the fifth line is because the line image shows that the six in the fifth is below the nine at the top, like people who can be saved by attaching to royalty and nobility.

lines.white_explanation: After the disaster, people weep bitterly, people lament, yet there is good fortune.

lines.explanation: The king uses military force, bringing glory. Beheading the leader, capturing only the guilty. No blame.

image.text: The king uses military force to rectify the state.
image.explanation: The king sends troops to counterattack, to stabilize the country. Many prisoners are captured, indicating a great victory.

lines.white_explanation: The king goes to war, counterattacks the enemy, beheads the ruler of the Jia kingdom, captures many prisoners, without disaster or difficulty.

daxiang: Two Li fires stacked together, an image of clarity above and below. Fire has energy but no form, suggesting insubstantiality and instability.
fortune: Outwardly prospering, like the blazing sun at its zenith. In all matters, avoid rushing forward and acting on impulse.
career: Approaching the peak, where prosperity will soon decline. You must summarize experiences and lessons, pursue good and avoid evil, cultivate yourself with compliance, recognize danger when in danger, inspire your will, and avoid rash actions. You should especially seek help from moderate and righteous people to revitalize your career.
business: Avoid being eager for quick success. You should be diligent and cautious, think deeply about the future, examine market conditions, compete fairly, and avoid taking shortcuts. Strive to cooperate closely with others.
fame: Before your direction is confirmed, don't rush about aimlessly. You should persevere, pursue with determination, and humbly seek advice from talented and virtuous elders.
love: Finding a partner on your own might be difficult. It's best to ask reliable friends or elders for help, and don't be impatient. Both parties should respect each other, and above all avoid impure thoughts.
advice: Be content with your fate and follow nature. In youth, you may be eager for advancement without realizing your ideals, but by adhering to moderation and humility, you can avoid disaster. Remaining vigilant can turn danger into safety. In times of crisis, seek support, but be careful in choosing whom to rely on. In old age, you should understand destiny, and especially avoid rash actions regardless of circumstances.
health: Serious fever, beware of grave danger.

name: Xian

kingWen.explanation: Success. Benefit from correctness. Taking a wife brings good fortune.

image.text: Lake on the mountain, Xian. The superior person keeps an open mind to receive others.
image.explanation: Lake on the mountain, Xian. The superior person keeps an open mind to receive others.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by two trigrams (Gen below and Dui above). Gen represents mountain; Dui represents lake. The soft Dui is above, the firm Gen below, water seeps downward, softness above and firmness below, mutually influencing each other. Influence leads to achievement.

lines.explanation: Influencing the big toe.

image.text: Influencing the big toe indicates the will to go outward.
image.explanation: The big toe is moving, indicating the intention to travel.

lines.white_explanation: Injuring the big toe.

lines.explanation: Influencing the calves. Misfortune, but staying still brings good fortune.

image.text: Though misfortune, staying still brings good fortune. Following this will prevent harm.
image.explanation: Though faced with an unlucky omen, staying in place can turn misfortune into good fortune. Following the divination's advice can avoid disaster.

lines.white_explanation: Injuring the calf muscle, this is an ominous sign. With injured calves, one should not go out. Staying still will naturally bring safety.

lines.explanation: Influencing the thigh, holding onto its flesh beneath. Going forward brings difficulty.

image.text: Influencing the thigh indicates restlessness. The will to follow others shows a lowly position held.
image.explanation: Moving the thigh indicates dissatisfaction with one's position. But the aim is merely to follow others, showing that one's ambitions are also lowly, not worth pursuing.

lines.white_explanation: Injuring the thigh and the flesh below it. Traveling with such injuries will surely bring disaster.

lines.explanation: Persistence brings good fortune and regrets disappear. Coming and going in confusion, but friends follow your thoughts.

image.text: Good fortune and no regrets because no harm has been suffered. Coming and going in confusion indicates not yet achieving great success.
image.explanation: Correctness brings good fortune and no regrets because no harm has been suffered. Though several friends come and go frequently, it still requires significant effort.

lines.white_explanation: Persistence brings good fortune with no regrets. People coming and going, with friends all following your intentions.

lines.explanation: Influencing the back muscles, no regrets.

image.text: Influencing the back muscles indicates humble ambitions.
image.explanation: Movement in the back muscles, as if carrying a heavy burden, indicates that one's ambitions lie in humble matters.

lines.white_explanation: Injuring the back muscles, but without disaster.

lines.explanation: Influencing the jaws, cheeks, and tongue.

image.text: Influencing the jaws, cheeks, and tongue indicates excessive talk.
image.explanation: Injury to the jaws, cheeks, and tongue is disaster brought on by excessive talking.

lines.white_explanation: Injuring the jaws, cheeks, and tongue.

daxiang: The young male beneath the young female, mutually responsive, symbolizing new marriage, interaction between the sexes.
fortune: Auspicious and as wished, but beware of inappropriate emotional entanglements.
career: Harmony is valuable; with harmony, everything prospers. Use sincerity to move people and deal with others. Form broad friendships, be humble and courteous. Establish great ambitions, hold firm to your views, do not blindly follow the crowd. In unfavorable times, stay put and wait for opportunity; do not act rashly or force things.
business: Profit can be made. But approach with pure intentions, treat others sincerely, and strengthen cooperation. If the market is not favorable, do not act rashly or force matters, but quietly wait for development. Listen openly to different opinions.
fame: Your ambitions should be grand, but stay grounded. Humbly seek advice from others, making people pleased to help and employ you. Do not isolate yourself, and never be cold or antisocial. Develop yourself with an open mind.
love: High probability of success. The couple has strong feelings, but motives must be pure for a happy, lasting marriage.
advice: Auspicious and fortunate. Good interpersonal relationships and social skills. Handle affairs with sincere attitude and selfless heart; there will be no disadvantages. Maintain principles when cooperating with others. Do not be indecisive when handling affairs. In unfavorable times, stop action, learn from experience, and plan for development. Be sincere with people, but avoid associating with smooth-talking villains to prevent being deceived.
health: Weakness requires nourishment.

name: Heng

kingWen.explanation: Success, no blame, beneficial to be correct. Advantageous to have a destination.

image.text: Thunder and wind, Heng. The superior person stands firm in unwavering direction.
image.explanation: Thunder and wind, Heng. The superior person stands firm in unwavering direction.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by two trigrams (Xun below and Zhen above). Zhen represents male, thunder; Xun represents female, wind. The firm Zhen is above, the gentle Xun below. The firm above and the gentle below, creating constancy, mutually supportive. Yin and yang correspond to each other, maintaining consistency, hence named Heng (duration).

lines.explanation: Seeking depth with persistence, misfortune and no advantage.

image.text: The misfortune of seeking depth comes from the initial pursuit of depth.
image.explanation: Digging without stopping brings misfortune because venturing too deep risks collapse.

lines.white_explanation: Digging without stopping, divination shows danger with no benefit.

lines.explanation: Regret disappears.

image.text: Nine in the second place has no regrets because he maintains the middle way.
image.explanation: The text says there are no regrets because one can hold to the middle path.

lines.white_explanation: No regrets.

lines.explanation: Not maintaining virtue will bring shame; persistence leads to difficulty.

image.text: Not maintaining virtue means having no place to belong.
image.explanation: Unable to maintain virtue, being inconsistent, no one trusts you, inevitably leading to having nowhere to belong.

lines.white_explanation: Unable to maintain virtue, sure to suffer shame. Divination shows difficult omens.

lines.explanation: No game in the field.

image.text: Long remaining in an unsuitable position, how could there be game?
image.explanation: Staying long in an unsuitable environment, how could there be rewards?

lines.white_explanation: Hunting with no game.

lines.explanation: Maintaining virtue through persistence. Good fortune for a woman, misfortune for a man.

image.text: Good fortune for a woman who perseveres means following one path to the end. Misfortune for a man means that following a woman's virtue will bring misfortune.
image.explanation: The text says a woman who maintains chastity is fortunate, conforming to the principle of being faithful to her husband throughout her life. A husband should create principles according to circumstances; his path is varied. If male virtues are constrained by female virtues, misfortune will result.

lines.white_explanation: Consistent conduct. Divination shows good fortune for a woman, danger for a man.

lines.explanation: Constant agitation brings misfortune.
