image.text: Constant agitation at the top achieves nothing great.
image.explanation: A ruler who constantly changes orders and is inconsistent in policy will achieve nothing in the end.

lines.white_explanation: Long-term restlessness brings danger.

daxiang: Zhen represents movement, appropriately developing outward; Xun represents entering, moving inward. One internal and one external, each in its proper place, thus able to endure unchanging, symbolizing the way of husband and wife.
fortune: Everything goes smoothly; persistent effort and keeping to one's proper role brings good fortune, while rash action invites disaster.
career: Nothing succeeds without persistence; with persistence, there will be achievement. Persistence is the foundation of success. Therefore, one must have pure motives, maintain stillness and avoid impulsiveness, not rush for quick results, but also not rigidly adhere to dead methods. One should proceed according to practical circumstances. Avoid following others blindly, and adapt to changing circumstances. Thus, affairs will proceed smoothly and succeed.
business: Act boldly; wherever one goes will be profitable. Pay attention to market conditions and surrounding circumstances. Change business strategies accordingly, but do not change normal principles and ways, persist in carefully chosen directions, do not follow trends. Avoid taking risks beyond one's capacity.
fame: Have both a beginning and an end, be good from start to finish, establish oneself on the right path, persevere without giving up. Especially in studies, one should improve cultivation and will certainly succeed.
love: Good things come through hardship; there will be twists and turns, but one must not be fickle. Live harmoniously and do not be stubborn in one's views.
advice: Progress step by step; do not have excessive expectations at the beginning, but do not give up pursuit. Be practical and start from reality. Do not aim too high, and especially do not overestimate yourself. Do not take risks or be too aggressive, and do not be inconsistent. Firmly believe the universe is constantly renewing itself, continuously correct your views, and add new content.
health: Shortness of breath with phlegm, continue with the old prescription.

name: Dun

kingWen.explanation: Success. Small benefit from persistence.

image.text: Mountain under heaven, Dun. The superior person keeps away from inferior people, not with hatred but with dignity.
image.explanation: Mountain under heaven, Dun. The superior person keeps away from inferior people, not with hatred but with dignity.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by two trigrams (Gen below and Qian above). Qian represents heaven, Gen represents mountain. Heaven beneath the mountain, the mountain is high and heaven retreats. Yin grows while yang diminishes, small men gain power, the superior person retreats into seclusion, preserving wisdom and waiting for the opportunity to save the world.

lines.explanation: Retreating tail, danger. Do not undertake anything.

image.text: The danger of the retreating tail—why would there be disaster if one does not proceed?
image.explanation: Retreating and hiding but still in danger; if one could persevere in the struggle and find a way to victory, what disaster would there be?

lines.white_explanation: When all superior people fully retreat, the country will be in danger. Nothing can be accomplished.

lines.explanation: Hold him with yellow ox hide, none can break free.

image.text: Using yellow ox hide indicates firm resolve.
image.explanation: Using yellow ox hide rope to bind shows firm determination.

lines.white_explanation: Captured and bound tightly with yellow ox hide rope, thus unable to escape.

lines.explanation: Entangled retreat, dangerous illness. Keeping servants and concubines is favorable.

image.text: The danger of entangled retreat is like being exhausted by illness. Keeping servants and concubines is favorable because great matters cannot be undertaken.
image.explanation: The danger created by being hindered from decisively retreating is like being worn out by disease, so keeping servants is fortunate, meaning one should temporarily nurse one's wounds and not act rashly.

lines.white_explanation: Being hindered from decisively retreating is like suffering from a serious illness, a dangerous situation. In such circumstances, keeping servants might be beneficial.

lines.explanation: Willing retreat is fortunate for the superior person, but not for the inferior person.

image.text: The superior person willingly retreats, but the inferior person does not.
image.explanation: The superior person does not set his heart on profit and honors, and enjoys seclusion; the inferior person sets his heart on profit and honors, and is unwilling to retreat.

lines.white_explanation: Enjoying seclusion is fortunate for the superior person, but not necessarily for the inferior person.

lines.explanation: Excellent retreat, persistence brings good fortune.

image.text: Excellent retreat with persistence brings good fortune through righteous intention.
image.explanation: Retreating at the right time is praiseworthy; following the right path brings good fortune because one's heart is upright and one's virtue is noble.

lines.white_explanation: Retreating at the right time is praiseworthy; divination about the future shows smooth sailing and good fortune.

lines.explanation: Rich retreat, nothing is unfavorable.

image.text: Rich retreat is wholly favorable, leaving no room for doubt.
image.explanation: The text speaks of flying far away, retreating to the mountains and forests, with nothing unfavorable, showing that such a person observes the situation well and bravely retreats from danger.

lines.white_explanation: Flying far away, retreating to the mountains and forests, nothing is unfavorable.

daxiang: The mountain is beneath heaven, yin gradually increases while yang gradually decreases, one should retreat three steps.
fortune: The way of inferior people grows while the way of the superior person diminishes; in all things retreat is better than advance. In hardship, cultivate personal integrity, nurture self and cultivate character.
career: Times are unfavorable; consider retreat, do not flow with corrupt people. This is not passive escape but preservation of strength, summarizing experience, seizing opportunities, and waiting for the right time to emerge. Avoid acting rashly, causing unnecessary losses. At the same time, do not be tempted by small immediate benefits.
business: The market is entering a downturn, and conditions are unfavorable. Do not persist in pursuit or blindly invest, but remain calm and composed, adhere to business ethics, stay away from villains and dishonest merchants, preserve your strength, and wait for market conditions to improve before developing further.
fame: The wise preserve themselves and willingly retreat into seclusion. Focus entirely on improvement in preparation for reemergence.
love: Do not rush to resolve matters, and especially do not act rashly or force things. When the time is right, approach with a pure attitude and handle correctly.
advice: In a period of decline, inferior people prevail. Blind action will surely bring disadvantage. Though there is no need to return evil for evil, you must not flow with corruption, losing the greater for the lesser. Weigh importance and urgency, conceal your light and nurture your strength, resolutely depart, do not hesitate. Focus on developing personal strength, endure and wait for opportunity. By firmly adhering to the right path and maintaining correct principles, you can reemerge when the time is ripe and accomplish great things.
health: Retreat to an auspicious place.

name: Da Zhuang

kingWen.explanation: Beneficial to be steadfast.

image.text: Thunder in the sky, Da Zhuang. The superior person does not tread where propriety forbids.
image.explanation: Thunder in the sky, Da Zhuang. The superior person does not tread where propriety forbids.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by the trigrams Thunder (above) and Heaven (below). Thunder represents movement; Heaven represents strength. Thunder rolls across the sky, the sound is mighty, the energy is powerful, and all things grow. Strong and powerful, thus it is called Zhuang (strength). Great and strong, hence named Da Zhuang (Great Strength). Four yang lines are vigorous, active and accomplishing. Above and below are correct, the model is straight and the image is upright.

lines.explanation: Strong in the toes, going forward brings misfortune, but there is confidence.

image.text: Strong in the toes, confidence is exhausted.
image.explanation: Relying on military strength to invade others, although there are gains, credibility is lost.

lines.white_explanation: Injury to the toes. For this line, going to war brings misfortune, but there are still some gains.

lines.explanation: Perseverance brings good fortune.

image.text: Good fortune from perseverance in the second nine comes from its central position.
image.explanation: The nine in the second place speaks of good fortune from correctness, because the nine in the second position occupies the central position of the lower trigram, like a person maintaining the middle way.

lines.white_explanation: Divination yields a favorable omen.

lines.explanation: The inferior man uses force; the superior person uses restraint. Persistence brings danger. A ram butts against a fence, entangling its horns.

image.text: The inferior man uses force, while the superior person exercises restraint.
image.explanation: The inferior man hunts with brute force, the superior person relies on nets.

lines.white_explanation: The inferior man hunts with brute force, the superior person relies on nets. Divination shows a dangerous omen. The ram butts against the fence and gets its horns stuck.

lines.explanation: Perseverance brings good fortune. Regrets vanish. The fence is broken but the ram is not trapped. Strength comes from the axle of a great cart.

image.text: Breaking through the fence without being trapped means moving forward.
image.explanation: Breaking through the fence, escaping constraint, beware it may charge elsewhere.

lines.white_explanation: Divination yields a favorable omen, without regrets. Because the ram breaks through the fence, freeing itself from constraints, but is then injured by the cart wheel, it can no longer charge recklessly.

lines.explanation: Losing a ram in a foreign place, without regret.

image.text: Losing a ram in a foreign place, the position is not appropriate.
image.explanation: Losing a ram to barbarians is because the sixth yin line occupies a yang position, indicating an inappropriate situation, like someone in an unsuitable environment who will suffer losses.

lines.white_explanation: Losing a ram to barbarians. For this line, there is no major misfortune.

lines.explanation: A ram butts against a fence, unable to retreat, unable to advance, nothing is advantageous. Difficulty, then good fortune.

image.text: Unable to advance or retreat is unfortunate; difficulty brings good fortune because the misfortune will not last.
image.explanation: Unable to retreat, unable to advance, caught in a dilemma, this is an inauspicious situation. Although in difficulty, eventually there will be a favorable resolution, indicating that disaster will not endure.

lines.white_explanation: The ram's horns are stuck in the fence, it cannot retreat or advance, the situation is unfavorable. However, although currently in difficulty, eventually there will be a favorable resolution.

daxiang: Thunder resounds in the sky, bright across the horizon, symbolizing righteousness and brightness, also representing strong earth movement, one of the six conflict hexagrams.
fortune: Although your fortune is strong, it is reaching its peak. Maintain a calm and peaceful mindset, otherwise failure may result, remember that extremes lead to reversal.
career: Rely on wisdom not force in dealing with the world; have courage but also strategy, avoid recklessness, defend when necessary or invite misfortune. Do not be overbearing, or you will bring danger upon yourself. Be vigilant against petty people, especially do not underestimate their treachery. Be brave in pursuing your career, but avoid excessive advancement.
business: Business is in a booming stage with favorable conditions. But never be overbearing or act rashly. Actively strengthen cooperation with others. Stay alert, recognize the principle that extremes lead to reversal, and prepare for business downturn.
fame: Pay attention to using your strength appropriately, do not advance rashly based on your robust condition. Especially avoid being overconfident. Properly display your talents, combined with external assistance, and you will certainly achieve something.
love: Never be arrogant because of your good conditions. Don't miss a good marriage opportunity.
advice: Maintain moderate strength, do not overspend your energy. Especially avoid rash action when your career is going well. Also note that you may already be in a dilemma, so protect yourself while awaiting opportunity, and prepare early.
health: Take care of your feet.

name: Jin

kingWen.explanation: The prince uses gifts of horses to increase his followers; audience granted three times in a single day.

image.text: Brightness emerges above the earth, Jin. The superior person illuminates his bright virtue.
image.explanation: Brightness emerges above the earth, Jin. The superior person illuminates his bright virtue.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by the trigrams Fire (above) and Earth (below). Fire symbolizes the sun, brightness; Earth represents the ground. The sun rises high, shining over the whole earth; the earth is humble, all things grow, bright and honest, the gentle rising upward, symbolizing affairs rising steadily.

lines.explanation: Advancing, then retreating. Persistence brings good fortune. Without confidence, being generous brings no blame.

image.text: Advancing, then retreating, traveling alone and correctly. Generous without blame, not yet receiving the mandate.
image.explanation: Attacking the enemy, defeating the enemy, this is because the general can follow the correct path, thus achieving victory. Calmly deploying forces, defeating the enemy and achieving victory without disaster, shows that the general can adapt to circumstances and make independent decisions.

lines.white_explanation: Attacking the enemy, defeating the enemy, divination shows a favorable omen. The victorious army did not capture prisoners, did not plunder property, there will be no disaster.

lines.explanation: Advancing but sorrowful. Persistence brings good fortune. You receive this great blessing from your maternal king.

image.text: You receive this great blessing because of your central correctness.
image.explanation: The reason for receiving this great blessing is because the six in the second position occupies the central position of the lower trigram, like a person following the middle way.

lines.white_explanation: Attacking the enemy, overwhelming the enemy, divination shows a favorable omen. Because you received the blessing of your ancestral mother, you receive great fortune.

lines.explanation: All consent, regret disappears.

image.text: The will of all who consent is to move upward.
image.explanation: When everyone trusts, your aspirations will be realized.

lines.white_explanation: United as one, attacking with full force, without regret.

lines.explanation: Advancing like a squirrel, persistence brings danger.

image.text: The squirrel's persistence brings danger because the position is not appropriate.
image.explanation: Attacking the enemy but with the timidity of a rodent, divination shows an ominous sign, because the nine in the fourth position is yang in a yin position, like someone in a disadvantageous position.

lines.white_explanation: Attacking the enemy but with the timidity of a rodent, divination shows an ominous sign.

lines.explanation: Regret disappears. Do not worry about gain and loss. Going forward brings good fortune. Nothing is unfavorable.

image.text: Do not worry about loss and gain, going forward brings celebration.
image.explanation: If you suffer a setback, don't be discouraged, bravely proceed, and celebration will certainly come.

lines.white_explanation: No regrets, if you suffer defeat, do not be discouraged. As long as you persevere, you will eventually turn defeat into victory. All is favorable.

lines.explanation: Advancing with horns, use them only to attack a city. Dangerous but fortunate. No blame, but persistence brings humiliation.

image.text: Using them to attack the city, the way is not yet bright.
image.explanation: Considering attacking the enemy's city means the kingly way has not yet been widely implemented, leading to rebellion in the fiefs.

lines.white_explanation: Attacking the enemy requires measuring the strength of both sides, you may consider attacking the enemy's cities. But the outcome is uncertain: it may be dangerous, it may be fortunate, it may bring no disaster, or it may fulfill an ominous prophecy.

daxiang: The sun rising above the ground, illuminating the earth, symbolizing bright advancement.
fortune: Career, reputation, and finances are all favorable, indicating promotion and advancement in rank.
career: Smooth. Follow the right path, face difficulties head-on, defeat enemies, adapt to circumstances. Establish good interpersonal relationships, win people's hearts. Go all out, with no hesitation, avoid indecisiveness, do not be discouraged by defeat, forge ahead bravely. Pay attention to harmony and common progress.
business: Good market conditions. Market competition is favorable. But you will also encounter some difficulties, must face them head-on, adapt to circumstances, defeat enemies. Seek everyone's support. Setbacks during advancement are inevitable, but with pure motives, dangers can be turned into safety.
fame: Through hard work and struggle, you have built a foundation for developing your career, but because no one recommends you, you are temporarily unsuccessful. Never be discouraged, you must patiently await opportunity. Meanwhile, be more active in creating conditions.
love: Lucky stars shine. There will be ideal results, but never rely on your superior conditions to be indifferent or overly picky.
advice: You are in a continuously rising situation without too much resistance. But be sure to win everyone's trust, gain people's hearts, and make persistent efforts. As long as your motives are pure and you overcome any thoughts of luck, good fortune will certainly fall from heaven.
health: Self-awareness.

name: Ming Yi

kingWen.explanation: Beneficial to persevere in difficulty.

image.text: Light enters the earth, Ming Yi. The superior person manages the people using obscurity while remaining bright.
image.explanation: Light enters the earth, Ming Yi. The superior person manages the people using obscurity while remaining bright.

traditional.description: This hexagram is composed of two trigrams (Li below, Kun above). Li represents brightness, Kun represents compliance; Li represents sun; Kun represents earth. The sun sets into the earth, light is damaged, the future is unclear, circumstances are difficult. It is appropriate to follow the times and conceal one's brightness, adhere firmly to the right path, appear foolish outwardly while remaining wise inwardly, conceal one's talents while nurturing inner illumination.

lines.explanation: Ming Yi in flight, drooping its wings. The superior person travels, three days without food. There is a place to go, but the host will have words.

image.text: The superior person travels, righteously not accepting food.
image.explanation: The superior person on a journey, according to propriety, cannot accept shameful food.

lines.white_explanation: A pelican in flight, coming to rest at the edge of a marsh. The superior person leaves home, three days without food. For those with somewhere to go, the host will criticize.

lines.explanation: Ming Yi, injured in the left thigh, uses a strong horse for rescue, good fortune.

image.text: Good fortune of the six in second position results from following the rules.
image.explanation: The good fortune mentioned in the six in second position comes because this yin line is positioned below the yang line of the third position, just as a horse is obedient to its master and understands human intentions.

lines.white_explanation: Pelican, pelican, injured in the left thigh, a superior person is wounded but saved by a horse. Auspicious.

lines.explanation: Ming Yi during southern hunting, captures a great leader. Cannot rush, divination is favorable.

image.text: The intention of hunting in the south leads to great gain.
image.explanation: The determination to hunt in the south greatly fulfills one's wishes.

lines.white_explanation: In the southern hunting grounds, drawing the bow and shooting arrows, obtaining some large game. For divination about illness, unfavorable.

lines.explanation: Entering the left abdomen, obtaining the heart of Ming Yi, leaving the door and courtyard.

image.text: Entering the left abdomen, understanding the heart's intention.
image.explanation: Returning to a deeply hidden place satisfies the desire for retreat.

lines.white_explanation: Return to a deeply hidden place! Walking out of one's residence and entering society, feeling the harshness of the environment, the thought of retreat naturally arises.

lines.explanation: Like Ji Zi's Ming Yi, favorable to divination.

image.text: Ji Zi's divination shows that brightness cannot be extinguished.
image.explanation: Ji Zi's retreat while maintaining rectitude means his brilliant image will never fade through the ages.

lines.white_explanation: After the fall of Yin, Ji Zi fled to a neighboring country in the east to seek refuge, the divination is auspicious.

lines.explanation: Not bright, dark. First ascending to heaven, later entering the earth.

image.text: First ascending to heaven, illuminating the four states; later entering the earth, losing the proper way.
image.explanation: The sun rises, the superior person enters service, light shines in all directions. The sun sets, the superior person withdraws, the country has no model to follow.

lines.white_explanation: The sunlight disappears, it becomes dark. The rising sun symbolizes the superior person entering service; the setting sun symbolizes the superior person withdrawing.

daxiang: The sun is hidden beneath the Kun earth, darkness covers the land, symbolizing loss of light.
fortune: All matters are obstructed, petty people cause harm, encountering confusion in affairs, it is advisable to remain still and wait for the right time to act.
career: In an unfavorable environment, one should maintain a calm mindset to handle adverse conditions, strengthen psychological qualities, and endure various pressures. Outwardly appear gentle and careful, inwardly discern principles, depart when it is time to leave, avoid disaster, escape danger. Prevent problems before they arise, and persevere in struggling through adversity.
business: Carefully observe market dynamics, wait for the right time to act, but adhere to business ethics. Even in unfavorable situations, take risks and move forward, especially toward southern development, which will bring significant returns.
fame: Maintain great aspirations inwardly, act with endurance and diligence, struggle through adversity, hold fast to one's goals, conceal intelligence rather than display it openly. In the midst of chaos, especially adhere to justice, conceal ability and appear foolish.
love: Must fully analyze the other's situation, not lose the big picture because of small matters. Pay attention to major principles.
advice: In unfavorable conditions, difficult environment, unclear future. But if one can face adversity with equanimity, being flexible when necessary, prospects will brighten. Especially strengthen self-cultivation, endure hardships while pursuing goals, appear foolish outwardly while remaining wise inwardly, and one can turn misfortune into blessing. By acting cautiously and being careful in all matters, one can achieve even more.
health: Liver congestion, take care of yourself.

name: Jia Ren

kingWen.explanation: Beneficial for a woman's divination.

image.text: Wind emerges from fire, Jia Ren. The superior person speaks with substance and acts with constancy.
image.explanation: Wind emerges from fire, Jia Ren. The superior person speaks with substance and acts with constancy.

traditional.description: This hexagram is composed of two trigrams (Li below, Xun above). Li represents fire; Xun represents wind. Fire creates heat that rises and becomes wind. All things should be based on the internal as their foundation, and then extend outward. Occurring from within, forming on the outside. This means to first manage the family and then govern the world. When family affairs are in order, the world will be peaceful and happy.

lines.explanation: Establish order in the family, regret disappears.

image.text: Establish order in the family, intentions have not changed.
image.explanation: Guarding against unexpected incidents in the family means being alert to potential changes.

lines.white_explanation: Guarding against unexpected incidents in the family, there is no regret.

lines.explanation: Nothing to follow, attending to household food, divination is favorable.

image.text: The good fortune of six in the second position comes from being compliant and gentle.
image.explanation: The reason for good fortune in the six in second position is because this yin line is positioned below the yang line of the third position, like a woman who is obedient and modest toward a man.

lines.white_explanation: Women at home managing household affairs, arranging meals, without error, this is an auspicious sign.

lines.explanation: Family members speak harshly, regretful and dangerous, but auspicious; wife and children laugh, in the end, humiliation.

image.text: Family members speak harshly, not yet failing; wife and children laugh, losing family discipline.
image.explanation: A poor family that can work hard has not lost proper family tradition. A wealthy household that only knows pleasure-seeking will lose the way of diligence and frugality.

lines.white_explanation: A poor family, many mouths to feed, this is a sorrowful matter, but through hard work they can escape poverty and achieve wealth. While in a wealthy family, indulgence in luxury and pleasure, wives and children only knowing how to laugh and enjoy, will eventually decline.

lines.explanation: Wealthy family, great good fortune.

image.text: Wealthy family with great good fortune, compliance in proper position.
image.explanation: Happy family, great good fortune, because the six in fourth position is a yin line positioned below the yang line in the fifth position, like family members in harmony and each keeping to their proper roles.

lines.white_explanation: Happy family, great good fortune.

lines.explanation: The king approaches his family, do not worry, auspicious.

image.text: The king approaches his family, mutual love.
image.explanation: The king visits the homes of his subjects, showing mutual love between ruler and subject.

lines.white_explanation: The king comes to the family temple to sacrifice to ancestors, do not worry, ancestors will bless family members, everything is auspicious.

lines.explanation: Sincere and dignified, eventually auspicious.

image.text: The good fortune of being dignified refers to self-reflection.
image.explanation: The top nine speaks of establishing authority through punishment, ultimately leading to good fortune, because the ruler can reflect inwardly while establishing outward prestige.

lines.white_explanation: The ruler holds the power of punishment, inspiring awe, authority unwavering, ultimately auspicious.

daxiang: The image of wind blowing fire, enhancing fire's power, symbolizing family members working together with one heart to develop their undertakings.
fortune: Safe and very auspicious, cooperation with others leads to success, with signs of celebration such as births and marriages.
career: Success depends on the family situation. Strictly managing the family, preventing unexpected problems in the 'back yard' is a prerequisite for career success. Harmonious husband and wife, working together, can certainly escape poverty and achieve wealth. Career should develop from inside out, step by step, with persistence, and then success will surely follow.
business: Apply family management methods to business activities. Treat company employees with a combination of strictness and leniency, primarily strictness. Concentrate leadership, have one person in charge, work together, accumulate results day by day.
fame: Focus on diligent effort and contentment in poverty, and should have family support. As the family prospers, personal career will also easily succeed.
love: A harmonious family is the foundation of everything, and the wife is the root of family harmony. Be careful in choosing a wife, create a harmonious and happy family.
advice: Success comes from a good family and wife's support, must maintain this advantage, otherwise prosperity can turn to decline in an instant. Especially guard against family mishaps. Family management relies on modesty in treating others and diligence in saving to achieve wealth. Family members should be mutually harmonious and friendly.
health: Excessive phlegm and difficulty breathing, hard to cure completely.

name: Kui

kingWen.explanation: Small matters bring good fortune.

image.text: Fire above, lake below, Kui. The superior person acknowledges commonality while respecting differences.
image.explanation: Fire above, lake below, Kui. The superior person acknowledges commonality while respecting differences.

traditional.description: This hexagram combines two trigrams (Dui below, Li above). Li represents fire; Dui represents lake. Fire goes up while lake goes down, creating opposition without mutual support. Through cycles of destruction and creation, movement continues without interruption. All things have differences, and must necessarily have opposition and contradictions. Kui means opposition.

lines.explanation: Regret vanishes. If you lose your horse, do not pursue it; it will return by itself. When you see an evil person, there will be no blame.

image.text: Seeing an evil person avoids misfortune.
image.explanation: When encountering bad people, there is no misfortune because one is aware of avoiding their harmful intentions.

lines.white_explanation: No need for regret. If you lose your horse, do not look for it; it will return by itself. If you encounter bad people on the way, you will still suffer no misfortune.

lines.explanation: Meeting one's master in a narrow street, no blame.

image.text: Meeting one's master in a narrow street, not losing the way.
image.explanation: Meeting a hospitable host indicates that one has not lost their path.

lines.white_explanation: Meeting a hospitable host, there is no misfortune.

lines.explanation: One sees a cart being pulled back, while its ox is held back; the person's forehead has been branded and nose cut off. There is no good beginning but there is a good end.

image.text: Seeing the cart pulled back, the position is inappropriate; without a good beginning but with a good end, encountering strength.
image.explanation: Seeing a slave pulling a cart shows that the third yin line occupies a yang position, which is inappropriate, like someone who has fallen into a miserable situation. Poor start but good ending because the third yin line advances to meet the fourth yang line, like receiving help from someone stronger.

lines.white_explanation: Seeing a cart being pulled with the ox struggling with difficulty, and the driver is a slave whose forehead has been branded and nose cut off. Initially the cart is stuck, but eventually it moves.

lines.explanation: Isolated through opposition, one meets a noble person. Though dangerous, there will be good fortune through honest interaction.

image.text: Honest interaction brings no blame, intentions are realized.
image.explanation: Mutual trust ensures no disaster, indicating that one's goals are achieved.

lines.white_explanation: A traveler walks alone, meets a lame person, and both are captured together. The situation is dangerous but ultimately there is no misfortune.

lines.explanation: Regret vanishes. Your clansman bites through the skin. Going forward, what blame could there be?

image.text: Your clansman bites through the skin, going brings celebration.
image.explanation: Seeing clan members eating meat, continuing forward will bring joyous events.

lines.white_explanation: No regret. Seeing clan members eating meat, the lonely traveler happily joins them on the journey, and all remains safe.

lines.explanation: Isolated through opposition, one sees a pig covered with mud, a cart full of ghosts. First one draws the bow, then puts it down, realizing they are not bandits but marriage guests. Going forward, one meets rain and that is fortunate.

image.text: The fortunate meeting with rain means suspicions have disappeared.
image.explanation: The top yang line indicates a traveler encountering marriage party members, initial mutual suspicions nearly led to conflict, but then all was peaceful as they continued their journey. This is because their suspicions and fears dissolved.

lines.white_explanation: The traveler walks alone and sees a large pig lying on the road, then encounters a large cart full of strangely dressed people. The traveler draws his bow to shoot, but then lowers it. For these people are not bandits, but a marriage party. The traveler continues on, encountering heavy rain, but all remains peaceful.

daxiang: Fire reaches upward while lake moves downward; one rises and one falls, creating opposition. Also represents two women living together, a situation without proper order.
fortune: Bad luck in general, with difficulties in accomplishment. Like fire and water that cannot mix, one should remain calm amidst changes.
career: Career beginnings are difficult and circumstances are harsh. Success comes if people can achieve mutual trust and similar goals. Initially, only small matters will succeed. Small successes accumulated can lead to major accomplishments. Success comes through cooperation, failure through internal disagreement. Strengthen unity and find common ground despite differences. Most importantly, avoid internal suspicion.
business: Approach market competition with a calm and peaceful attitude, seeking commonality while maintaining differences. Do not view competitors as enemies; you can be harmonious without being overly close, connected without forming cliques. Especially avoid provoking disputes and work to prevent disasters.
fame: Strive to advance with a sincere heart. When necessary, don't completely avoid contact with bad people - adopt a tolerant and inclusive attitude with appropriate interactions. Even with like-minded people, one need not be completely identical - seek unity amid differences.
love: Both parties must treat each other with sincerity. Otherwise, third parties can easily intervene, and mutual suspicion between spouses will lead to family breakdown.
advice: You find yourself in a state of contradiction and opposition. Approach life with a magnanimous, peaceful and yielding attitude to maintain tranquility and advance gently. Recognize that unity will have separation, separation will have unity; differences exist within similarities, similarities exist within differences. Otherwise, extreme harshness creates violence, extreme clarity creates suspicion. Both violence and suspicion can be fatal.
health: Upper fire and lower dampness, truly difficult to treat.

name: Jian

kingWen.explanation: Advantage in the southwest, disadvantage in the northeast. It is beneficial to see a great person. Perseverance brings good fortune.

image.text: Water on the mountain, Jian. The superior person turns inward to cultivate virtue.
image.explanation: Water on the mountain, Jian. The superior person turns inward to cultivate virtue.

traditional.description: This hexagram combines two trigrams (Gen below, Kan above). Kan represents water, Gen represents mountain. The mountain is high and water is deep, creating numerous difficulties. When facing danger, one should stop, be wise and protect oneself – this is wisdom. Jian means difficult progress.

lines.explanation: Going forward brings hardship, coming back brings praise.

image.text: Going forward brings hardship, coming back brings praise, waiting is appropriate.
image.explanation: Difficulties when going out, comfort when returning home; recognizing difficulties and retreating, waiting for the right time.

lines.white_explanation: Going out brings difficulty, coming back brings comfort.

lines.explanation: The king's servant faces difficulty upon difficulty, not for his own sake.

image.text: The king's servant faces difficulty upon difficulty, ultimately without blame.
image.explanation: The king's official repeatedly encounters difficulties while acting with public spirit, ultimately without personal fault.

lines.white_explanation: The king's official repeatedly encounters difficulties, not for his personal benefit.

lines.explanation: Going forward brings difficulty, coming back brings return.

image.text: Going forward brings difficulty, coming back brings return, inner joy.
image.explanation: Going out faces numerous difficulties, returning brings a smiling face - this is joy from within.

lines.white_explanation: Going out faces numerous difficulties, returning brings a smiling face.

lines.explanation: Going forward brings difficulty, coming back brings connection.

image.text: Going forward brings difficulty, coming back brings connection, the position is correct.
image.explanation: Going out with difficult steps, returning with transport available, because the fourth yin line occupies an appropriate yin position, like someone with talents matching their position, naturally enjoying benefits.

lines.white_explanation: Going out with difficult steps, returning with transport available.

lines.explanation: Great difficulty, friends come.

image.text: Great difficulty, friends come, due to central correctness.
image.explanation: Facing great difficulties, receiving help from friends, because the fifth yang line occupies the central position of the upper trigram, representing someone with upright character who naturally receives aid.

lines.white_explanation: After experiencing many hardships and difficulties, great benefits finally arrive.

lines.explanation: Going forward brings difficulty, coming back brings greatness. Good fortune. It is beneficial to see a great person.

image.text: Going forward brings difficulty, coming back brings greatness, inner aspiration; beneficial to see a great person, following the noble.
image.explanation: Going out with great difficulty, returning with joy and excitement, indicating high spirits and determination to succeed. The text says: It is beneficial to meet noble persons, indicating that following noble people will bring benefits.

lines.white_explanation: Going out with great difficulty, returning with joy and excitement. For this line, good fortune, it is beneficial to meet noble persons and officials.

daxiang: Dangerous pitfalls ahead, high mountains behind, caught in a difficult position, like a lame person who finds it difficult to take steps.
fortune: Many disasters and difficulties, caught in a dilemma. At this time one should adhere to the right path and avoid rash actions, as movement will invite misfortune.
career: All endeavors have difficult beginnings, but persistence will bring good results. Life is not easy; one must first look to oneself, cultivating virtue and character. Maintain high aspirations and self-confidence, advancing bravely. When encountering difficulties, seek help from friends, avoid risky actions, overcome hardness with softness, wait for appropriate timing, and act according to one's ability.
business: Starting gradually, taking risks will only bring self-inflicted troubles. Strengthen business ethics, cooperate sincerely with others, and when others are in difficulty, do not refuse to help but should offer assistance wholeheartedly. Joint action can thrive in market competition.
fame: Progress step by step, strengthening self-cultivation. Remain quiet while observing action, await change, and seize opportunities to advance when possible. Maintain internal peace and do not risk pursuit of fame and fortune. Join with the worthy, follow the elevated, and you can turn danger into safety.
love: Not very smooth; do not rush, be careful in choosing. Self-awareness is important.
advice: Difficulties are unfavorable. But they can be seen as tests. Push forward with confidence, do not seek unnecessary suffering, connect with worthy people, help each other, adhere to the right path, and you can turn misfortune into blessing, achieving good results.
health: Foot ailment, take care.

name: Jie

kingWen.explanation: The southwest is favorable. If nowhere to go, returning brings good fortune. If somewhere to go, early action brings good fortune.

image.text: Thunder and rain appear, Jie. The superior person pardons errors and forgives crimes.
image.explanation: Thunder and rain appear, Jie. The superior person pardons errors and forgives crimes.

traditional.description: This hexagram combines two trigrams (Kan below, Zhen above). Zhen represents thunder, representing movement; Kan represents water, representing danger. Danger inside, movement outside. In severe winter, heaven and earth are sealed off, extreme stillness gives way to movement. All things renew, winter departs as spring arrives, everything dissolves - this is Jie (release).

lines.explanation: No blame.

image.text: At the junction of strength and gentleness, rightfully no blame.
image.explanation: The first yin connects with the second yang, representing the harmony between strong and gentle forces, like ruler and minister or husband and wife working together harmoniously, naturally avoiding disaster.

lines.white_explanation: For this line, no misfortune.

lines.explanation: Hunting gets three foxes and receives a yellow arrow. Perseverance brings good fortune.

image.text: The second yang's perseverance brings good fortune by following the middle path.
image.explanation: The second yang line speaks of divination bringing good fortune, because this line occupies the central position of the lower trigram, like someone whose actions follow the right path.

lines.white_explanation: Hunting yields three foxes, game carrying bronze arrowheads. Divination shows good fortune.

lines.explanation: Carrying things on one's back while riding in a carriage brings the approach of bandits. Perseverance brings humiliation.

image.text: Carrying things on one's back while riding in a carriage is shameful; by attracting weaponry, who is to blame?
image.explanation: Carrying many valuables, both on one's back and in a cart, attracting thieves - this is foolish and shameful. Since you've openly displayed wealth and attracted thieves, who else can you blame?

lines.white_explanation: Carrying many valuables, both on one's back and in a cart, attracting thieves, naturally leading to robbery. Divination shows signs of misfortune.

lines.explanation: Release your big toe; when a friend comes, trust him.

image.text: Release your big toe, the position is inappropriate.
image.explanation: Being lazy and unwilling to move indicates neglecting one's duties, not living up to one's position.

lines.white_explanation: Making money but being too lazy to leave, resulting in being captured.

lines.explanation: The superior person alone has dissolution; good fortune. He shows sincerity toward the mean man.

image.text: The superior person has dissolution, the inferior person retreats.
image.explanation: The superior person removes the inferior person from office, indicating the inferior person has been dismissed.

lines.white_explanation: The superior person is imprisoned then released, which is fortunate; the inferior person will be punished.

lines.explanation: The prince shoots a hawk on a high wall and obtains it. Everything is favorable.

image.text: The prince shoots a hawk, to eliminate rebellion.
image.explanation: The prince shoots a hawk, intending to remove the powerful and violent.

lines.white_explanation: On a high city wall, the prince shoots a hawk and captures it, which is not inauspicious.

daxiang: Spring thunder rolls, the earth thaws, symbolizing winter's departure and spring's arrival as life returns.
fortune: Seize the opportunity to quickly resolve surrounding difficulties. It is advisable to seek endeavors away from home, as benefactors are in the distance, with the southwest being the most auspicious direction.
career: Vitality is just beginning to recover; one should rest and recuperate. Calm and gentle behavior is preferable, with a relaxed and harmonious approach. When preparations are complete, act immediately, taking initiative without delay. Do not be greedy. Be diligent and frugal, balancing firmness with gentleness, emphasizing gentleness. Keep distance from petty people, unite with superior persons, support each other, and build your career together.
business: Action requires speed; be proactive to escape danger. When conducting business, follow the right path and avoid showing off. That would be foolish behavior that inevitably invites disaster.
fame: Just emerging from obscurity, continue to enrich yourself. Wait for the right moment to act. Especially stay away from petty people and draw close to virtuous and talented people to quickly improve yourself.
love: Should proceed at the appropriate time. Husband and wife working together harmoniously can maintain family harmony and avoid disaster.
advice: Steady approach is advisable; also avoid taking risks, as everything is still in the early stages of recovery. To achieve major development, you must be tolerant of others, govern with gentleness, make friends with the worthy, dismiss petty people, and use balanced, righteous methods with a combination of tension and relaxation to develop your emerging career.
health: Medicine cures the disease.

name: Sun

kingWen.explanation: There is sincerity, great good fortune, no blame. Can be persevered in. It is beneficial to undertake something. How is it to be used? Two baskets may be used for offering.

image.text: Lake beneath mountain, Sun. The superior person curbs anger and restrains desires.
image.explanation: Lake beneath mountain, Sun. The superior person curbs anger and restrains desires.

traditional.description: This hexagram consists of different trigrams (Lake below, Mountain above). Gen is mountain; Dui is lake. Above is mountain, below is lake, the great lake erodes the mountain's base. Decrease and increase alternate; within decrease there is increase, and within increase there is decrease. The two cannot be treated carelessly. Decreasing what is below to increase what is above governs the country, but excess will damage the foundation. Decrease when it should be decreased, but necessarily according to one's capacity and appropriately. Small decrease with increase is best.

lines.explanation: Going quickly to handle affairs brings no blame, deliberate on what to decrease.

image.text: Going quickly to handle affairs, still in accordance with one's will.
image.explanation: "One must hurry to attend the sacrificial ceremony," this reflects the mindset of respecting and fearing the spirits.

lines.white_explanation: For important sacrificial ceremonies, one should hurry to participate, then there will be no disaster. If offerings are too lavish, they may be appropriately reduced.

lines.explanation: Beneficial to be steadfast, unfortunate to go on an expedition. Not decreasing but increasing it.

image.text: The second yang line is beneficial when steadfast, because it takes the central position as its aim.
image.explanation: The second yang line speaks of a favorable divination because it occupies the central position in the lower trigram, like someone whose actions remain steadfast and correct.

lines.white_explanation: A favorable divination. Going to war would be unfortunate, because far from decreasing the enemy, it would actually benefit them.

lines.explanation: When three people travel together, one person is decreased; when one person travels alone, he finds companions.

image.text: When one person travels alone, three would create doubt.
image.explanation: When one person travels alone, they make their own decisions without constraints. When three travel together, each holds their own opinions, creating doubt.

lines.white_explanation: When three people travel together, differences of opinion are inevitable, and one will be isolated. When one travels alone, feeling lonely, they will actively seek companions.

lines.explanation: Decrease the illness, make haste to bring joy, no blame.

image.text: Decreasing the illness is indeed joyful.
image.explanation: "Seeking a shaman to perform rituals to eliminate illness" is a joyful matter.

lines.white_explanation: To eliminate illness, quickly seek a shaman to perform rituals to the spirits, then the condition will improve, and there will certainly be no disaster.

lines.explanation: Someone increases him with ten pairs of tortoise shells, which cannot be declined. Great good fortune.

image.text: The fifth yin line brings great good fortune, as there is blessing from above.
image.explanation: The fifth yin line speaks of great good fortune because heaven blesses him by bestowing a spiritual tortoise, therefore great good fortune.

lines.white_explanation: Someone gives him a tortoise valued at ten pairs of shells, which cannot be refused. Obtaining the tortoise for divination is a matter of great good fortune.

lines.explanation: Not decreasing it but increasing it, no blame. Perseverance brings good fortune. It is beneficial to undertake something. One obtains servants but no family.

image.text: Not decreasing but increasing it, fully achieving one's aims.
image.explanation: Don't decrease, don't increase, maintain impartiality and the middle way. Acting this way, one's lifelong ambitions can be realized.

lines.white_explanation: Don't decrease, don't increase, let it remain as is. No disaster, divination shows a favorable omen. For this line, if you undertake something, you will certainly gain, and will obtain a single servant.

daxiang: The mountain is high and the water is deep, each in its proper place, symbolizing gain through loss.
fortune: Currently all matters are not going smoothly, with signs of financial loss, although there will be loss first, later there will be gain, turning misfortune into blessing.
career: Developing a career necessarily requires investment. How much to invest should be calculated carefully in advance, striving for appropriate balance between loss and gain. All matters should have moderation, avoiding deception and greed. Self-discipline is most difficult, so one must strictly demand of oneself, work hard, be flexible in methods, and strive for career success.
business: Thoroughly investigate market conditions, calculate the ratio between investment and return. Don't be overly concerned with profit margins; gaining profit is sufficient. Sincerely cooperate with others, trust each other, use flexible methods, and avoid self-isolation.
fame: For growth and progress, one must necessarily invest and put into practice. Increase through decrease, achieving ideals.
love: Fully weigh the other's strengths and weaknesses. Focus on the important aspects.
advice: One is intelligent and good at weighing advantages and disadvantages. Follow natural development laws, actively cooperate with others, take joy in helping people, invest appropriately, assist others, and be frugal rather than extravagant. This way, all matters can proceed very smoothly.
health: Cultivate body and mind.

name: Yi

kingWen.explanation: Beneficial to undertake something. Beneficial to cross the great water.

image.text: Wind and thunder, Yi. The superior person, seeing good, moves toward it; having faults, corrects them.
image.explanation: Wind and thunder, Yi. The superior person, seeing good, moves toward it; having faults, corrects them.

traditional.description: This hexagram consists of different trigrams (Thunder below, Wind above). Sun is wind; Zhen is thunder. Wind and thunder stir together, their force growing stronger, the thunder louder, wind and thunder assist each other and grow together, mutually beneficial. This hexagram is the opposite of the Sun hexagram. It decreases the above to benefit the below, while the latter decreases the below to benefit the above. The two hexagrams explain the principle of decrease and increase.

lines.explanation: It is beneficial to undertake great works. Great good fortune, no blame.

image.text: Great good fortune, no blame, as those below do not neglect service.
image.explanation: Great good fortune, and no disaster, because the people work hard, accelerating the progress of the project.

lines.white_explanation: Encountering this line, it is favorable for major construction projects, great good fortune, and no disaster.

lines.explanation: Someone increases him with ten pairs of tortoise shells, which cannot be declined. Perpetual perseverance brings good fortune. The king uses it to present offerings to the Lord, good fortune.

image.text: Someone increases him, it comes from outside.
image.explanation: Someone gives us a precious tortoise, indicating that this great tortoise is sent from outside.

lines.white_explanation: Someone bestows a tortoise valued at ten pairs of shells, one cannot refuse the command. Divination shows a long-lasting favorable omen. The king makes offerings to the Lord, it is favorable.

lines.explanation: Being increased through unfortunate events, no blame. With sincerity advancing the middle way, report to the lord using a jade tablet.

image.text: Being increased through unfortunate events, it is the natural way.
image.explanation: Because of a death, increasing offerings to the spirits, this is natural reasoning.

lines.white_explanation: Because of King Wu's death, increasing offerings to the spirits, no disaster. Wu Geng took advantage of the mourning period to rebel, the Duke of Zhou sent troops to suppress it, achieving a great victory, capturing prisoners. Zhong Yan reported to the Duke of Zhou, thus performing sacrifices.

lines.explanation: Advancing the middle way, reporting to the lord, who follows. It is beneficial to use this for relocating the capital.

image.text: Reporting to the lord, who follows, to increase harmony.
image.explanation: The Duke of Zhou followed the king's command, showing the unity between ruler and minister became more solid.

lines.white_explanation: Zhong Yan reported to the Duke of Zhou about handling the Yin-Shang remnants, the Duke of Zhou agreed, and smoothly distributed the Yin-Shang people to various fiefdoms.

lines.explanation: With sincerity and a benevolent heart, do not ask about great good fortune. Sincerity blesses my virtue.

image.text: With sincerity and a benevolent heart, do not ask about it anymore. Blessing my virtue, fully achieving one's aims.
image.explanation: Capturing many prisoners, pacifying them, not investigating their responsibility, making them grateful for my kindness, showing this can win people's hearts.

lines.white_explanation: Capturing many prisoners, pacifying them, no need to investigate, great good fortune. These prisoners will be grateful for my kindness.

lines.explanation: None increase him, some even attack him. Maintaining this mindset is not constant, misfortune.

image.text: None increase him, this is a comprehensive statement. Some attack him, it comes from outside.
image.explanation: No one helps him, this is a comprehensive statement, indicating a complete lack of assistants. Some attack him, indicating the attack comes from outside.

lines.white_explanation: No one helps him, and some even attack him. In such a situation, if one's determination is not firm, things will go wrong.

daxiang: Strong wind with fast thunder, the image of growing strength and prestige; the eldest son with the eldest daughter, husband and wife united, increasing descendants.
fortune: Currently in a fortunate period, can gain the help of noble people to succeed, should bestow kindness on others, giving is more blessed than receiving.
career: Invest boldly, bravely support others' careers, both sides will benefit. Move forward bravely, dare to act. As long as one's heart is kind, pure, and humble, career will definitely increase day by day, with limitless prospects. Help others promptly, in times of need. When developing a business, internal unity is essential, following people's hearts, establishing perseverance, not afraid of difficulties and dangers.
business: Do not pursue small profits, benefit customers, and one will certainly gain substantial profits in return. Beware of insatiable greed. When encountering danger, seek advice from others, obtain honest assistance.
fame: By sincerely bestowing kindness on others, one will certainly receive sincere returns and support, and success in career.
love: Love and care for each other, a good match determined by heaven.
advice: Be open-minded and happy to help others. Good interpersonal relationships bring support from many people. The key is to establish perseverance and overcome indecisiveness. Especially learn from those who excel beyond oneself, using their strength to enrich and develop oneself. Establish necessary risk-taking spirit. Normally be kind to others. Therefore, even when encountering danger, one will receive help from others.
health: Liver fire is too strong.

name: Guai

kingWen.explanation: Displayed in the royal court, faithful proclamation brings danger. Informing one's own city is not advantageous for military action, but advantageous to have somewhere to go.

image.text: Lake above heaven, Guai. The superior person dispenses rewards to those below, and is cautious when residing in virtue.
image.explanation: Lake above heaven, Guai. The superior person dispenses rewards to those below, and is cautious when residing in virtue.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by the superimposition of different trigrams (lower Qian over upper Dui). Qian represents heaven and strength; Dui represents lake and joy. Lake vapor rises, forming rain that falls on the earth, moistening all things. Five yang lines removing one yin line, the removal is not difficult, decisive action (to remove) is sufficient, thus it is called Guai, which means decisive removal.

lines.explanation: Strong in the front toes, going forward without sufficient strength brings misfortune.

image.text: Going without sufficient strength brings misfortune.
image.explanation: Proceeding with insufficient foot strength will bring disaster.

lines.white_explanation: The toes are injured, yet still going forward, disaster will come from insufficient strength.

lines.explanation: Alarmed outcry, enemy at night, do not worry.

image.text: Enemy attack, do not worry, because one follows the middle way.
image.explanation: Enemy invasion is no cause for concern, because the second yang line occupies the middle position of the lower trigram, like one who follows the correct middle path.

lines.white_explanation: Crying out in fear, enemies coming at night, but no need for concern.

lines.explanation: Strong in the cheekbones, there is misfortune. The superior person moves decisively and walks alone, encountering rain gets wet, bringing resentment but no blame.

image.text: The superior person moves decisively, in the end there is no blame.
image.explanation: The superior person hurries along alone, but ultimately meets no disaster.

lines.white_explanation: The cheekbones are injured, this is an ominous sign. The superior person hurries along alone, encounters rain and gets soaked, which is unpleasant, but there is no disaster.

lines.explanation: Buttocks without skin, one's movement is halting. Leading a sheep brings regret that vanishes, hearing words but not believing them.

image.text: Walking with difficulty, because the position is not correct; not believing what one hears, intelligent but not understanding.
image.explanation: Walking with difficulty, because the fourth yang line occupies a yin position, like one in an unfavorable situation. Not believing others' warnings shows that while one may hear well, one does not understand principles.

lines.white_explanation: The buttocks are injured, walking is stumbling. Leading a sheep, one regrets losing it, due to not believing what others warned.

lines.explanation: Small horned goat leaping about, following the middle path brings no blame.

image.text: Following the middle path brings no blame, as the middle has not yet been fully illuminated.
image.explanation: Following the middle path merely results in avoiding disaster, probably because the middle way has not been promoted and implemented widely.

lines.white_explanation: A small horned goat jumping about in the middle of the road, for this line there is no disaster.

lines.explanation: No sound, in the end there is misfortune.

image.text: The misfortune of no sound is that ultimately it cannot last.
image.explanation: A country without orders will certainly meet with danger, indicating that national decline cannot be sustained.

lines.white_explanation: A dog is crying, predicting that ultimately there will be dangerous events.

daxiang: Lake water accumulates and overflows causing disaster, reaching the sky. Also five yang lines in their powerful state must eliminate the only yin line, so one yin stands isolated.
fortune: Although currently auspicious, difficulties and changes are brewing. One should remain vigilant, avoid arrogance, and beware of verbal disputes.
career: In a flourishing stage, but already pregnant with widespread danger. One must bestow grace on others, not be arrogant about achievements, actively unite with others, and avoid risky matters. Remain vigilant at all times to prevent sabotage by petty people. However, one should not be rash, but use moderate means to decisively deal with villains, avoiding going too far.
business: The market is moving toward decline, not suitable for large-scale activity, be ready to change direction at any time. When developing new areas, strengthen cooperation with others. But pay full attention to ill-intentioned deceitful people who may take the opportunity to disrupt and sabotage.
fame: Humbly seek advice and strengthen your capabilities. But act according to your abilities, do not be blindly arrogant. Even more importantly, do not join with petty people, seeking empty fame while ruining your career.
love: Beware of being tricked by matchmakers, and pay attention to the other party's intentions.
advice: One's character is contradictory, often outwardly strong but inwardly weak, failing at critical moments. Humbly listen to others' advice, avoid rashness, think deeply, and treat people and handle affairs with a gentle attitude.
health: Regulate your breathing.

name: Gou

kingWen.explanation: The woman is strong, do not take her as wife.

image.text: Wind under heaven, Gou. The king uses this to proclaim his decrees to the four directions.
image.explanation: Wind under heaven, Gou. The king uses this to proclaim his decrees to the four directions.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by the superimposition of different trigrams (lower Sun over upper Qian). Qian represents heaven, Sun represents wind. Wind below heaven blows across the earth, yin and yang come together, all things flourish abundantly. The Gou hexagram is the opposite of the Guai hexagram, they are mutual 'composite hexagrams'. Gou means encounter, the meeting of yin and yang. But with five yang and one yin, they cannot stay together for long.

lines.explanation: Tethered to a metal stake, perseverance brings good fortune. To set forth would be dangerous. A lean pig struggles in fetters.

image.text: Tethered to a metal stake, the soft way is constrained.
image.explanation: A fine thread attached to a bronze stake means the soft is controlled by the hard, like the weak depending on the strong, bringing good fortune.

lines.white_explanation: A fine thread attached to a bronze stake. This is an auspicious omen. If asking about going somewhere, there will be danger, like a weak pig being dragged back unwillingly.

lines.explanation: There is fish in the wrap, no blame, not favorable for guests.

image.text: There is fish in the wrap, not enough to extend to guests.
image.explanation: There is fish in the kitchen, having fish but no meat, a sign of modest prosperity, not suitable for lavishly entertaining guests.

lines.white_explanation: There is fish in the kitchen. For this line, there is no disaster, but it is not favorable for entertaining guests.

lines.explanation: Buttocks without skin, movement is difficult. Dangerous, but no great blame.

image.text: Movement is difficult, because there is no one to support.
image.explanation: Walking is difficult because there is no one to provide support.

lines.white_explanation: The buttocks are injured, walking is difficult. For this line, there is danger, but no great disaster.

lines.explanation: No fish in the wrap, misfortune arises.

image.text: The misfortune of no fish is being distant from the people.
image.explanation: No fish in the kitchen line shows that the person will meet with misfortune. Because the fourth yang line occupies a yin position, like a king who has lost his authority, separated from the people.

lines.white_explanation: No fish in the kitchen. This line indicates that any action will bring misfortune.

lines.explanation: Using willow to wrap a melon, containing brilliance, something falls from heaven.

image.text: The fifth yang line contains brilliance, correct and centered; something falls from heaven, showing that the will does not abandon its mission.
image.explanation: The fifth yang line's reference to containing brilliance refers to the fifth yang line occupying the middle position of the upper trigram, like one who embodies the virtue of the correct middle path. Falling from heaven means that noble aspirations cannot be fulfilled, so one sacrifices life to fulfill one's mission.

lines.white_explanation: A gourd melon grows entwined around a willow tree, the hidden melon patterns look beautiful. Suddenly a melon falls from above.

lines.explanation: Meeting with its horns, humiliating but no blame.

image.text: Meeting with its horns, ultimate humiliation.
image.explanation: Encountering a wild beast, caught under its horns, because the top yang line is at the very end of the hexagram, like one in a desperate situation.

lines.white_explanation: Encountering a wild beast, caught under its horns, not a good sign, but no major disaster.

daxiang: Wind penetrates everywhere, exposing all bodies in the places it blows, each encounters it without exception, signifying a chance meeting.
fortune: Yin grows while yang wanes, beware of romantic entanglements, all matters are obstructed, proceed with caution.
career: Adapt to circumstances and follow the sequence of time. But there are potential crises, yin and yang are not in harmony. One must attach oneself to the strong, make multiple connections, strengthen one's position, prevent petty people from taking advantage, and strive for improved conditions. In all matters, prepare early, wait for the right opportunity, and act immediately once conditions mature.
business: The market is moving from prosperity toward decline and danger, it is best to withdraw early; forced development is dangerous. There are no upright people to help, but there are petty people scheming in the dark. For this, one must maintain a clear head, seek reliable partners, be patient while waiting for the right time, in order to develop business activities again.
fame: One's character is not very sociable, internally overestimating oneself, inevitably leading to difficulties and lack of achievement. One should seek support from sincere and upright people, and succeed with their assistance.
love: Strictly examine the moral character of the other party, avoid falling into 'triangular' entanglements. Spouses should treat each other sincerely, turning danger into safety.
advice: Auspicious. One can develop smoothly in a favorable environment, but must never take risks, lest one achieve the opposite effect. Next is to guard at all times against the harm of petty people nearby. For this reason, one should stop evil before it gathers strength, better to be isolated than to associate with petty people.
health: Beware of stroke.

name: Cui

kingWen.explanation: Success. The king approaches his temple. It is advantageous to see the great man, which brings success. It is beneficial to be correct. Using great sacrificial animals brings good fortune. It is advantageous to have somewhere to go.

image.text: Lake above the Earth, Cui. The superior person prepares weapons and remains vigilant against unexpected events.
image.explanation: Lake above the Earth, Cui. The superior person prepares weapons and remains vigilant against unexpected events.

traditional.description: This hexagram consists of different trigrams (Kun below, Dui above). Kun represents earth and compliance; Dui represents lake and water. The lake overflows and floods the earth, people gather and compete with each other, crises are inevitable. One must follow the heavens and employ the worthy, prepare in advance, be gentle yet pleasant. With mutual benefit, all can live and work in peace. Cui means gathering and unity.

lines.explanation: Having sincerity that is not maintained until the end, then disorder and gathering ensue. If there is calling out, one handful becomes laughter. Do not worry, going forward brings no blame.

image.text: Disorder and then gathering, the will is confused.
image.explanation: Chaos and exhaustion, one's mental state is confused.

lines.white_explanation: Captives were taken but escaped, causing confusion and worry. People shouted and searched everywhere. Finally, they were recaptured, bringing happy laughter. No need to worry. For this line, going forward brings no trouble.

lines.explanation: Attracting good fortune, no blame. Sincerity is advantageous for the spring sacrifice.

image.text: Attracting good fortune without blame, because the middle position is unchanged.
image.explanation: Long-lasting good fortune without disaster, because the second yin line occupies the middle position of the lower trigram, symbolizing one who firmly adheres to the correct path without changing.

lines.white_explanation: For this line, long-lasting good fortune without disaster. Regarding sacrificial matters, the divination indicates: spring sacrifices should use captives as human offerings for best results.

lines.explanation: Gathering and sighing, nothing is advantageous. Going brings no blame, but slight difficulties.

image.text: Going forward without blame, because of compliance with those above.
image.explanation: Going forward without disaster, because the third yin line is below the fourth yang line, like a minister following the ruler, acting cautiously.

lines.white_explanation: Worried sighing. For this line, nothing is advantageous. Going forward brings no disaster, but there will be small troubles.

lines.explanation: Great good fortune, no blame.

image.text: Great good fortune without blame, despite the position not being correct.
image.explanation: The divination originally indicated great good fortune, but the result is merely avoiding disaster, because the fourth yang line occupies a yin position, like someone with little talent and virtue occupying a high position. Regarding official career, it indicates success, but regarding conduct in office, it merely seeks to avoid disaster.

lines.white_explanation: Great good fortune, no disaster.

lines.explanation: Gathering and having position, no blame. Not sincere, but with eternal correctness, regret vanishes.

image.text: Gathering with position, but the will is not yet bright.
image.explanation: Working hard in one's position, the result is merely avoiding disaster, because talents are limited and unable to achieve significant accomplishments.

lines.white_explanation: Working diligently in one's position, without disaster. Not being quick to punish others, divination about long-term fortune shows: no great regrets.

lines.explanation: Sighing and weeping with tears, no blame.

image.text: Sighing and weeping with tears, not yet secure in the high position.
image.explanation: Sighing and weeping, deeply worried, because the top yin line is at the very end of the hexagram, suspended alone without support, like someone in a high position but walking on thin ice, living in fear every day.

lines.white_explanation: Sighing and weeping, deeply worried, but no disaster.

daxiang: Lake above the earth, water gathering in the soil, nourishing plants, growing abundantly.
fortune: Auspicious fortune flourishing, with support from elders, career greatly benefits, but beware of financial disputes.
career: Prosperous and developing, united and harmonious. Currently thriving, but where there is much water there can be flooding, and where there are many people competition will inevitably be fierce. Prosperity leads to decline, so do not be arrogant; caution is best. But don't hesitate either; it's advisable to move forward bravely and develop new business. Serve the masses with noble character.
business: Sincere cooperation, unity and mutual assistance. Encouragement is a sign of business prosperity. Boldly develop markets, advance steadily, be prepared for the unexpected, and continuous development can be achieved.
fame: Relying solely on personal effort won't lead to great achievements; one must obtain help from others, which combined with personal qualifications can reach an ideal level.
love: Do not rush for results; love each other for a beautiful and happy relationship.
advice: Good at uniting with others for cooperation, possessing leadership ability. But be broad-minded with a far-reaching vision. Take integrity and righteousness as the foundation, without losing principles. Especially important is to strictly require of yourself while being tolerant of others. When facing opposition from others, seriously reflect on yourself to learn lessons. With this mindset in dealing with the world, lifelong peace can be achieved and career will surely succeed.
health: Chest and abdomen water swelling, seek treatment early.

name: Sheng

kingWen.explanation: Supreme success. Seeing the great man is advantageous. Do not worry, a southern expedition brings good fortune.

image.text: Wood growing from within the earth, Sheng. The superior person cultivates virtue and accumulates small things to achieve greatness.
image.explanation: Wood growing from within the earth, Sheng. The superior person cultivates virtue and accumulates small things to achieve greatness.

traditional.description: This hexagram consists of different trigrams (Xun below, Kun above). Kun represents earth and compliance; Xun represents wood and yielding. The earth grows trees, which gradually grow taller and stronger, symbolizing career advancement step by step, with bright future prospects, thus it is named 'Sheng' (Ascending).

lines.explanation: Advancing with confidence, great good fortune.

image.text: Advancing with confidence brings great good fortune, because it aligns with the will above.
image.explanation: Progressing and developing, great good fortune, meaning it still conforms to one's intentions.

lines.white_explanation: Progress and development, great good fortune.

lines.explanation: Sincerity is advantageous in making offerings, no blame.

image.text: The sincerity of the second yang line brings happiness.
image.explanation: The second yang line speaks of worshiping spirits with sincerity, which will bring joyous events.

lines.white_explanation: Spring sacrifices should use captives as human offerings, then there will be no disaster.

lines.explanation: Ascending to an empty city.

image.text: Ascending to an empty city, there is nothing to doubt.
image.explanation: Climbing to a city built on a great hill, with a high vantage point, one can see clearly, thus there is no doubt.

lines.white_explanation: Climbing to a city built on a great hill.

lines.explanation: The king makes offerings at Mount Qi, auspicious, no blame.

image.text: The king makes offerings at Mount Qi, following the proper way.
image.explanation: The Zhou king making offerings to spirits at Mount Qi is auspicious and without disaster because this accords with natural principles.

lines.white_explanation: The Zhou king makes offerings to spirits at Mount Qi. For this line, auspicious, without disaster.

lines.explanation: Correctness brings good fortune, ascending step by step.

image.text: Correctness brings good fortune and ascending the steps means greatly achieving one's will.
image.explanation: Adhering to the right path naturally brings good fortune, and one's career will develop step by step, indicating that one's aspirations are fulfilled and goals achieved.

lines.white_explanation: A good omen is obtained; the matter in question will develop step by step.

lines.explanation: Ascending in darkness, advantageous to be constantly correct.

image.text: Ascending in darkness at the top, not wealthy enough for enrichment.
image.explanation: The top yin line speaks of sleepless in the deep night, because the top yin line occupies the highest position in the hexagram, hanging alone. Though in a high position, the environment is unfavorable; however, diligence in one's duties can avert disaster and bring blessings.

lines.white_explanation: Sleepless in the deep night, working diligently without rest conforms to this good omen.

daxiang: Trees from the ground constantly growing upward, showing an upward advancing trend.
fortune: Fame and wealth both achieved, with a symbol of development and good fortune; advantageous to develop southward.
career: Very smooth, continuously developing, advancing with the times, step by step upward, with great future prospects. However, one should develop gradually and not rush forward despite success. Be cautious, cultivate virtue, follow virtuous predecessors, and approach your career with sincerity.
business: Follow business ethics, start from small matters, gradually expand, through your own diligence, compete sincerely, steadiness is best, avoid rash mistakes that could lead to major errors.
fame: Work hard at learning, strengthen self-cultivation, and with your intelligence and wisdom, you will surely succeed. If someone recommends you, your prospects will be even broader. But moderation should be noted.
love: Both parties treat each other with sincerity, gradually cultivating feelings, success is certain.
advice: Everything goes as wished.
