Intelligent, flexible, with a good foundation for success, demanding of yourself, humble and compliant, modestly seeking guidance from elders, developing your career gradually and steadily, you will grow like a tree, eventually becoming a pillar of society. But during the growth process, be careful everywhere, persevere in sincerity and uprightness, and advance boldly.
health: Liver fire gradually rising, seek early treatment.

name: Kun

kingWen.explanation: Success through perseverance. Great men will have good fortune without blame. Words may not be trusted.

image.text: Lake without water, Kun. The superior person sacrifices his life to fulfill his purpose.
image.explanation: Lake without water, Kun. The superior person sacrifices his life to fulfill his purpose.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed from different trigrams (lower Kan over upper Dui). Dui is yin and represents a lake symbolizing joy; Kan is yang and represents water symbolizing danger. The lake water indicates oppression, trapped in difficult circumstances, where talents cannot be displayed easily, yet by adhering to the correct path, finding joy within oneself, one can accomplish tasks and escape from difficulty.

lines.explanation: Buttocks confined by a tree stump, entering a dark valley, for three years not seen.

image.text: Entering into a dark valley, darkness without clarity.
image.explanation: Entering a deep mountain valley, naturally dark and unclear.

lines.white_explanation: Buttocks injured by prison guard's rod, thrown into a dark cell, not seen for three years.

lines.explanation: Troubled by wine and food, crimson ribbons approach. Beneficial to make offerings. Going forward brings misfortune, but no blame.

image.text: Troubled by wine and food, blessings are in the middle.
image.explanation: Drunk and not yet sober, heaven bestows garments of high rank, because the second yang line occupies the middle position of the lower trigram, which is a sign of forthcoming happy events.

lines.white_explanation: Drunk and not yet sober, barbarians wearing red clothes come to invade, trouble arrives suddenly, should quickly make offerings to gods for protection. Regarding inquiries about military expeditions, there is danger. For other matters, there is no great disaster.

lines.explanation: Confined by stones, resting against thorny bushes. Entering his house, not seeing his wife, misfortune.

image.text: Resting against thorny bushes, riding the strong; entering his house, not seeing his wife, inauspicious.
image.explanation: Tripped by stones, injured by thorns, repeatedly encountering difficulties because the third yin line is above the second yang line, like a weak person attaching to a violent one, necessarily controlled and intimidated. Returning home to find his wife gone is an inauspicious sign.

lines.white_explanation: Tripped by stones, injured by thorns, returning home with difficulty only to find his wife gone, this is an ominous sign.

lines.explanation: Coming slowly, confined in a golden carriage, humiliation, but there is an end.

image.text: Coming slowly, one's aspiration is lower. Although not in the right position, there is assistance.
image.explanation: Walking slowly, not seeking to advance quickly, shows humble aspirations. The fourth yang line is below the fifth, like someone willing to be in a lower position; because of this humble attitude, one can receive help.

lines.white_explanation: The person is detained in a prison cart, approaching slowly. Very unfortunate, but is eventually released.

lines.explanation: Nose cut off and feet amputated, oppressed by crimson ribbons. Gradually there is liberation. It is favorable to make offerings.

image.text: Nose cut off and feet amputated, one's purpose has not been achieved. Gradually there is liberation, through upright centrality. Making offerings is beneficial for receiving blessings.
image.explanation: Nose cut off, legs amputated, indicating one who is unsuccessful and in dangerous circumstances. Later slowly escaping from danger, because the fifth yang line occupies the central position of the upper trigram, like someone who is upright and can transform danger into safety. It is appropriate to make offerings to spirits, for the line indication shows: seeking protection from spirits will bring blessings.

lines.white_explanation: Nose cut off, legs amputated, captured by barbarians wearing red clothes. Later slowly finding a chance to escape, finally returning home. Appropriate to urgently make offerings to gods in gratitude.

lines.explanation: Confined by vines, in distress and danger, saying 'Movement brings regret.' Having regrets, going forward brings good fortune.

image.text: Confined by vines, not in the right position. Moving brings regret with regret, good fortune in action.
image.explanation: Tripped by vines, because behavior is inappropriate. Realizing that movement brings regret will lead to humble and careful action that meets with good fortune.

lines.white_explanation: Tripped by vines, injured by small wooden stakes, circumstances so difficult that one should not take action, otherwise regret will be added to regret. Regarding inquiries about military expeditions, the omen is favorable.

daxiang: Water below the lake, nothing grows, symbolizing the gentleman in distress while petty people overflow.
fortune: Everything is unsatisfactory, like a dragon playing in shallow waters teased by shrimp.
career: Circumstances are very unfavorable, facing great difficulties. Life faces a major test; using improper methods will lead deeper into trouble. Conversely, if one maintains integrity in adversity, encourages and strengthens oneself, and remains calm, one will not lose purpose and can eventually succeed.
business: Facing fierce competition with high possibility of bankruptcy. Do not despair, but struggle in difficult circumstances. For this, one can only rely on daily self-cultivation. Seriously reflect on one's behavior, summarize lessons learned, start anew, but avoid being impetuous; advance slowly. Also, be vigilant about becoming arrogant due to wealth and success, which can lead to new difficulties.
fame: Haste does not lead to success. One should proceed with a humble attitude, advancing slowly, and especially have firm aspirations, as only determination can promote career success.
love: Handle with an optimistic attitude and calmness, especially emphasizing character.
advice: Though intelligent and wise, talents remain unrecognized. If one does not lose confidence due to difficulties, persists in striving upward, abandons thoughts of luck, perseveres unwaveringly, while one may not fully realize one's ideals, there will eventually be achievements.
health: Kidney water is depleted, danger is imminent.

name: Jing

kingWen.explanation: The town may change but the well does not, it brings neither loss nor gain. People come and go at the well. If the rope does not reach the water, or if the bucket breaks, this is misfortune.

image.text: Wood above water, Jing. The superior person encourages the people to help each other through work.
image.explanation: Wood above water, Jing. The superior person encourages the people to help each other through work.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed from different trigrams (lower Xun over upper Kan). Kan represents water; Xun represents wood. Trees flourish when they receive water. People rely on wells for living, and wells are dug by people. They nourish each other; wells nourish people with water, lasting endlessly, and people should take this virtue to diligently encourage themselves.

lines.explanation: A muddy well is not eaten from, an old well has no birds.

image.text: A muddy well is not eaten from, it is low. An old well has no birds, it has been abandoned.
image.explanation: Well water is turbid and inedible because mud has fallen in. The collapsed trap can no longer contain wild animals, indicating people have abandoned this trap.

lines.white_explanation: Well water is turbid and inedible. The collapsed trap can no longer contain wild animals.

lines.explanation: At the wellspring, shooting fish with arrows, the jug is broken and leaks.

image.text: Shooting fish at the wellspring, without help.
image.explanation: At the well mouth, shooting small fish in the well with a bow, seeking food and survival this way shows this person has no support.

lines.white_explanation: At the well mouth, shooting small fish in the well with a bow. The water jar is both broken and leaking.

lines.explanation: The well is cleaned but not drunk from, which makes my heart ache. It can be used to draw water. When the king is clear-minded, all will receive his blessing.

image.text: The well is cleaned but not drunk from, this is painful. Seeking the king's clarity, blessings will be received.
image.explanation: Well water is dirty and cannot be used for drinking, this is a sigh induced by the scene. Hoping for the king's wisdom is looking forward to receiving benefits.

lines.white_explanation: The lord sees the well water is dirty and cannot be used for drinking, and feels pain for us. After cleaning it thoroughly, it can be drawn for drinking. The lord is wise; everyone receives their benefits.

lines.explanation: The well is lined with stone, no blame.

image.text: The well is lined with stone without blame, the well is being repaired.
image.explanation: Using brick and stone to build the well walls, progress is smooth, this is about repairing the well.

lines.white_explanation: Using brick and stone to build the well walls, progress is smooth.

lines.explanation: The well is clear and cold, drinkable.

image.text: Cold spring water for drinking, indicates correctness in the middle.
image.explanation: The fifth yang line speaks of clean water and cold springs, refreshing and palatable, because the fifth yang line occupies the middle position of the upper trigram, symbolizing a person who has found the way of the mean.

lines.white_explanation: Clean water and cold springs, refreshing and palatable, can be used for drinking.

lines.explanation: The well is drawn from but not covered, there is sincerity and great good fortune.

image.text: Great good fortune at the top, great accomplishment.
image.explanation: The top yin line speaks of great good fortune, because the top yin line is at the highest position of the hexagram, indicating this person has achieved high rank with great achievement.

lines.white_explanation: The trap is wider at the bottom and narrower at the top, very concealed, so it doesn't even need camouflage. Indeed, wild animals are captured, great good fortune.

daxiang: Water is absorbed by plants, nourishing the tree body, also symbolizing the bucket entering the well to draw water, indicating conservation and repetition.
fortune: The well is a static object that cannot move, so in all things one cannot take initiative or be proactive, and lacks momentum. It is better to remain calm.
career: In a stable state. One should neither rashly advance nor retreat, but with a positive attitude strive to study and improve oneself, enrich personal ability, and wait for opportunity, which will bring great achievement. Most feared is stagnation, which will lead to elimination for being out of touch with the times.
business: Market conditions are good, continue according to the original policy. At the same time, continue with the spirit of diligence and enterprise, sincerely develop the market, especially paying attention to cooperation with others, mutual assistance, and enriching and accumulating experience through practical activities.
fame: With proper purpose, contribute to society and therefore study diligently. Pay special attention to seeking guidance from virtuous people, to be discovered and recommended.
love: No need to rush, there will be a compatible partner.
advice: Clever, alert, and willing to help others. At the same time, there will be opportunities to fully display personal talents. As long as one can learn the spirit of the 'water well', sincerely dedicating oneself and continuously enriching one's talents, one will certainly be valued by society.
health: Kidney water is over-expanded, treat immediately.

name: Ge

kingWen.explanation: On the day of Ge, there is confidence. Supreme success. Beneficial to be correct. Regrets vanish.

image.text: Fire in the lake, Ge. The superior person regulates the calendar and clarifies the seasons.
image.explanation: Fire in the lake, Ge. The superior person regulates the calendar and clarifies the seasons.

traditional.description: This hexagram consists of different trigrams (lower Li over upper Dui). Li represents fire, Dui represents lake, with water inside. Water above flowing downward, fire below rising upward. Fire flourishes as water dries; large water extinguishes fire. They both generate and overcome each other, necessarily producing change. Change is the basic law of the universe.

lines.explanation: Wrapped firmly with yellow ox hide.

image.text: Wrapped with yellow ox hide, cannot take action.
image.explanation: Bound firmly with yellow ox hide, indicating the person is tightly restricted and cannot act.

lines.white_explanation: Using yellow ox hide to firmly secure (the war chariot).

lines.explanation: On the day of change, set forth. Auspicious, no blame.

image.text: Changing on one's day, the journey will be auspicious.
image.explanation: The sacrifice date must be changed, probably because there will be a joyous event.

lines.white_explanation: The sacrificial date needs to be changed. Consequently, one must divinate again about the campaign date, and the result is auspicious, without misfortune.

lines.explanation: Setting forth brings misfortune. Perseverance brings danger. After speaking of revolution three times, there is trust.

image.text: After speaking of revolution three times, where else can one go?
image.explanation: The prisoner repeatedly changes his testimony, necessitating repeated interrogation, showing that denial is useless and only confession of truth is possible.

lines.white_explanation: Setting forth, one suffers defeat. Divination shows a bad omen. However, if one rallies spirits, reorganizes equipment, and renews the battle, defeat can turn to victory, capturing the strong enemy alive.

lines.explanation: Regret vanishes. There is trust. Changing the mandate brings good fortune.

image.text: The good fortune of changing the mandate lies in gaining confidence in one's aspirations.
image.explanation: The fourth line speaks of the good fortune in changing leaders and generals, as this allows talented and virtuous people to fulfill their ambitions.

lines.white_explanation: There is no regret. Regarding the war inquiry, there are minor victories. If the commander is replaced, great fortune will follow.

lines.explanation: The great man changes like a tiger. Before divination, there is already trust.

image.text: The great man changes like a tiger, his pattern is brilliant.
image.explanation: The lord suddenly becomes angry, fierce as a tiger, showing his majestic appearance and radiant presence.

lines.white_explanation: The great lord suddenly becomes angry, transforming from gentle to fierce. Without divination, it is known he will win a great victory.

lines.explanation: The superior person changes like a leopard, while the inferior person changes only his face. Setting forth brings misfortune. Remaining correct brings good fortune.

image.text: The superior person changes like a leopard, his pattern is magnificent. The inferior person changes his face, to follow and obey his lord.
image.explanation: The superior person is invigorated, showing elegant and dignified demeanor. The inferior person reforms and changes, indicating a shift from evil to good, submitting to his lord.

lines.white_explanation: The superior person is invigorated, but the lower officials and soldiers behave contrary to normal. For this line, inquiring about military campaigns indicates danger. Inquiring about one's dwelling is auspicious.

daxiang: Dui is metal, being melted by Li fire, symbolizing revolution.
fortune: All things are in the midst of change; one should remove the old and establish the new to respond to the image of renewal.
career: At a critical turning point, one must pay close attention to various information and think carefully. First, consolidate your position and perfect your behavior. When the time is ripe, act immediately and actively implement changes. But ensure your motives are pure and methods proper, neither conservative nor rash, and your career will certainly flourish.
business: Market competition is extremely fierce. To remain undefeated, one must dare to boldly innovate and change business direction at the appropriate time. If setbacks occur, immediately learn from experience, rise again, and expand commercial activities. Pay attention to competitive methods.
fame: First, strive to improve yourself and perfect your knowledge and character. Meanwhile, follow superior instructions to do good work. The relationship between these two must be properly handled.
love: Some unexpected complications may arise; handle them calmly and maintain focused affection.
advice: Very auspicious and smooth. With your intelligence and wisdom, adapt to circumstances, act according to the principles of the times, reform elements that are becoming unsuitable, and strengthen your career. But be cautious; do not act rashly when conditions are not ripe, especially avoid seeking quick success. Think three times before acting.
health: Kidney water is drying up, liver fire is rising.

name: Ding

kingWen.explanation: Supreme good fortune, success.

image.text: Fire over wood, Ding. The superior person secures his position to consolidate his mandate.
image.explanation: Fire over wood, Ding. The superior person secures his position to consolidate his mandate.

traditional.description: This hexagram consists of different trigrams (lower Xun over upper Li). Burning wood to cook food transforms raw into cooked, suggesting removal of the old to introduce the new. The cauldron is a valuable and heavy vessel; its three legs symbolize stability. Cooking food symbolizes abundant food, with no more difficulties or troubles. On this foundation, it is appropriate to reform and develop undertakings.

lines.explanation: The cauldron is overturned and its feet point upward. It is favorable to remove evil. By taking a concubine for her son, one remains blameless.

image.text: The cauldron's feet point upward, but this is not contrary to propriety. It is favorable to remove evil, as this follows the noble's command.
image.explanation: Overturning the cauldron is not an act of rebellion. Eliminating evil people from court is following orders from above.

lines.white_explanation: Overturning the cauldron with its feet pointing upward. For this line, it is favorable to eliminate evil people. Taking a concubine due to being childless. Gaining a son through the concubine brings no misfortune.

lines.explanation: The cauldron is filled. My enemy has illness, but cannot reach me. Good fortune.

image.text: The cauldron is full, meaning one should be careful where one goes. My enemy has illness, and in the end there will be no blame.
image.explanation: Having food at home and living in comfort, one should still value one's household and be cautious about where one goes. The enemy is sick, so I can live in peace and ultimately will have no misfortune.

lines.white_explanation: The cauldron contains food. For this line, having food at home, while one's enemy is ill, and nothing else troubles me, is fortunate.

lines.explanation: The cauldron's ears are removed. Its progress is impeded. The pheasant's fat is not eaten. Rain falls, remorse is spent, and in the end there is good fortune.

image.text: The cauldron's ears are removed, indicating a loss of proper conduct.
image.explanation: The cauldron's ears have fallen off, indicating that one's actions are inappropriate.

lines.white_explanation: The cauldron's ears have fallen off. For this line, there is no hunting harvest. Do not consume all the game, as heaven will bring rain. It is uncertain when hunting can resume. Food reserves are being depleted. By practicing economy to overcome difficulty, one will ultimately find good fortune.

lines.explanation: The cauldron's leg breaks. The lord's feast is overturned, its form is stained. Misfortune.

image.text: Overturning the lord's feast, what will be the consequence?
image.explanation: Spilling the lord's delicious food suggests a person of slight virtue in a high position, or with insufficient strength for a heavy responsibility, thus causing failure in important matters of state. What will be the consequence?

lines.white_explanation: The cauldron's leg is too light and cannot bear the weight, causing it to break and spill the lord's delicacies, making juices splatter everywhere, looking messy. This is an ominous sign.

lines.explanation: The cauldron has yellow ears and golden handles. It is favorable to be correct.

image.text: The cauldron with yellow ears contains substantial reality.
image.explanation: A luxurious cauldron fitted with bronze ears and handles is expected to contain delicious food.

lines.white_explanation: A luxurious cauldron fitted with bronze ears and handles. This line is auspicious.

lines.explanation: The cauldron has jade handles. Great good fortune. Nothing is unfavorable.

image.text: With jade handles on top, there is proper balance between firmness and flexibility.
image.explanation: The top line speaks of jade handles attached to a metal cauldron, showing that firm and flexible elements are in contact, with upper and lower in proper positions, without disorder or encroachment.

lines.white_explanation: A metal cauldron with jade handles. Drawing this line brings great good fortune and universal benefit.

daxiang: Wood with Li fire above represents the image of cooking and preparing food. The cauldron signifies removing the old to establish the new, correcting errors and making improvements.
fortune: Fortune remains good and endeavors can succeed, but affairs should not be delayed, and be cautious of lawsuits.
career: You have all the conditions necessary to develop your career. With sharp hearing, clear vision, and a cool head, approach interpersonal relations and affairs with proper attitude, be strict with yourself, be careful from beginning to end, combine firmness with flexibility, cooperate with talented and virtuous people, and avoid rash action. Nothing will be unfavorable.
business: After much struggle, you can now develop your commercial activities relatively smoothly and overcome difficulties. If you adhere to business ethics, participate in fair competition, avoid rash action and improper thoughts, and maintain proper firmness, your business can greatly expand. However, if you don't balance income and expenditure and merely consume resources, you will certainly fail.
fame: First accumulate real virtue and knowledge, be strict with yourself, avoid entanglement in grievances with others, be flexible in upward movement, and advance gradually. With recognition from those who know talent, your prospects will be even greater.
love: Personal conditions are quite ideal and favorable, but don't be unrealistic.
advice: You are intelligent, quick to respond, mentally agile, and capable of adapting to changing circumstances, times, and situations. Therefore, your future is promising. Even if temporarily unrecognized with no way forward, there is no concern, as you will ultimately realize your ambitions.
health: Liver fire is rising; treat by regulating qi.

name: Zhen

kingWen.explanation: Success. Thunder comes with shock and fear, followed by laughing conversation. Thunder startles for a hundred miles, yet one does not lose the ritual ladle and cup.

image.text: Continuous thunder, Zhen. The superior person is fearful and cultivates self-examination.
image.explanation: Continuous thunder, Zhen. The superior person is fearful and cultivates self-examination.

traditional.description: This hexagram consists of identical trigrams (Thunder below, Thunder above) stacked together. Thunder represents sudden movements; two thunder trigrams stacked create tremendous resonance that can dispel stagnant energy, leading to smooth progress. In ordinary times, one should remain vigilant while at peace, maintaining a sense of caution without becoming negligent. When sudden events occur, one can remain calm and continue with normal conversation.

lines.explanation: Thunder approaches with trembling fear, later followed by laughing conversation, good fortune.

image.text: Thunder approaches with trembling fear, as fear may bring blessings. Laughing conversation follows because one gains experience with time.
image.explanation: When thunder first arrives, one trembles with fear because respecting major heavenly phenomena can bring blessings. Later being able to converse calmly during thunder indicates gaining experience with such events.

lines.white_explanation: Thunder arrives, causing trembling fear. Later, when hearing thunder again, one can still converse normally, which is auspicious.

lines.explanation: Thunder brings danger, perhaps losing wealth. Climbing nine hills, do not pursue; in seven days it will be recovered.

image.text: Thunder brings danger when riding strong forces.
image.explanation: During lightning and thunder, crossing nine mountains indicates a person endangered by the elements, in a perilous situation.

lines.white_explanation: Lightning and thunder create great danger; in panic, one loses money and coins. Climbing over mountains and traveling far to search proves fruitless. The diviner says, 'No need to search further, within seven or eight days, this loss will be compensated.'

lines.explanation: Thunder causes anxiety, yet moving forward brings no misfortune.

image.text: Thunder causes anxiety because the position is incorrect.
image.explanation: When encountering lightning and thunder while going out, one feels apprehensive, as the third yin line occupies a yang position, indicating an unfavorable situation.

lines.white_explanation: When encountering lightning and thunder while going out, one feels apprehensive. Continuing forward will bring no disaster.

lines.explanation: Thunder strikes into mud.

image.text: Thunder strikes into mud, lacking brilliance.
image.explanation: The person is startled by sudden thunder and falls into mud, showing limited experience and courage.

lines.white_explanation: Lightning strikes down, connecting with the ground.

lines.explanation: Thunder moves back and forth with danger, yet nothing is lost, there are concerns.

image.text: Thunder moves back and forth with danger, traveling perilously. The matter is central, so there is no great loss.
image.explanation: Massive thunder rumbles, with danger ahead, suggesting one's actions will be dangerous. But since the matter aligns with principles, there will be no great loss.

lines.white_explanation: Massive thunder rumbles, with danger ahead. With caution, disaster can be avoided without affecting the matter.

lines.explanation: Thunder causes trembling fear and wide-eyed alertness. Moving forward brings misfortune. Thunder not on oneself but on one's neighbor brings no blame. Marriage has complaints.

image.text: Thunder causes trembling fear because the center is not attained. Though dangerous, there is no blame, as one takes warning from neighbors' misfortune.
image.explanation: During lightning and thunder, one moves cautiously due to inner emptiness and tension. Though there is danger, ultimately there is no disaster because one takes warning from neighbors' experiences, thus avoiding evil and approaching good.

lines.white_explanation: During lightning and thunder, one moves cautiously, looking around alertly because the path is difficult and dangers lurk everywhere. But lightning will not strike him; instead, it falls on his neighbor's head. This is because he has committed no wrongdoing, while his neighbors have sinned.

daxiang: Multiple thunders resound for thousands of miles, symbolizing alarm without danger, and also suggesting change and movement.
fortune: Outwardly prosperous and impressive, but internally experiencing a season of turbulence and instability.
career: Facing unfavorable or even dangerous situations, one must remain vigilant. Being prepared prevents danger; when sudden events occur, one can handle them calmly, learn lessons from them, minimize losses, and recover quickly, thus advancing one's career to new heights.
business: In fierce market competition, problems may arise at any time, leading to difficult situations. Address reality calmly and composedly, adhering to balanced principles with firm determination. After weathering the crisis, great profits can certainly be gained.
fame: One may encounter setbacks but should not be discouraged. Instead, engage in self-reflection to identify the root of the problem.
love: Both romance and family may experience unexpected changes; handle them calmly for ideal results.
advice: You are at a turning point in life. Correctly summarize the past to lay foundations for new endeavors. Always maintain a sense of caution on your path forward, working diligently, adhering to correct principles, advancing through difficulties toward a prosperous fate.
health: Liver fire is too strong; avoid overexertion.

name: Gen

kingWen.explanation: Keeping the back still, one does not obtain the body. Walking in one's courtyard, one does not see the person. No blame.

image.text: Linked mountains, Gen. The superior person does not allow his thoughts to go beyond his position.
image.explanation: Linked mountains, Gen. The superior person does not allow his thoughts to go beyond his position.

traditional.description: This hexagram consists of identical trigrams (Mountain below, Mountain above) stacked together. Gen represents mountains; two mountains stacked symbolize stillness. It is the opposite of the Zhen hexagram. After a high tide, a low tide inevitably follows, entering a phase of relative stillness. Still as a mountain, stop when appropriate, proceed when suitable. Movement and stillness must be perfectly timed, appropriate and moderate.

lines.explanation: Keeping the toes still, no blame. Beneficial for long-term perseverance.

image.text: Keeping the toes still, not losing correctness.
image.explanation: Resting the feet, avoiding rash action, staying away from impropriety, not deviating from the right path—this naturally brings long-term benefit.

lines.white_explanation: Resting the feet, avoiding rash action, naturally brings no disaster. This is an auspicious sign for long-term benefit.

lines.explanation: Keeping the calves still, not rescuing those who follow, one's heart is not happy.

image.text: Not rescuing those who follow, not retreating to listen.
image.explanation: The leg muscles are still injured because the person stubbornly refuses to retreat and listen to others' advice.

lines.white_explanation: Standing still without moving, yet the leg muscles are still injured. One feels very unhappy.

lines.explanation: Keeping the waist still, tearing the muscles of the back, danger burns the heart.

image.text: Keeping the waist still, danger burns the heart.
image.explanation: 'Unloading heavy burdens to protect the waist, yet the flesh between the ribs has already split; retreating too late brings danger'—the danger comes from being deluded by fame and profit.

lines.white_explanation: Unloading heavy burdens to protect the waist, yet the flesh between the ribs has already split. Retreating too late brings danger. This disaster results from being deluded by fame and profit, preventing timely resignation and withdrawal.

lines.explanation: Keeping the body still, no blame.

image.text: Keeping the body still, stopping with oneself.
image.explanation: Withdrawing to protect oneself means the person's attention is entirely focused on personal safety, thus avoiding disaster.

lines.white_explanation: Withdrawing to protect oneself, no disaster.

lines.explanation: Keeping the jaws still, the words are orderly, regret vanishes.

image.text: Keeping the jaws still, with central correctness.
image.explanation: Speaking less, talking with measure, no regrets—because the fifth yin line occupies the middle position of the upper trigram, like a person maintaining the balanced and correct path.

lines.white_explanation: Speaking less, talking with measure, naturally there is no regret.

lines.explanation: Generous stillness, good fortune.

image.text: The good fortune of generous stillness comes from a substantial ending.
image.explanation: The line text speaks of returning to honesty and sincerity as fortunate, because the top yang line is the final line of the hexagram, like a person who adheres to honesty and will certainly have a good end.

lines.white_explanation: Take care to protect your head; when the head is not lost, good fortune naturally follows.

daxiang: Two high mountains stand side by side; thus it is better to stop than advance, symbolizing obstruction.
fortune: In all matters, avoid rash action; the path ahead is blocked, one can only wait for the right opportunity.
career: After a period of development, adjustments should be made, temporarily halting action to summarize experiences and lessons. Do not advance rashly in pursuit of fame and profit. Practice self-control and self-discipline, be careful in words and actions, and don't blindly follow others. After reorganization, display your talents when the right opportunity comes.
business: Entering a state of stagnation, avoid blind advancement and appropriately stop, entering a phase of quiet defense. Don't be disturbed by external influences, especially maintain mental and rational tranquility, and avoid hasty cooperation with others. Wait for opportunities; a bright future will come.
fame: Maintain pure intentions and quietly guard the correct path. Don't be tempted by fame; by adhering to honesty, success can be achieved.
love: Value emotions and treat each other with sincerity for lifelong companionship.
advice: Your character is calm and introverted; you dislike activity and are not good at social interaction, but you are honest and faithful, valuing integrity. Pay attention to others' advice and protect yourself wisely. When opportunities are not present, active engagement is not advisable; stop when necessary and avoid unrealistic thinking.
health: Prolonging life despite illness.

name: Jian

kingWen.explanation: The marriage of a woman brings good fortune, favorable for perseverance.

image.text: Trees on a mountain, Jian. The superior person abides in virtue and improves customs.
image.explanation: Trees on a mountain, Jian. The superior person abides in virtue and improves customs.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed from different trigrams (lower Gen over upper Sun). Gen represents mountain, Sun represents wood. Trees growing on a mountain, gradually increasing as the mountain also grows higher. This represents a process of gradual advancement, hence the name Jian, meaning to advance gradually rather than hastily.

lines.explanation: The wild goose gradually advances to the shore. The young son is in danger. There is gossip but no blame.

image.text: The danger for the young son brings no blame because of proper guidance.
image.explanation: A mischievous child encounters danger, but because parents scold and restrain them, naturally no accident will occur.

lines.white_explanation: The wild goose walks into the ravine. For this line, beware of mischievous children encountering danger; they should be reprimanded, then there will be no disaster.

lines.explanation: The wild goose gradually advances to the rock. Eating and drinking in joy and harmony, good fortune.

image.text: Eating and drinking joyfully, not being fed without working.
image.explanation: Eating and drinking one's fill with contentment and joy, indicating one who earns their living and never takes without working.

lines.white_explanation: The wild goose advances to the high ground by the water, eating and drinking its fill, content and joyful. For this line, good fortune.

lines.explanation: The wild goose gradually advances to the plateau. The husband goes on a expedition and does not return. The wife becomes pregnant but does not give birth. Misfortune. Beneficial for defense against bandits.

image.text: The husband goes on an expedition and does not return, having strayed from the group. The wife becomes pregnant but does not give birth, having lost her way. It is beneficial for defense against bandits, as people unite to protect each other.
image.explanation: The husband goes to war and does not return, indicating he has been separated from his group and encountered danger. The woman becomes pregnant but miscarries, indicating she has lost the proper way to protect the pregnancy. It is beneficial for defense against invaders, indicating people can unite with one heart to protect home and country.

lines.white_explanation: The wild goose walks onto dry land. For this line, a husband going to war may not return, and a pregnant woman may miscarry - this is an ominous sign. But it is favorable for defending against invaders.

lines.explanation: The wild goose gradually advances to the trees. It may find a flat branch. No blame.

image.text: It may find a flat branch, through compliance and gentleness.
image.explanation: Some wild geese rest on wooden rafts piled by the river; there is no disaster because the fourth yin line is below the fifth yang line, like someone who is submissive yet humble.

lines.white_explanation: The wild goose flies to the trees, some resting on rafts piled by the river. For this line, no disaster.

lines.explanation: The wild goose gradually advances to the hilltop. The wife does not conceive for three years, but in the end nothing can prevent it. Good fortune.

image.text: In the end nothing can prevent it, good fortune, as the wish is fulfilled.
image.explanation: In the end she is not replaced, which is fortunate; the wife has realized her wish to grow old in harmony with her husband.

lines.white_explanation: The wild goose walks up to the hilltop. For this line, a wife cannot conceive for many years, but ultimately will not be replaced by another, which is fortunate.

lines.explanation: The wild goose gradually advances to the heights. Its feathers can be used for ceremonial purposes. Good fortune.

image.text: Its feathers can be used for ceremonial purposes, bringing good fortune; they cannot be disordered.
image.explanation: The wild goose's feathers can be used to make dance ornaments, which is an auspicious sign. The feathers used for dance ornaments should be pure and not mixed, like one whose mind is not disordered.

lines.white_explanation: The wild goose walks to the mountaintop, its feathers can be used to make dance ornaments. This is an auspicious sign.

daxiang: Trees growing on a mountain, gradually thriving, symbolizing step-by-step progress.
fortune: Gradually moving toward a bright future, it is advisable to build foundations in all matters to obtain good fortune, but beware of romantic troubles and document errors.
career: After a relatively static period, you have begun a new phase in your career. The greatest fear now is impatience and rash advancement; you must progress in proper sequence with your feet on solid ground. Also pay attention to moral cultivation, approaching your career with composure and humility, and you will succeed in all ventures.
business: Currently in a stage of steady forward development, you must seize the opportunity. Neither be blindly optimistic nor stand still, but adopt a strategy of gradual advancement within your capabilities. Observe business ethics and develop the market with good service.
fame: Emulate the spirit of trees rooted in the mountains, gradually growing. Solidly improve yourself in both morality and studies. At the same time, take on the responsibility of improving social customs. Seeking fame should be done gradually; never rush for advancement.
love: Do not be too hasty. Happiness and fulfillment, with harmony between husband and wife until old age.
advice: The moment of changing fortunes has arrived, do not miss this good opportunity. Be careful and cautious; gradual progress is beneficial. With a humble attitude toward the world, you can gain strong support and achieve great success.
health: Rest and nourish yourself.

name: Gui Mei

kingWen.explanation: Undertakings bring misfortune, nothing is favorable.

image.text: Thunder over the lake, Gui Mei. The superior person understands the transience of things through long contemplation.
image.explanation: Thunder over the lake, Gui Mei. The superior person understands the transience of things through long contemplation.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed from different trigrams (lower Dui over upper Zhen). Zhen represents movement and the eldest son; Dui represents joy and the youngest daughter. The youngest daughter follows the eldest son, generating feelings of love; there is movement toward marriage, symbolizing the giving away of a daughter in marriage, hence the name Gui Mei (Marrying Maiden).

lines.explanation: The marrying maiden as a secondary wife. A lame person who can still walk. Undertakings bring good fortune.

image.text: The marrying maiden as a secondary wife follows a constant pattern. A lame person who can still walk brings good fortune through support.
image.explanation: Marrying off a daughter with her younger sister as a concubine means sisters marrying the same husband, which was the norm for noble marriages in ancient times. Being lame yet able to walk, setting forth brings good fortune because the lame person receives help from others.

lines.white_explanation: Marrying off a daughter with her younger sister as a secondary wife. Lame yet able to walk. For this line, setting forth brings good fortune.

lines.explanation: A one-eyed person who can yet see. It is favorable for the divination of a hermit.

image.text: It is favorable for the divination of a hermit because their constant nature has not changed.
image.explanation: This is a favorable divination for a prisoner because though in captivity, they have not lost the right path and thus can see the light again.

lines.white_explanation: Eyes blind yet able to see. This is a favorable divination for a prisoner.

lines.explanation: The marrying maiden waits, later returning as a concubine.

image.text: The marrying maiden waits, the position is not appropriate.

lines.explanation: The marrying maiden delays her time; late marriage comes in due time.

image.text: The intention behind delaying is to wait for the right moment to act.
image.explanation: Past marriageable age yet unwed, because she is determined to find the right husband.

lines.white_explanation: Marriage time past marriageable age; the delay in marriage is because she is waiting for something.

lines.explanation: Emperor Yi gave his daughter in marriage. Her embroidered robes were not as fine as those of the concubine. The moon is nearly full. Good fortune.

image.text: Emperor Yi gave his daughter in marriage; her embroidered robes were not as fine as those of the concubine. Her position is in the middle, thus she acts with nobility.
image.explanation: The sixth line is at the end of the hexagram, hanging alone without support, appropriately holding an empty basket.

lines.white_explanation: Emperor Yi married his daughter to King Wen of Zhou, with his second daughter as a concubine. Regarding the dowry, the elder sister's was not as good as the younger sister's. The auspicious date was chosen as the fourteenth day of a certain month. This is favorable.

lines.explanation: The woman holds a basket without fruit in it, the man sacrifices a sheep without blood flowing. Nothing is favorable.

image.text: At the top yin there is no substance, holding an empty basket.
image.explanation: The sixth line is at the end of the hexagram, hanging alone without support, appropriately holding an empty basket.

lines.white_explanation: During the sacrifice, the bride holds a basket for offerings, but there is nothing in it; the groom stabs a sheep with a knife, but no blood flows. This is an inauspicious omen, nothing is favorable.

daxiang: Thunder (eldest son) above and Lake (youngest daughter) below, the woman must follow the man in marriage, but a young girl paired with the eldest son is not a normal combination.
fortune: Handling matters contrary to proper principles and the correct path - while gaining benefits initially, disaster will follow in hundreds of ways.
career: You are entering a new stage, and soon there will be another scene. At this time, you must first have the far-sighted vision to see through gains, losses, and fortune or misfortune; to be prepared is to prevent calamity. Secondly, you must maintain pure virtue and correct principles.
business: Opening up new markets is about to succeed. In future business activities, you must pay attention to direction and category of operations, and strengthen cooperation with others.
fame: You must work with firm determination to improve yourself and lay the foundation for fame and success. The most fearful thing is that romance could affect your future and career.
love: Let things take their natural course, do not go against principles, especially do not force things. Better to marry late than not choose the ideal partner. Couples who go through life's tests can remain harmonious into old age.
advice: In life, you must maintain just and pure virtue, correctly handle marriage and family, and develop your career on the foundation of a happy and harmonious family.
health: The end of life is approaching.

name: Feng

kingWen.explanation: Success. The king approaches his temple. It is favorable to see the great man. Do not worry, it is appropriate at midday.

image.text: Thunder and lightning both appear, Feng. The superior person decides lawsuits and applies penalties.
image.explanation: Thunder and lightning both appear, Feng. The superior person decides lawsuits and applies penalties.

traditional.description: This hexagram consists of different trigrams (lower Li over upper Zhen). Lightning flashes and thunder roars, achieving greatness, symbolizing reaching the peak, like the sun at midday. Warning: One must be mindful that things develop in the opposite direction, prosperity and decline are inconstant, one must remain vigilant.

lines.explanation: Meeting a suitable partner, though within ten days there will be no blame; going forward brings respect.

image.text: Though within ten days there will be no blame, disaster comes after ten days.
image.explanation: No disaster within ten days means disaster will come after a ten-day period.

lines.white_explanation: On a journey, being received by a female host, and marrying this widowed woman. The divination shows: there will be no criticism, and one will gain people's approval.

lines.explanation: Making a canopy of mats, at midday seeing the Big Dipper. Going forward brings suspicion of illness. Having sincerity that expresses itself brings good fortune.

image.text: Having sincerity that expresses itself means expressing one's intentions with faith.
image.explanation: Being sincere in heart, manifesting in every word and action, because this is an open and direct expression of one's desires.

lines.white_explanation: Piecing together small mats to lie down and rest. At midday, someone claims to see the North Star. It seems someone among the traveling companions is mentally confused. Stimulating him might help him regain clarity.

lines.explanation: Adding more thickness to the mat, at midday seeing ghosts. Breaking one's right arm, no blame.

image.text: Adding more thickness to the mat, no great achievement is possible. Breaking one's right arm, rendering it ultimately unusable.
image.explanation: Making the grass mat thicker doesn't serve any great purpose. Breaking his right arm would make him permanently disabled.

lines.white_explanation: Making the grass mat thicker to lie down and rest. At midday, this person again claims to see ghosts. Breaking his right arm. After such a shock, perhaps he will become quiet.

lines.explanation: Making a canopy of mats, at midday seeing the Big Dipper. Meeting the foreigner master, good fortune.

image.text: Making a canopy of mats, the position is not appropriate. At midday seeing the Big Dipper, darkness not clarity. Meeting the foreigner master brings good fortune in action.
image.explanation: Piecing together small mats to rest anywhere indicates an inappropriate position, just as the fourth yang line occupies a yin position. Seeing the North Star at midday might be due to dark, unclear skies. Meeting his old innkeeper is a fortunate journey.

lines.white_explanation: Piecing together small mats to lie down and rest. At midday, this person still claims to see the North Star, suggesting he has not yet returned to normal. Fortunately, meeting his old innkeeper, entrusting him to the innkeeper, now brings peace and safety.

lines.explanation: Bringing brilliance, receiving congratulations and praise, good fortune.

image.text: The good fortune of the fifth yin line comes from having a celebration.
image.explanation: The good fortune mentioned in the fifth yin line is due to an auspicious event.

lines.white_explanation: Acquiring beautiful jade, everyone congratulates and praises him. This is an auspicious omen.

lines.explanation: Making his house abundant, covering his family, peeping through his door, it is quiet with no one there. For three years he is not seen, misfortune.

image.text: Making his house abundant, like flying across the sky. Peeping through his door, quiet with no one there, he has hidden himself.
image.explanation: Expanding and enlarging the house, it seems this person is like a bird flying in the sky, feeling satisfied and fulfilled, having become quite wealthy. Looking through the door crack and seeing no one suggests that too much wealth brings harm, disaster has struck, and he has fled.

lines.white_explanation: The house is empty, the roof messily covered with straw mats, looking through the door crack reveals complete emptiness. It seems no one has lived here for years. This is an ominous sign.

daxiang: Thunder and lightning combining with great force, and the sun moving across the sky, illuminating the earth, all symbolizing great prosperity.
fortune: Fortune is extremely strong, it is harvest time, but one should not be greedy, be content with what is enough, and beware of disputes, financial loss, or even fire hazards.
career: Currently in a very prosperous and flourishing period, everything is smooth, with great achievements. But one must pay attention to the early symptoms of decline, prevent problems before they grow, and strictly guard against pride and complacency. At the same time, do not blindly pursue unrealistic goals; focus on maintaining the current favorable situation as long as possible.
business: Having accurately grasped market dynamics, business conditions are very favorable. One can develop boldly, but must closely monitor market trends and analyze information. The slightest carelessness could lead to bankruptcy overnight. If bankruptcy occurs, immediately learn from the experience, seek sincere business partners, and quickly emerge from the difficult situation.
fame: After effort and struggle, you have achieved success. You should focus on maintaining steady development and avoid pursuing empty fame.
love: Success is possible, with happiness and fulfillment, but if one party wavers due to changing conditions, unfavorable results will follow.
advice: Due to your natural intelligence and favorable conditions, everything is going very smoothly. But you must deeply understand the truth that life is impermanent; everything should be kept in moderation, remembering that extremes lead to reversal. Do not become self-isolated or fall into despair if difficulties arise.
health: Liver fire is rising; rest is advisable.

name: Lü

kingWen.explanation: Small success. Favorable to remain steadfast while traveling.

image.text: Fire on the mountain, Lü. The superior person is clear-minded about judgment and does not prolong imprisonment.
image.explanation: Fire on the mountain, Lü. The superior person is clear-minded about judgment and does not prolong imprisonment.

traditional.description: This hexagram consists of different trigrams (lower Gen over upper Li). This hexagram is opposite to the Feng hexagram, forming a 'comprehensive hexagram' pair. Fire burning on a mountain continues to spread forward, like a traveler on a journey, hurrying along the road. Thus it is called the Lü (Wanderer) hexagram.

lines.explanation: The wanderer is petty and irresolute, thus bringing disaster upon himself.

image.text: The wanderer is petty and irresolute, showing exhaustion and misfortune.
image.explanation: The traveler is indecisive and hesitant, showing his spirit is weary and exhausted.

lines.white_explanation: The traveler is hesitant and indecisive, finally leaving his dwelling, resulting in self-inflicted disaster.

lines.explanation: The wanderer comes to an inn, carrying his possessions, and gains a young servant. Steadfast.

image.text: Gaining a young servant through steadfastness ultimately brings no regret.
image.explanation: Buying a male servant with a favorable divination indicates this transaction has no problems.

lines.white_explanation: The traveler arrives at the marketplace, carrying money and buys a male servant. The divination is favorable.

lines.explanation: The wanderer burns his lodging place, loses his young servant. Dangerous.

image.text: The wanderer burns his lodging place, also causing injury. When a traveler takes a servant below, the servant naturally abandons him.
image.explanation: The traveler comes to a marketplace on fire - wouldn't he suffer loss? Since the traveler brought his servant along, it's natural for the servant to run away in the chaos.

lines.white_explanation: The traveler arrives at a burning marketplace, and his newly purchased servant escapes in the chaos. The divination shows danger.

lines.explanation: The wanderer rests at a lodging place, obtains his property and ax. My heart is not pleased.

image.text: The wanderer at his lodging place has not found the right position. Obtaining property and ax, but the heart is still not at ease.
image.explanation: The traveler returns to his temporary dwelling, which is not an appropriate residence. Having earned considerable money, he fears robbery and naturally feels uneasy.

lines.white_explanation: The traveler returns to his temporary dwelling, and because he has earned considerable money, he feels uneasy.

lines.explanation: Shooting a pheasant, one arrow is lost, but eventually there is praise and authority.

image.text: Eventually receiving praise and authority, the superior hears of it.
image.explanation: Finally gaining a reputation as a good archer, as word of mouth spreads, even those in high positions come to know of it.

lines.white_explanation: Shooting a wild pheasant, hitting it with one shot, the person thus gains a reputation as a good archer.

lines.explanation: A bird burns its nest; the wanderer first laughs, then wails. He loses his ox in the field. Misfortune.

image.text: Being a traveler in the high position, burning is the natural result. Losing an ox in a foreign land, ultimately no one hears of it.
image.explanation: With a merchant traveler in high office, an extreme breach of role, his residence being burned is to be expected. Cattle and sheep being robbed in a foreign land, with no one to comfort or sympathize, is perfectly understandable.

lines.white_explanation: A bird's nest is burned, the Zhou people's villages are plundered. For the scattered Zhou people, the good life is now in the past, the harsh reality is before their eyes, with Di people driving away cattle and sheep - how will they survive the days ahead?

daxiang: Fire burning across mountain wilderness, spreading everywhere, reaching all places without exception, like a traveler who has no fixed abode.
fortune: All matters are unstable; at this time one should hold firmly to faith and consult others' opinions, otherwise there will certainly be misfortune.
career: You are at the startup and development stage with many difficulties. As long as you adhere to correct principles, conduct affairs righteously, pay attention to investigation, exercise caution everywhere, and adopt contingency measures according to changing situations, your career can advance smoothly.
business: Market conditions are like a journey, with unexpected situations arising at any time. Therefore, you should first adopt cautious principles and avoid risks. But you should not be timid either, especially avoiding suspicion. Before developing markets, you should conduct thorough investigation and research.
fame: According to the needs of the times, enrich your knowledge and abilities, continuously improve yourself, and strive to obtain assistance from others.
love: There are many uncertainties between the two parties. If there are real feelings, let them develop naturally before making a decision. Marriage will be fulfilling.
advice: Life is in a state of flux. You must have a far-sighted vision, establish great aspirations, continuously enrich yourself, treat people and handle affairs with sincerity and humility, not calculate immediate gains and losses, and cultivate wide social connections. The journey of life will be very smooth.
health: Excessive liver fire, a matter of life and death.

name: Xun

kingWen.explanation: Small success. Favorable to have somewhere to go. Favorable to see the great man.

image.text: Following the wind, Xun. The superior person spreads his commands and carries out his undertakings.
image.explanation: Following the wind, Xun. The superior person spreads his commands and carries out his undertakings.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by the same trigram (lower Xun over upper Xun) stacked together. Xun represents wind; two winds reinforce each other, creating a long-lasting wind that penetrates everywhere. Xun means compliance. A humble attitude and behavior can lead to success in all endeavors.

lines.explanation: In advancing and retreating, it is favorable for a military person to remain steadfast.

image.text: Advancing and retreating shows doubt in one's purpose. Favorable for a military person to be steadfast shows a determined will.
image.explanation: Advancing and retreating according to orders is because one has no preconceptions. It is appropriate for a military person to have firm determination, because only with firm will can one be brave and fearless, calm in the face of danger.

lines.white_explanation: Advancing and retreating according to orders is favorable for military personnel's divination.

lines.explanation: Xun beneath the bed. Using priests and magicians repeatedly. Auspicious. No blame.

image.text: The repetition being auspicious is due to occupying the central position.
image.explanation: The priests and magicians working busily to exorcise evil spirits brings improvement to the illness because the Nine in the Second position occupies the central position of the lower trigram; the line position is favorable, so the disaster naturally recedes.

lines.white_explanation: A sick person confined to bed, with priests and magicians conducting divine ceremonies, exorcising evil spirits, working busily. The condition improves and the disaster is eliminated.

lines.explanation: Repeated compliance brings regret.

image.text: The regret of repeated compliance comes from desperation.
image.explanation: Forced compliance with inner discontent shows this comes from having no alternative.

lines.white_explanation: Forced compliance will result in inner discontent.

lines.explanation: Regret vanishes. During the hunt, three kinds of game are captured.

image.text: Capturing three kinds of game shows achievement.
image.explanation: Hunting and obtaining various game indicates a great harvest from hunting.

lines.white_explanation: No regret. Hunting yields various kinds of game.

lines.explanation: Persistence brings good fortune. Regret vanishes. Nothing is unfavorable. No beginning, but there is an end. Before the day of Geng, three days; after the day of Geng, three days. Good fortune.

image.text: The good fortune of Nine in the Fifth Place comes from occupying the central and correct position.
image.explanation: The Nine in the Fifth speaks of good fortune because the Nine in the Fifth position occupies the central position of the upper trigram, like someone whose actions conform to the right way, naturally bringing good fortune.

lines.white_explanation: Divination yields a favorable omen, no regret, nothing is unfavorable. Though without a good beginning, there will be a good ending. The date is set for Ding day or Gui day, and the matter will certainly succeed.

lines.explanation: Xun beneath the bed. He loses his property. Persistence brings misfortune.

image.text: Xun beneath the bed shows one has reached the end. Losing property and being correct brings misfortune.
image.explanation: Hiding under the bed is exactly the image of the Top Nine at the end of its path. Money and valuables being looted - isn't that a matter of misfortune?

lines.white_explanation: A person hiding under the bed, money and valuables completely looted. Divination yields an unlucky omen.

daxiang: This hexagram consists of two Xun winds stacked together. Xun means to enter; where wind reaches, it penetrates everywhere, just as government decrees are issued and deeply penetrate the hearts of the people.
fortune: Full of twists and turns, fortune rises and falls unpredictably. One must adapt to changing circumstances, remain calm and choose to firmly follow what is good.
career: You are in development. You should press forward with courage, overcome all difficulties and dangers, and strive upward. All beginnings are difficult, and you will initially suffer setbacks, but with the help of talented and virtuous individuals, there will be an ideal outcome.
business: Market competition is fierce with high risks. Business activities must be conducted with caution, adhering to business ethics, treating peers and customers with humility, and even competitors, which will certainly bring benefits.
fame: Approach everything with a humble attitude, but do not be self-deprecating, weak, or affected, and especially not hypocritical; this way you can make quick progress.
love: Do not approach with a casual attitude, but be prudent and show mutual respect.
advice: You have an intelligent, agile mind and cheerful personality. By dealing with the world humbly, you will be welcomed by all sides and will gain attention from superiors. Humility should not be excessive but should be based on strength and correctness; never appear weak or hypocritical, which would be unfavorable to your personal growth.
health: Possible stroke, requiring support to walk.

name: Dui

kingWen.explanation: Success. Favorable to be steadfast.

image.text: Connected lakes, Dui. The superior person shares with friends in discussion and practice.
image.explanation: Connected lakes, Dui. The superior person shares with friends in discussion and practice.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by the same trigram (lower Lake over upper Lake) stacked together. Lake represents water. Two lakes connecting, two waters flowing together, upper and lower in harmony, united as one, friends helping each other, joyful and happy. Dui means joy. Sharing the same strong virtues, externally embracing gentleness, firmly following the right path, guiding people upward.

lines.explanation: Harmonious joy. Good fortune.

image.text: The good fortune of harmonious joy lies in freedom from doubt in one's actions.
image.explanation: Harmonious joy brings good fortune because there is no suspicion in interpersonal relations.

lines.white_explanation: Harmonious joy brings good fortune.

lines.explanation: Sincere joy. Good fortune. Regret vanishes.

image.text: The good fortune of sincere joy comes from trustworthy intentions.
image.explanation: Treating others with sincerity, and others responding warmly, brings good fortune because there is mutual trust between them.

lines.white_explanation: Treating prisoners well brings good fortune and no regret.

lines.explanation: Coming joy. Misfortune.

image.text: The misfortune of coming joy is due to an inappropriate position.
image.explanation: Taking pleasure in making others submit contains danger, because one's strength is small yet the task is great, one's virtue is shallow yet one desires much, and one's actions will certainly be inappropriate.

lines.white_explanation: Taking pleasure in making others submit contains danger.

lines.explanation: Discussing joy with indecision. After overcoming the difficulty comes joy.

image.text: The joy of the Nine in the Fourth Position is cause for celebration.
image.explanation: The joy mentioned in the Nine in the Fourth Position refers to a coming happy event.

lines.white_explanation: Discussing the restoration of diplomatic relations has not yet reached an agreement, but the conflicts and differences between the two countries are showing signs of healing.

lines.explanation: Trusting in one who would strip you of your wealth has danger.

image.text: Trusting in one who would strip you represents an appropriate position.
image.explanation: When being stripped of possessions, still treating others with sincerity, just as the Nine in the Fifth position shows, this person practices the way of the mean and righteousness, and can certainly turn danger into safety.

lines.white_explanation: Being taken prisoner by Bo country. Bo country provoked without reason and must be punished (for our side, bad things will turn into good).

lines.explanation: Extending joy.

image.text: The Top Six extends joy, but without brilliance.
image.explanation: The Top Six speaks of guiding everyone to get along harmoniously. Though well-intentioned, the Top Six yin line is at the very end of the hexagram, suggesting this person may not necessarily rally everyone to the cause.

lines.white_explanation: Guiding everyone to get along harmoniously.

daxiang: Two lakes depend on each other, with the moon reflected in the lake waters - beautiful scenery and pleasant times, making people joyful.
fortune: Joy and sorrow intermingled, with both praise and criticism. Following the right path, matters can still be satisfactory.
career: Because you are good at interpersonal relationships and can unite with others, you gain assistance. Therefore, all career matters proceed quite smoothly. As long as you adhere to the right way, have pure motives, distinguish clearly between right and wrong, and interact with others sincerely and joyfully, your future will be bright.
business: Very favorable. You can obtain support through multiple channels. But when things are going smoothly, don't forget the principle of caution, especially beware of being deceived by petty people.
fame: As long as your purpose is pure and you have real talent and learning, you will certainly receive enthusiastic help and support from many sides, achieving your goals.
love: Both parties are satisfied, with a high probability of success. But never be too insistent on your own views.
advice: You are intelligent, cheerful in personality, mentally agile, kind-hearted, enthusiastic about public service, and have organizational ability. Therefore, you can relatively smoothly step into leadership positions. But you must adhere to the principle of righteousness, handle affairs impartially, not flatter superiors, and especially not oppress the people. Always maintain the virtue of humility, and especially do not be overly self-confident, otherwise you can easily be surrounded by bad people.
health: Can be treated by an experienced doctor.

name: Huan

kingWen.explanation: Success. The king approaches his temple. It is favorable to cross the great river. Favorable to be steadfast.

image.text: Wind moving over water, Huan. The ancient kings made offerings to the Lord and established temples.
image.explanation: Wind moving over water, Huan. The ancient kings made offerings to the Lord and established temples.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed by different trigrams (lower Kan over upper Xun). Wind moves over water, pushing waves, flowing in all directions. Huan means the scattering of water. It symbolizes the dispersion of organization and people's hearts. One must use active means and methods to overcome and defeat problems, save the scattered situation, and turn danger into safety.

lines.explanation: Using the horse for rescue brings good fortune.

image.text: The good fortune of the Initial Six comes from compliance.
image.explanation: The good fortune mentioned in the Initial Six is because the Initial Six yin line is below the Nine in the Second yang line, showing the yin's compliance with the yang, like a horse obeying human will.

lines.white_explanation: Flood comes suddenly, so one escapes by horse, falling and injuring oneself in haste, but fortunately escaping drowning, which is lucky.

lines.explanation: The dispersing flood rushes to the foundation. Regret vanishes.

image.text: The dispersing flood rushes to the foundation, obtaining what was wished for.
image.explanation: Cleansing and washing away the filth is exactly what was desired.

lines.white_explanation: Flood waters rush forward, destroying house foundations. Life is not in danger. This is the greatest fortune amidst misfortune.

lines.explanation: Dispersing oneself. No regrets.

image.text: Dispersing oneself means one's will is directed outward.
image.explanation: Washing one's body shows this person's will is to educate others and govern the country.

lines.white_explanation: Flood waters reach one's body, but one escapes danger, which is fortunate.

lines.explanation: Dispersing the group. Supreme good fortune. Dispersing leads to accumulation like a mound. Ordinary people would not even imagine this.

image.text: Dispersing the group brings supreme good fortune, showing widespread illumination.
image.explanation: Washing the common people indicates the king's virtuous teaching is broadly applied, with education widely implemented.

lines.white_explanation: Flood waters flow toward crowds of people, but very fortunately the crowds are gathered on a hill. The flood can only reach the foot of the hill; otherwise, the consequences would be unimaginable.

lines.explanation: Dispersing sweat with a great shout. Dispersing the king's residence. No blame.

image.text: The king's residence suffers no blame because the position is correct.
image.explanation: The royal palace has not suffered disaster because the Nine in the Fifth position occupies the central position of the upper trigram - the position is honored and correct, naturally avoiding disaster.

lines.white_explanation: Flood waters spread widely, flooding the capital and reaching the royal palace, but fortunately people had already evacuated, so there was no major disaster.

lines.explanation: Dispersing one's blood, departing and keeping distant. No blame.

image.text: Dispersing one's blood means keeping distant from harm.
image.explanation: There is danger of bloodshed; move away, move far away - this way one can distance oneself from disaster.

lines.white_explanation: The flood waters recede, worry is eliminated, but one must still remain vigilant and strengthen prevention. This way there will be no disaster.

daxiang: Wind blowing across the water's surface, flowing and dispersing, and also like spring wind dispersing severe cold, causing ice and snow to melt.
fortune: Although there are worries, difficulties will eventually be resolved, all matters will proceed smoothly. Avoid willfulness and carelessness.
career: You are in a rather difficult situation, mainly because people's hearts are not united. You must take strong measures to achieve stability and unity. Most importantly, persist in the right path, uphold the spirit of selflessness and impartiality, and gather people's hearts to unify what has been scattered.
business: Market conditions are chaotic and direction is unclear. Some appropriate risk-taking is absolutely necessary. But you must be fair and impartial, controlling personal desires. Seeking cooperation and support from those with strength is also quite necessary.
fame: You must calm down to study hard and improve your knowledge level and increase your abilities. The scattered situation must be addressed, requiring talent in many areas. The future is bright, with the key depending on individual effort.
love: As long as both parties have pure purposes, it will certainly be successful and fulfilling.
advice: To develop your career, you must use positive means to overcome and defeat the drawbacks of internal disunity. First, eliminate selfishness, sacrifice the small self to complete the greater whole. Do not get involved in disputes. This way, you can regain a stable situation. In a good environment, all career prospects are bright.
health: The illness is serious and may be difficult to overcome.

name: Jie

kingWen.explanation: Success. Bitter limitation cannot be maintained.

image.text: Water above the lake, Limitation. The superior person establishes numbers and measures, and examines virtue and conduct.
image.explanation: Water above the lake, Limitation. The superior person establishes numbers and measures, and examines virtue and conduct.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed from different trigrams (lower Dui over upper Kan). Dui represents lake, Kan represents water. The lake contains water but with limited flow, excess water will overflow beyond the lake. Therefore there must be moderation, hence the name Limitation. The Jie hexagram is opposite to the Huan hexagram, they are complementary hexagrams, used in conjunction. Heaven and earth have limitations to remain renewed, nations have limitations to remain stable, individuals have limitations to remain perfect.

lines.explanation: Not leaving the courtyard, no blame.

image.text: Not leaving the courtyard, knowing what is passable and what is obstructed.
image.explanation: Staying behind closed doors, because one knows that progress is impossible.

lines.white_explanation: For this line, staying behind closed doors brings no disaster.

lines.explanation: Not leaving the gate, misfortune.

image.text: Not leaving the gate brings misfortune, as one has lost the right moment completely.
image.explanation: Staying behind closed doors is also dangerous, because one has missed the opportunity, the error is extreme.

lines.white_explanation: For this line, staying behind closed doors is also dangerous.

lines.explanation: One who does not practice limitation will lament. No blame.

image.text: The lamentation of not practicing limitation, who is to blame?
image.explanation: Extravagance leads to regret, whose fault is this?

lines.white_explanation: Without frugality comes poverty, in poverty one learns to repent, with repentance one can avoid disaster.

lines.explanation: Content with limitation, success.

image.text: The success of content with limitation comes from following the way above.
image.explanation: Being content with a frugal and proper life brings success, because one follows the will of those above.

lines.white_explanation: Being content with a frugal and proper life brings success.

lines.explanation: Sweet limitation brings good fortune. Going forward brings esteem.

image.text: The good fortune of sweet limitation comes from occupying the central position.
image.explanation: Taking joy in frugality and propriety is fortunate because the Nine in the Fifth position occupies the appropriate position, like one who dwells in virtue and righteousness, naturally gaining others' assistance.

lines.white_explanation: Taking joy in frugality and propriety brings good fortune. Proceeding with this attitude, one will certainly receive assistance from others.

lines.explanation: Bitter limitation, perseverance brings misfortune. Regret vanishes.

image.text: Bitter limitation with perseverance brings misfortune, as the path is exhausted.
image.explanation: Finding limitation bitter and maintaining this view brings an unfortunate divination, just as the Top Six yin line hangs alone at the hexagram's end, like one who has reached a dead end.

lines.white_explanation: Finding limitation bitter brings an unfortunate divination; one will regret the decline of family fortune.

daxiang: Lake represents pools and marshes, with Kan water above, symbolizing the storing and restriction of water to prevent loss, but if the water level becomes too high, flooding results.
fortune: One's ambitions cannot be realized; all matters must be moderated, excess should be avoided, and one should especially abstain from alcohol and sensual pleasures.
career: During this development period, one must be careful not to advance rashly. But one should also not forgo good opportunities; as long as one adheres to principles of benefit and righteousness, one can act boldly. This way, one's career can continue to flourish.
business: Market conditions are favorable and beneficial; one should work hard to expand and not miss opportunities. However, one must maintain a cool head, invest within limits, know when enough is enough, and withdraw at the right time.
fame: Be strict with yourself, conduct affairs with moderation, avoid extremes, and you can proceed without obstacle, advancing smoothly.
love: Do not become uncontrollably passionate; letting things develop naturally will bring good results.
advice: Seize opportunities, do not miss favorable moments. Moderate your actions appropriately, do not force matters, and especially avoid taking risks, but maintain proper balance. Do not be rigid in anything; change when necessary. But when moderation is called for, one must practice moderation. Limitation must have its limits; excessive limitation becomes suffering and will not bring good results; this is called counterproductive, and one must be extremely careful about this.
health: Moderate your diet.

name: Zhong Fu

kingWen.explanation: Pigs and fishes bring good fortune. It is favorable to cross the great river. Favorable for persistence.

image.text: Wind above the lake, Zhong Fu. The superior person deliberates on criminal cases and delays executions.
image.explanation: Wind above the lake, Zhong Fu. The superior person deliberates on criminal cases and delays executions.

traditional.description: This hexagram is formed from different trigrams (lower Dui over upper Sun). The original meaning of Fu is to hatch, with eggs hatching exactly on schedule, conveying the meaning of trust. The hexagram form is externally solid and internally hollow, symbolizing sincerity and trustworthiness at heart, hence the name Zhong Fu. This is the foundation for conduct in life.

lines.explanation: Preparing is auspicious. If there are other thoughts, it is not peaceful.

image.text: The First Nine preparing is auspicious, as the will remains unchanged.
